MALARIA 
----------------

MALARIA: Wannan wani rashin lafiya ne da ake samunsa sanadiyyar cizon macen sauro, wadda take sakawa mutum kwayoyin cuta a cikin jini.

A na samun cutar ne a sanadiyar kwayoyin cutar da macen sauro ke zubawa mutum acikin jini.

KWAYOYIN CUTAR DA SUKE KAWO MALARIA :

1- P falciparum
2- P Vivax 
3- P ovalae
4- P malarias
5- P knowlesi

Amma amfi samun p falciparum a Nigeria shi yasa mafi yawan magani da ake amfanida shi na malaria a Nigeria ACT ne .

GA WASSU DAGA CIKIN ALAMUN MALARIA :

1- Zazzabi
2- Ciwon kai
3- Tashin Zuciya
4- Amai
5- Gudawa
6- Ciwon jiki
7- Atini
8- Dachin Baki
9- Rashin Cin Abinci
10- Rashin Karfin jiki.
11- Kasala
12- mutun yaji ya rasa abinda yake masa dadi.

GA WASSU DAGA CIKIN MUTANE IDAN MALARIA TAKAMASU RAYUWARSU TANA CIKIN HATSARI :

1- Mace Mai Ciki
2- Yara Kanana
3- Masu cutan Sickler

1- Malaria A Mace mai ciki Yakan kawo mata :

A- Haifan Macaccen jariri
B- Yakan Zubar mata da ciki.
C- Yakan Kawo Haihuwan Bakwaini .
D- Yakan Kashe Uwar Da Yaron Gabaki Daya.

YA AKE GANE MUTUM YANA DAUKE DA KWAYAR CUTAR MALARIA :

Ana gane malaria ne ta hanyoyi guda biyu wanda dukkansu jini ake gwadawa, sune :

1- RDTs Malaria test
2- Microcopy Malaria test

MATSALOLIN DA MALARIA YAKE KAWOWA ( COMPLICATION OF MALARIA ) 

1- Rashin jini a jiki 
2- Matsalar kwakwalwa
3- matsalar Ciwon zuciya
4- Matsalar huhu da oda
5- Kumburi ko fashewar spleen .
6- Yana saukan da suga ( Hypositiveglycemia)

KARIYA DA KAMUWA DA CITON MALARIA :

1- SPAQ (sulfadoxine-pyrimethamine + amodiaquine) wannan wata magani ce wanda ake bawa yara kanana masu watanni 3 zuwa 59 domin kariya daga cutar malaria.

Kungiyoyin lafiya ta cikin gida da ta dubiya sun dauki nauyin bada wannan maganin kyeuta a Najeriya duba da yanayin yadda rayuwar yara kanana take shiga hatsari idan suka kamu da Malaria.

Ana bada maganin lokocin da ruwa yafara sauka wato sakanin July da October domin itace lokocin akafi samun ciwon Malaria.

Note: 

1- Yaro mai zazzabi ba'a bashi
2- Yaron da yasha septrin ba'a bashi
3- ba'a hadashi da ko wacce irin maganin malaria.

2- Fansider (sulfadoxine-pyrimethamine) ita ma wata magani ne wanda ake bawa mata masu juna domin kariya daga cutar Malaria.

Ana bada maganin ne da zarar mace cikin ta yakai watanni hudu ( 16weeks), sannan abada 2nd dose a 20 - 22 weeks sannan a bada 3rd dose a 26 weeks ( akalla ana so a samu tazarar sati 4 sakanin ko wacce dose).

3- Akoi sauran magunguna da ake amfani da shi domin kariya daga malaria kamar su:
- Proguanil
- Doxycycline
- Daraprim
- da sauran su

4- Sauran hanyoyin sun hada da:

- Shiga gidan sauro.
- Daina Barin ciyawa cikin gida .
- kiyaye tsabtan muhalli da ta bayan gida dan kada sauro su samu wurin zama.
- Kwashe shara akai akai kada abari yataru a gida.

MAGANIN ZAZZABIN CIZON SAURA :

Maganin zazzabin cizon sauro shine duk sanda akayi rashin lafiya a ziyarci asibity domin a tabbatar da shi daganan likita yabada magani .

IDAN NAJI ZAZZABI ZAN IYA SHAN COATEM ???

A,a baza kasha ba sabida shan magani barkatai yana da illa , kuma an hana shan maganin nalaria batareda an aunaka an tabbata kanada malarian ba .

Mafita shine idan kaji wayennan alamomi kaje asibity mafi kusa da kai domin ba malaria kadai bane yake kawo wadannan alamomin ba .

Lafiya uwar jiki

YANZU-YANZU: Ademola Adeleke na jam'iyyar PDP ne ya lashe zaÉ“en gwamnan Jihar Osun da ke kudu maso yammacin Najeriya, kamar yadda hukumar zaÉ“e ta INEC ta bayyana.

PDP ta samu kuri'a 403,371, yayin da Gwamna Adegboyega Oyetola na APC ya samu 375, 027.

Shin kuna ganin jam'iyyar APC zata kai labari a zaÉ“en 2023 kuwa ?

APC SAI AN SAKE ZAMA
GABA DAYA SABON SHUGABAN JAMIYYAR NAN DA WASU GABNONIN JIHOHIN DUK SUN HARGITSA TA
IDANDE HAR PDP ZATAYI TASIRI A YANKI TINUBU TO AKWAI DAMUWA A 2023
ALAJI

Da Duminsa: Adeleke na PDP ya ba abokin karawarsa na APC tazarar sama da kuru'u 30,000 a sakamakon zaben kananan hukumomi 22 da aka gabatar a dakin tattara sakamakon zaben

A sakamakon zaben da aka gabatar a dakin tattara sakamakon zabe (Coalition Center) na kananan hukumomi 22 cikin 30 da aka gabatar, dan takarar jam'iyyar PDP na zaben gwamnan jihar Osun, Ademola Adeleke shi ke kan gaba a kan babban abokin karawarsa gwamma Gboyega Oyetola na APC, da tazarar kuru'u 31,749.

A sakamakon zaben Adeleke ya lashe zaben kananan hukumomi 14 inda Oyetol ya sami kananan hukumomi 8 kawo yanzun

A sakamakon zaben kananan hukumomi 22 din da hukumar zabe ta karba kawo yanzun, dan takarar PDP Adeleke yan da yawan kuru'u 295,023, inda Oyetola na APC ya sami kuru'u 263,274.

Sai dai tuni aka shigar da sakamakon zaben karamar hukumar Boripe wadda ita ce karamar hukumar da dan takarar APC ya fi ba dan takarar PDP tazara sosai, a inda kuma har yanzun ba a shigar da sakamakon zaben karamar hukumar Ede North a gaban cibiyar tattara sakamakon zaben, wadda ita kuma ita ce dan takarar PDP ya ba na APC gagarumar tazara sosai.

Kananan hukumomin da aka gabatar da sakamakon zabensu a hukumance gaban dakin tattara sakamakon zabe sune;

Boluwaduro, Ilesa East, Ila, Boripe, Odo-Otin, Ilesa West, Obokun, Orolu, Olorunda, Ife North, Osogbo, da Aiyedire.

Sauran kananan hukumomin sune; Atakunmosa West, Ifelodun, Ife Central, Irepositivedun, Oriade, Ayedade, Ola-Oluwa, Iwo, Ede South and Isokan.

Wata budurwa a Facebook ta ga hoton wani saurayi ya sha ado sai ta tura masa sako kamar haka:

BUDURWA: "Barka da warhaka "Hajji-Murtala". Wankanka ya birge ni. Kai kuwa dan wane gari ne?"

SAURAYI: "Ni dan garin Kaduna ne, amma Kano nake da zama a yanzu. Ke fa?"

BUDURWA: 'Yar Kano ce ni. Amma Murtala, wace irin harka kake yi a Kano?"

SAURAYI: "Bana harkar komai."

BUDURWA: "Ke nan dai student ne kai?"

SAURAYI: Eh, a da ke nan; amma tun ina yaro na gudu daga makaranta. Kawai a zaune nake a wani gida. Amma fa kin burgeni."

BUDURWA: "Na gode. Ni kuma cikin makon nan aka kawo kayan aurena. Amma fa ina tausaya ma, saboda rayuwa a garin da ba naku ba; kuma ga shi baka da aikin yi."

SAURAYI: "A'a, kwanan nan na so na fara wata harka da Miliyan N100 da mahaifina ya bar mun na gado."

BUDURWA: "Wow, ni kuma cikin makon nan wani abu ya hada ni da wanda a ke so ai mana aure, don yanzu kam bama tare."

SAURAYI: "Ikon Allah baya karewa. Ni kuma makon nan a ka yi gobara a gidan da nake; har da kudina a cikin dakin da wuta taci."

BUDURWA: "Wayyo...Allah Ya maida maka da alkairi, na tausaya ma. Ka cigaba da addu'a. Ni ma haka nayi har na samu muka dawo kamar bamu taba samun matsala ba ni da wanda zan aura."

SAURAYI: "To ai jakar da kudin ke ciki ba tayi komai ba, don ko sisi bai kone ba. Insha Allahu gobe harka kawai zan kama, in zama dan canji a Wafa."

BUDURWA: " Da kyau; Allah Ya rika. Amma ka san abun al'ajabi? Dazu da ka ga na jima ban yi magana ba, sako aka turo mun wai wanda zan aura ya rasu."

Gwamnan Jihar Borno, Babagana Umara Zulum ya sa an fitar da kuÉ—i har kimanin Naira miliyan 5 a matsayin tallafin karatu ga wani yaro É—an kimanin shekara 13 da ya kwafi gadar sama da ke cikin birnin Maiduguri fadar jihar Borno. 

An gabatar da cekin kuÉ—in da gwamnan ya amince da shi ga wata makaranta mai zaman kan ta domin bayar da tallafin karatun ga Musa Sani, wani yaro É—an jihar ta Borno mai shekaru 13 da haihuwa wanda ya yi amfani da taÉ“o wajen kwaikwayar gada ta farko da Gwamnatin jihar ta yi a shatatalen Custom Roundabout a birnin Maiduguri.

An dai biya waÉ—annan makuÉ—an kuÉ—aÉ—en ne ga makarantar 'Golden Olive Academy' da ke cikin Maiduguri, domin É—aukar nauyin karatun Musa tun daga matakin aji 4 na furamare da ya ke a yanzu har zuwa kammala babbar makarantar Sakandare.

Musa wadda É—an unguwar Gwange ne da ke cikin garin Maiduguri, iyayen sa masu Æ™aramin Æ™arfi ne da ke rayuwa ta ba yabo ba fallasa. 

Ya fara makarantar furamaren sa ne a wata makarantar al'umma ta Gwange, in da har ya kai aji 3 kamin Hukumar Gudanarwar kamfanin gine-gine na Ronches su É—auki nauyin karatun sa a watannin baya ta hanyar mayar da shi makarantar kuÉ—i da ya ke a yanzu, biyo bayan yaduwar hotunan sa a shafukan Sada Zumunta na zamani. 

Musa dai ya É—auki hankalin Gwamna Zulum ne bayan da ya yi amfani da taÉ“o wajen Æ™era irin gadar sama da gwamnatin Zulum É—in ta gina a Maiduguri wadda Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya Æ™addamar a Maiduguri, a watan Disambar 2021.

Gwamna Zulum wadda ya yi matuÆ™ar mamakin hazaÆ™ar yaron, ya haÉ—u da iyayen shi, hakan kuma ya ba shi damar ba shi tallafin karatu don Æ™arfafa shi ya bunkasa basirar sa.

Gwamnan dai ya umarci Asusun Tallafawa Ilimi na Jihar Borno (ETF) da aiwatar da wannan aiki na É—aukar nauyin karatun yaro Musa.

Shugabar Hukumar ETF Farfesa Hauwa Biu, ta gabatar da cekin Naira Miliyan Biyar da Dubu Ashirin da Tara (N5,029,000) na kuÉ—in da aka biya É—in ga makaranta mai zaman kan ta da Musa ke karatu a yanzu haka.

Farfesa Biu, ta godewa Gwamna Zulum bisa wannan Æ™oÆ™ari, sannan ta buÆ™aci yaron da ya maida hankali kan karatun sa, domin ya zama abun alfahari ga al'ummar jihar Borno da ma gwamnan.

Idan za a tuna dai, labari da hotunan gadar da Musa ya kwaikwaya ta fara bayyane a watannin baya a cikin wannan shekara ta 2022 a sahar Facebook wadda shafukan jaridun yanar gizo suka fara yaÉ—awa. Kuma bayan da ya Æ™era ta a gidan su, mahaifiyar sa ta rushe ta a dalilin cika mata gida da cincirindon yara su ke yi don kallo. Kamin daga bisani kamfanin da ya gina ainahin gadar da Musa ya kwaikwaya, wato Ronches Construction Company LTD ya ga wannan bajinta ta sa, ya kuma karrama shi tare da É—aukar nauyin karatun na shi.

MAGANI KYAUTA DAGA SHUGABAN KARAMAR HUKUMAR BAKORI HON.ALI MAMMAN BAKORI MAICHITTA

Wasu Daga cikin 'Yan majalissun Kansilolin Karamar Hukumar Bakori sun tantance magunguna da suka sahalewa Gwamnatin Karamar Hukumar Bakori ta Samar ga wasu cibiyoyin kiwon lafiya Na Sha-Ka-Tafi Dake wasu yankuna Na Karamar Hukumar Bakori wadannan cibiyo sun hadar da (1)Marabar Danja Dake Yankin Bakori 'A' Wanda Hon. Jamilu Halilu Ke Wakilta, (2) Asibitin Sha-Ka-Tafi Na Tsiga Wanda Mataimakin Shugaban Karamar Hukumar Bakori Hon. Lamis Ibrahim ya tantance, (3) Sai Kuma Asibitin Sha-Ka-Tafi Na Garin Layin Kuka Wanda Kansila Mai wakiltar Mazabar Kabomo Hon. Rabi'u Sule Rabiu Aruwa Kabomo ya tantance.

Hon. Ali Mamman Bakori Maichitta Zababben shugaban Karamar Hukuma Bakori ya kirkiro wannan tsari Na Kai magunguna 'KYAUTA' a asibitocin Sha-Ka-Tafi Na Karamar Hukumar Bakori Ne domin rage matsalolin tagayyarar Al'ummah sanadiyyar Rashin Halin Samun magani idan lallura ta Rashin lafiya ta afku garesu. Kuma wannan tsari Na Samar da wadannan magunguna shine Kashi Na Farko Inda Kashi Na Biyu shima Zai zagaya sauran wadannan mazabu damuke Dasu.

Muna addu'a Allah madaukakin sarki yakarawa wannan jajirtaccen shugaba Namu kwarin guiwa domin cigaba da ayyukan arziki.

Wata budurwa a Facebook ta ga hoton wani saurayi ya sha ado sai ta tura masa sako kamar haka:

BUDURWA: "Barka da warhaka "Hajji-Murtala". Wankanka ya birge ni. Kai kuwa dan wane gari ne?"

SAURAYI: "Ni dan garin Kaduna ne, amma Kano nake da zama a yanzu. Ke fa?"

BUDURWA: 'Yar Kano ce ni. Amma Murtala, wace irin harka kake yi a Kano?"

SAURAYI: "Bana harkar komai."

BUDURWA: "Ke nan dai student ne kai?"

SAURAYI: Eh, a da ke nan; amma tun ina yaro na gudu daga makaranta. Kawai a zaune nake a wani gida. Amma fa kin burgeni."

BUDURWA: "Na gode. Ni kuma cikin makon nan aka kawo kayan aurena. Amma fa ina tausaya ma, saboda rayuwa a garin da ba naku ba; kuma ga shi baka da aikin yi."

SAURAYI: "A'a, kwanan nan na so na fara wata harka da Miliyan N100 da mahaifina ya bar mun na gado."

BUDURWA: "Wow, ni kuma cikin makon nan wani abu ya hada ni da wanda a ke so ai mana aure, don yanzu kam bama tare."

SAURAYI: "Ikon Allah baya karewa. Ni kuma makon nan a ka yi gobara a gidan da nake; har da kudina a cikin dakin da wuta taci."

BUDURWA: "Wayyo...Allah Ya maida maka da alkairi, na tausaya ma. Ka cigaba da addu'a. Ni ma haka nayi har na samu muka dawo kamar bamu taba samun matsala ba ni da wanda zan aura."

SAURAYI: "To ai jakar da kudin ke ciki ba tayi komai ba, don ko sisi bai kone ba. Insha Allahu gobe harka kawai zan kama, in zama dan canji a Wafa."

BUDURWA: " Da kyau; Allah Ya rika. Amma ka san abun al'ajabi? Dazu da ka ga na jima ban yi magana ba, sako aka turo mun wai wanda zan aura ya rasu."

DAGA Anas Saminu Ja'en

Mafi yawan mutane sun fi son bin inda aka fi yawa akansa don gudun fuskantar kalu-bale. Shi yasa ma da yawan mutane suna gwada gaskiya ne da yawan masu bin wani abu. Idan suka ga mutane da yawa akan wannan hanyar sai su ma su bita ganinsu shi ne gaskiya. Wasu kuma ko sun san gaskiyar basa iya juyowa daga karyar don suna ganin zasu zama wararru a cikin mutane.

Wannan ne dalilin da yasa Imam Ali yace a duk inda kake kar ka kalli yawan mabiya, ka kalli gaskiya. Gara ka yiwa gaskiya biyayya ka rayu da kwarjini akan ka bi karya ka dawwama a kaskanci. Wannan kuma yayi daidai da abunda Allah ya rika yi mana nuni dashi a Qurani. Babu inda Allah ya yabi yawa sai dai ma ya kushe shi.

A wata ayar Allah yace mafi yawan mutane basu da sani (jahilai). A wata ayar yace mafi yawan mutane basu da hankali. A wata ayar yace mafi yawan mutane basu da zurfafa tunani. Kenan kadan ne a cikin mutane masu ilimi. Kadan ne a cikin mutane masu lafiyayyen hankali. Kadan ne a cikin mutane masu zurfafa tunani.

A karshe ma a wata ayar Allah cewa yayi in ka bi mafi yawan mutane zasu batar da kai ne daga kan tafarkin Allah. Ai ko a yanzu in aka ce da yawa za'a gwada addinai ba za'a yi musulunci ba kenan don Christians sun fi musulmi yawa a duniya. Christians sun 33% na duniya. Musulmi kuwa 25% ne gaba daya. So, shi yawa ko karanci ba abun dubawa bane. Ina gaskiya take? Nan ne abun kalla.

Ba zaka samarwa da ruhinka nutsuwa ba sai ka daina tsoron zama mai mabanbancin ra'ayi a cikin mutane. In dai kana da hujja da dalili akan abu ka tafi kanka tsaye kansa. Allah zai maka hisabi ne da abunda ka sani ka ki aikatawa ba aiki ko ra'ayin wasu ba. Wanda bai sani ba Allah zai iya masa uzurin rashin sanin matsawar yana kan neman sanin. Amma kai da ka sani baka da wani uzuri sai yiwa gaskiyar biyayya.

1. Mutane Masu É—auke da Hawan jinin da basa bashi kulawa data dace, musamman ace dama basa waiwayarsa ko kiyaye komi jira ake har sai randa mutum yaje asibiti akace jinin sa ya hau sannanne zai sha magani. Ka kuka da kanka Domin hawan jini lalata ma magudanar jini yake saboda karfin pressure.

4. Mutane masu teÉ“a wato Æ™iba (obese), wanda Body Mass Index wato BMI dinsu yakai ko yama ketare 30.

MATAKAN DAUKA DOMIN KARE KAI

A kwai hatsarurruka wato (risk factors) wanda a zahiri ba abinda zamu iya yi akansu saide mubarwa Allah ikonsa domin bazamu iya canza su ba kamar:-

Kasancewa Namiji, Kasancewa BaÆ™ar fata, Shekaru, da kuma tarihin matsalar a dangi, wannan ba abunda zamu iya yi akai saide fatan Allah yai mana da sauki.

Toh kuma kwai wanda zamu iya yin wani abu akansu wato mu kiyaye kanmu, kamar:

â—¾Sanya ido tare da shan maganin hawan jini kullum batare da É—aga kafa ballantana wasa ba, ko kuma bisa umarnin kwararren Medical doktor da yasan matsalarka fiye da kowa. domin de so ake jinin ya dena hawa kwata-kwata bawai ka jira sai ya hau kasha magani ba, sannan da yawa yana tashin yai mugun hawa baku sani ba koda kuwa cikin bacci ake, jini na hawa yayin bacci, kuma babu alamun da zaka ji na ya hau shyasa yake da hatsari, galaba bin stroke yafi faruwa da safe dama gefin asuba sanda kake kokarin farko wa bacci domin sannan jini yafi mugun hawa a jikin mutum. 

Muddin an lura da hawan jini ankarÉ“i larura yadda tazo mutum ya huta, iya kaci aita shan magani batare da wasa ba, za a rayu lafiya, sannan ya zamto ana kiyaye abincin da likita ya hana ci. Ina shawartar duk me hawan jini yai kokari ya mallaki abin gwajin yake dubawa kullum a gida. 

â—¾Masu ciwon sugar suma su kiyayi wasa da magani, su sanya ido sosai, su kuma kiyaye abin ci da sha. Sannan sui kokari su mallaki Glucometer suke duba sugar dinsu a gida akai akai

â—¾Masu cutar minshari kuma kuke amfani da ventilation mask tare da zuwa ku nemi shawarwarin likita domin ku dama ahaka ma numfashinku É—aukewa yake.

IMAMU AHMAD BN HANBAL R.H DA MAI GURASA.

'Imamu Ahmad bn hanbal ya yanke shawarar kwana awani masallaci sai mai gadin masallacin yaki amince masa, imamu bn hanbal yayi 'iya kokarinsa akan me gadin ya amince amma yaki amince mai.

Lokacin da imam ibn hanbal yadebe tsammanin cewa mai gadi zai amince masa, sai ya yanke shawarar kwana awurin da yake a tsaye, shi kuma mai gadin yatafi nesa da masallacin.

Wani me gurasa yana kallon duk abinda ke faruwa, amma baisan cewa wannan imamu Ahmad bn hanbal bane, sai yace tunda yahana ka kwana a masallaci zo ka kwana tare dani.

Sai kuwa 'imamu Ahmad yabi mai gurasa, me gurasa ya karrama shi ya mutunta shi. Bayan nan sai ya dakko kullun gurasarsa, saidai lokacin aikin gurasa harshensa bai gushe ba istigfari kawai yakeyi.

'Imamu Ahmad bn hanbal yacika da mamakin wannan mai gurasa inda yaga lokaci mai tsawo wannan mai gurasa baya da niyyan daina istigfari.

Lokacin da safiya tayi sai imam yatambayi me gurasa menene sirrin wannan istigfari da kake tayi tsawon dare!? Sai mai gurasa yace wannan dabi'a tace kuma tazame min jiki kuma bazan daina taba har abada.

Sai 'imam bn hanbal yatambayi me gurasa, shin ka samu wani amfani a dalilin yasan istigfarinnan naka? Dukda ibn hanbal yasan cewa istigfari yana kawo alkhairai masu yawa da falala.

Saiko mai gurasa yayi rantsuwa cewa, wallahi bantaba yin addu'a ba face an karba min 'ita saidai addu'a kwaya daya, itace ganin imamu Ahmad bn hanbal.

Sai 'imam Ahmad bn hanbal yace masa, to ai nine 'imamu Ahmad bn hanbal, lallai Allah yaturo ni nanne don ya karba addu'anka.

BAMBANCIN MAGANIN GARGAJIYA DA MAGANIN ASIBITI. 
. 
MAGANIN GARGAJIYA: 
Magani ne na al'ada wanda aka gado iyaye da kakanni, saboda haka yadda aka gado shi haka ake amfani dashi, ba a fiya canja shi ba. 
. 
MAGANIN ASIBITI:
Magani ne wanda ake sarrafa shi ta hanyar bincike da karantar qwayar cuta da yadda za a hallakata. Akan
iya canja shi saboda su ma qwayoyin cutar sukan iya canjawa. 
. 
MAGANIN GARGAJIYA:
kowa zai iya hada shi kuma ya bayar ba tare da tabbacin ko yana da ilimin yin magani ko bashi dashi ba. 
. 
MAGANIN ASIBITI:
Mutane na musamman ne ke hada shi Kuma su bayar dashi. Kuma suna da lasisi na tabbacin sun iya
aikinsu. 
. 
MAGANIN GARGAJIYA: 
Baa fiya saka mishi qa'ida ba saboda masu yin shi da masu shan shi basu damu da qa'idar ba. 
. 
MAGANIN ASIBITI:
Yana da qa'idoji yadda ake amfani dashi. 
. 
MAGANIN GARGAJIYA: 
Ba a da tabbacin zai yi magani. Ana shan shi ne a matsayin za a jarraba. 
. 
MAGANIN ASIBITI:
Ana da tabbacin zaiyi magani (Duk da ba lallai yayi 100 bisa 100 ba).. Saboda kafin a fara amfani dashi sai da aka gwada aka tabbatar yana aiki. 
. 
MAGANIN GARGAJIYA: 
Yana rage qarfin alamar cuta ne (misali: zazzabi, kasala, zugi) amma baya warkar da cutar saboda shi kanshi mai hada maganin bai ma san qwayar cutar ba. 
. 
MAGANIN ASIBITI: 
Yana warkar da cuta ne tare da Alamominta (misali: malaria tare da Alamominta). 
. 
MAGANIN GARGAJIYA: 
Yawancin masu sha suna sha ne Saboda yafi araha, basa so su fitar da kudi su je asibiti. 
. 
MAGANIN ASIBITI: 
Suna sha ne saboda sun tabbatar yafi inganci. 
. 
MAGANIN GARGAJIYA: 
Ba a tsabtace shi yayin hadawa.. Shi kanshi zai iya haifar da cuta da rashin lafiya. 
. 
MAGANIN ASIBITI:
A tsabtace ake hada shi, sannan in dai an sha a bisa qa'ida ba zai haifar da wata matsala ba. 
. 
MAGANIN GARGAJIYA:
masu bayar dashi su kan fadi abun da ba haka ba (misali: su ce magani daya yana maganin cututtuka 99) alhalin Kowacce cuta abun da yake kawo ta daban. 
. 
MAGANIN ASIBITI: 
Kowacce cuta tana da maganinta daban, Kuma sai da aka karanci qwayar. 
.

CIKAKKEN MAYAUDARI SHINE WANDA YAKE YAUDARAR KANSA:

Hakika duk wanda yake zaton jam'iyar PDP zata iya cin zaben 2023 a jihar Zamfara babu shakka yana yaudarar kansa ne, domin a fadin kananan hukumomi sha hudu dake jihar Zamfara babu inda jam'iyar PDP ke da hazikan mutanen da zasu iya fito na fito da gwamnati, ballai su iya yakar ta a siyasance.

Yau idan akace gwamnatin jihar Zamfara, ba gwamna Matawalle kadai ake nufi ba, abun ya kumshi har da su tsohon gwamna Abdul-azeez Yari, Sen. Yarima, H-E. Mamuda (Mas), Sen. Marafa, Amb. Bashir Yuguda, Hon. Aminu Jaji, Sen. Sen Sahabi Yau Sen. Lawali Hassan Anka da sauran jiga jigan gwamnati domin duka a karkashin inuwar jam'iyar APC suke.

Haka zalika ma'anar kalmar (Yaki) a gidan siyasa bata nufin cin mutunci koh cin zarafi ballai ayi maganar sare sare, kone kone koh kuma wasu ayukka na ta'addanci. Ita wannan kalma ta (yaki) a gidan siyasa tana nufin gasar juna a tsakanin wadanda ke mulki da wadanda ke neman mulki ta hanyar sharewa talakawa hawayen su a duk sanda suka koka.

Ku kasance dani a nan gaba kadan domin jin yadda ta kaya a hasashena na cin nasarar Jam'iyar APC a zaben 2023.

Daga cikin matsalolin da ke haddasa wannan matsala akwai matsalar nan da a ke cewa "positivesitional Plagiocephaly" a turancin likita. Sakamakon Æ™oÆ™on kan jariarai bai gama yin Æ™wari sosai ba, wannan ya sa Æ™oÆ™on kansu ke da haÉ—arin yin kusurwa.

Daga cikin alamun sun haÉ—a da:

1] Molewa, taÉ“ewa ko kusurwar Æ™oÆ™on kai daga Æ™eya.

2] SaÉ“awar kunnuwa; ta yadda idan aka kalli kan yaro ko jariri daga sama za a ga kunnen É“arin da ke da matsalar ya zarce gaba zuwa fuska fiye da na É—aya É“arin.

Wannan matsala an kasa ta zuwa : Mafi Æ™aranci, matsakaiciya da kuma mafi tsanani.

Amma wannan matsala ba ta shafar aiki ko lafiyar Æ™waÆ™walwa, sai dai matsalar sifar Æ™oÆ™on kan kawai.

Abubuwan da ke iya janyo wannan matsala:

Bayan kwantar da jarirai tsawon lokaci a bayansu ba tare da ana jujjuya su zuwa hagu, dama ko rib-da-ciki ba.

Akwai abubuwan da ke Æ™ara haÉ—arin samun molewar kan jarirai kamar haka:

1] Æ˜arancin ruwan mahaifa yayin goyon ciki.

2] Æ˜uncin Æ™ugu ko mahaifar uwa.

3] ÆŠaukar cikin tagwaye, ko fiye da haka.

4] ÆŠaurewar tsokokin gefen wuya da ke kawo noÆ™ewar wuyan jariri zuwa gefe guda wato "muscular torticolis", da dai sauransu.

Yadda za a magance faruwa matsalar.

Abin yi shi ne da zarar an haifi jariri to lalle ne a É—inga lura da yanayin kwanciyarsa. 

Misali:

a] A riÆ™a zuya shi daga kwanciyar rigingine zuwa kwanciyar [magirbi] gefe; wato hagu ko dama ta hanyar tokarewa da naÉ—aÉ—É—en tawul ko zani. Ko kuma kwanciyar rib-da-ciki, amma a yayin kwanciyar rib-da-ciki akwai buÆ™atar Æ™ara lura da kuma sanya ido sosai. Domin kada hancin jariri ya toshe ya hana shi numfashi.

Idan iyaye ko ungozomomi za su lura da waÉ—annan shawarwari za a rage afkuwar wannan matsala.

Sai dai, idan kan yaro ya wuce fiye da watanni uku bai koma daidai ba, ko kuma akwai jinkirin matakan girma, to akwai buÆ™atar zuwa asibiti domin ganin likita.

Bugu da Æ™ari, idan kin lura jaririnki ba ya son kallo ko juya kansa zuwa wani É“angare, ko kuma idan aka yi Æ™oÆ™arin juya fuskarsa zuwa wani É“angare yana kukan ciwo, to akwai buÆ™atar ganin likitan fisiyo.

SUNAYEN HAUSAWA DA MA'ANONINSU.

TANKO: Yaron da aka haifa bayan mata.
KANDE: Yarinyar da aka haifa bayan maza.
KILISHI: Yarinyar da aka fara haifa babanta ya samu sarauta.
BARAU: Yaron da aka haifa ya rayu, amma an haifa wasu kafin shi ba su rayu ba.
SAMBO: Yaron da aka haifa bayan maza da yawa.
TALLE: Yaron/yarinya da mahaifiya ta rasu tana gama haihuwa.
AUDI: Yaron/yarinyar da mahaifi ya rasu kafin a haife. MIJIN-YAWA: Yaron da aka haifa dukkanin kakannin sa suna raye.
DIKKO: Yaron da aka fara haifa (Dan fari).
SHEKARAU: Yaron da ya shekara a ciki
MAIWADA: Yaron da aka haifa iyaye suna cikin wadata.
GAMBO: Yaron/yarinyar da aka haifa bayan tagwaye.
CINDO: Yaron/yarinyar da aka haifa da yatsu shida.
MARKA: Yarinyar da aka haifa lokacin marka-marka.
ALHAJI: Yaron da aka haifa lokacin aikin haji.
AZUMI: Yaron/yarinyar da aka haifa lokacin azumi.
SARKI: Yaron da aka sama sunan sarki.

Æ³an Bindiga Sun Kashe Matashi A Katsina

A Daren Jiya Asabar Æ³an Bindiga Dauke Da Bindigogi Suka Kai Hari A Garin Tsagero Dake Cikin Karamar Hukumar Rimi A Jihar Katsina Inda Suka Hallaka Wani Matashi Har Lahira, Badamasi Rabe, Wanda Aka Fi Sani Da (Bosi) Har Lahira.

Majiyar RARIYA Ta Shaida Mata Cewa Æ³an Bindigar Sun Shigo Cikin Garin Tsagero Da Misalin Karfe 2:30 Na Daren Jiya Asabar, Bayan Sun Kashe Bosi Dake Sana'ar Kayan Gwari, Sun Kuma Tafi Da Wata Kurkura A Garin.

Tuni Dai Aka Yi Jana'izarsa Kamar Yadda Addinin Musulunci Ya Tanada A Garin Tsagero Dake Karamar Hukumar Rimi A Jihar Katsina Da Safiyar Yau Lahadi.

Allah Ya Jikansa Da Rahama!

Daga Jamilu Dabawa, Katsina

Tsibirin Bermuda ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡² Triangle.

Triangle na Bermuda, wanda kuma aka fi sani da kusuwar Iblis, labari ne wanda aka mayar da hankali kan wani yanki a yammacin yankin Arewacin Tekun Atlantika inda aka ce wasu jiragen sama da jiragen ruwa sun bace a cikin yanayi na ban mamaki.

Duk da cewa duniya da dama da abubuwan mamaki ke faruwa a cikinsu ba tare da Dan Adam ya fahimci musabbabansu ba, Tsibirin Bamuda (Bermuda Island ko Bermuda Triangle) ne kadai ya fi shahara a bakunan mutane sanadiyyar haka. Wannan shahara ta samo asali ne daga nahiyar Kudancin Amurka (South America), a hankali labarin ya ci gaba da yaduwa zuwa sauran kasashen duniya.

Manyan ababen mamakin da ake ikirarin suna faruwa a muhallin tekun da wannan tsibiri yake sun hada da bacewar jiragen sama masu dauke da fasinjoji â€˜yan kasuwa ko na soji da jiragen ruwa manya da kanana da na shawagi. Idan suka bace a galibin lokuta, ba a ganin buraguzan jirgin balle a kaddamar da bincike kan dalilan da suka haddasa faruwar hadarin.

Wannan alâ€™amari abin alâ€™ajabi, a cewar masu bayar da labarai, bai tsaya a bacewar jirage tare da rashin ganin buraguzansu kadai ba, har da wasu labarai masu caza kwakwalwa kan irin yanayin da tekun ke kasancewa na launi da kuma dulmuya a wasu lokutan, ko kuma wasu irin dabiâ€™u da ake ikirarin gira-gizan da ke saman teku ke shiga, a yayin aukuwar hadarurrukan da suka fara faruwa shekaru kusan 200 da suka gabata.

Ire-iren wadannan labarai sun samo asali ne daga irin jawaban da masu lura da naâ€™urar filin saukan jiragen sama da ke tsibirin ke bayarwa. Ko wadanda ake tarawa wajen binciken da hukumomin gwamnatin Amurka da ke lura da ire-iren wadannan hadarurruka ke yi. Da wannan, marubuta suka sa wa wannan muhalli suna: â€˜The Bermuda Triangleâ€™ (Kusurwar Bamuda), ko kuma The Debilâ€™s Triangle (Kusurwar Shedan).

A halin yanzu da dama cikin wadanda suka taba jin labarin wannan bigire na Bamuda, sun yarda cewa wani wuri ne mai cike da almara, kamar yadda galibin turawa masu bincike suka fada. Da kuma cewa babu wanda ya san abin da ke haddasa wannan alâ€™amari, sai Allah (ga wadanda suka yarda da Allah kenan), ko kuma dabiâ€™a ta shuâ€™umcin wurin.

Wasu suka ce aljanu ne a wurin. Wasu suka ce akwai wasu halittu ne na musamman da a harshen Turanci ake kira Aliens, masu haddasa hakan. Wasu suka ce a a, irin yanayin wurin ne kawai. Da dai sauran raâ€™ayoyi masu kama da haka. Shin, meye gaskiyar wadannan zace-zace da ake ta yi kan wannan tsibiri, wane irin bincike aka yi wajen gano hakan?

Jiragen ruwa da na sama guda nawa suka bace a wannan mahalli? Rayuka nawa suka salwanta? Wa da wa suka yi rubuce- rubuce kan haka cikin Malam Kimiya da masu shaâ€™awar rubutu kan alâ€™amuran mamaki a duniya? Meye raâ€™ayin nazarin da Malaman Kimiyya suka yi kan dalilin faruwar wadannan abubuwan mamaki? Shin, wai ma tukun, a duniya akwai wasu wurare ne masu irin wannan dabiâ€™a, ko dai tsibirin Bamuda ne kadai?

Idan har akwai, to me ya sa na tsibirin Bamuda ya sha bamban, ya shahara fiye da sauran a duniya? Wadannan, da ma wasu tambayoyi, za mu samu amsoshinsu cikin makonni masu zuwa in Allah Ya yarda.

A Ina Tsibirin Yake?

Kafin mu yi nisa, asalin tsibirin Bamuda, watau Bermuda Islands, yana gab da tsakiyar tekun Atlantika ne, Arewa da Jihar Fulorida da ke kasar Amurka. Kuma duk da cewa ana danganta wannan wuri ko kusurwa da tsibirin Bamuda, sai dai ba a wannan tsibiri kadai wannan kusurwa yake ba. Kusurwar Bamuda wani wuri ne da ya hada manyan gabar tekunan kasashe guda uku da ke nahiyar Arewaci da kuma Kudancin Amurka.

Kusurwar farko ta faro ne daga gabar Fulorida ta kasar Amurka, ta zarce zuwa gabar babban tsibirin Puerto Rico da ke Yamma maso- Kudu da gabar Fulorida. Daga tsibirin Puerto Rico kuma kusurwar ta cilla Arewa, inda ta tike a gabar tsibirin Bamuda da ke kusa da tsakiyar tekun Atlantika. Wannan wuri ko mahalllin teku da ke tsakanin wadannan gabobi guda uku, shi ake kira The Bermuda Triangle, ko The Debilâ€™s Triangle.

An danganta wannan kusurwa da tsibirin Bamuda ne saboda a nan ya tike, kuma galibin ababen hawa kamar su jiragen sama da na ruwa wadanda ake amfani da su wajen kasuwanci da shawagi da atisayen soji a wannan nahiya, duk a can suke hallaka kafin su komo inda suka taso. Ko kuma daga can suke wucewa zuwa wasu nahiyoyin, irin su Turai da Arewacin Amurka da kasashen Asiya.

Wannan kusurwa ta Bamuda ita ce bigiren da jiragen sama da na ruwa ke shawagi fiye da kowane wuri a duniya. An kiyasta cewa akalla akan samu sawun jiragen sama daga wannan nahiya zuwa kasashen turai da sauran nahiyoyi, sama da 50,000 a shekara. Bayan haka, akwai jiragen ruwa da na kasuwanci da na shawagi ko yawon bude ido, da kuma jiragen saman atisayen soji da Hukumar Sojin Amurka ke turawa suna shawagi, watau kai-komo don yin atisaye.

Har wa yau, akwai masu shawagi da kananan kwale-kwalen shakatawa wadanda a harshen turanci ake kira â€˜Pleasure Boatsâ€™, da kuma jiragen ruwan tsere da ake kira â€˜Yatchersâ€™. Bayan haka, akwai filayen saukar jiragen sama a dukkan kusurwoyin nan uku, tare da tashar jiragen ruwa masu karbar manya da kananan jiragen da ke shawagi a wannan wuri.

Sannan kuma sai miliyoyin masu zuwa yawon bude ido daga sauran kasashen duniya, musamman ma Amurka da Turai. A takaice dai, wannan wuri rayayyen wuri ne da sawun jirgin ruwa da na sama da na masu ziyara ba su daukewa; daga shekara zuwa shekara.

Zai dace mai karatu ya rike wannan karatu kan yawan zirga-zirgar da ake yi a wannan wuri, domin zai taimaka masa wajen karba ko rashin karbar dalilan da wasu marubuta suka bayar wajen yanke hukuncinsu na karshe. Yaushe Abin Ya Fara? Wannan kusurwa da ake wa take da â€œKusurwar Shedanâ€ â€“ ko Debilâ€™s Triangle â€“ ya fara cin jiragen sama da na ruwa ne shekaru kusan dari biyu da suka gabata, duk da cewa ba a fara fahimtar hakan ba sai wajen shekaru casaâ€™in zuwa dari da suka wuce.

Jiragen ruwa da kuma na sama da dama sun halaka sun bace bat sakamakon kokarin ratsawa ta wannan wuri na bamuda. Wata mujalla da ake kira da suna â€œnational geographic magazineâ€™â€™ ta bayyana wannan yanki na bamuda a matsayin alamari mafi girma kuma mafi rikitarwa da aka kasa fahimtarsa a wannan zamani.

Akwai jirage da dama da suka halaka a wannan wuri, misali a ranar 8 ga watan janairun 1962 wani jirgin sama da ake kira da suna aerial tanker kirar KB50 ya bace bat sakamakon bi ta sararin samaniyar wannan wuri, an kuma nemeshi ko sama ko kasa har yau ba'aji duriyarsa ba.

Duk da cewa a wancan lokaci kafafen yada labarai da dama sun sun bayar da rahoton cewa wannan jirgi ya yi hadari ne a sama sannan kuma ya fado ya nutse a cikin teku. Sai dai sakamakon cikakken bincike da aka gudanar ya musanta wadannan rahotanni na kafafen yada labarai, domin kuwa babu wata hujja daya tilo da ta tabbatar da hakan. Kuma wannan ba ita ce bacewa ta farko kuma ta ban alajabi ba, domin kuwa tun kafin wannan ta auku akwai wadansu jiragen guda biyu da suka hadu da irin wannan garari.

Na farko dai shine jirgi mai dauke da fasinja, babban jirgi mai lamba 19, wannan jirgi dai ya bace bat, sakamakon kokarin ratsawa ta sararin samaniyar wannan wuri na bamuda a shekarar 1945. sai kuma jirgi na biyu kirar NC16002 mai dauke da kungiyar maaikatan jirgi wanda shi kuma ya hadu da nasa gararin bacewara shekarar 1948.

Daga nan ne aka fara danganta hadarurrukan da suka gabata da wannan yanayi mai ban mamaki. Kamar yadda bayanai suka gabata, wannan kusurwa ta Bamuda ta yi kaurin suna ne wajen hadararruka masu ban mamaki, inda bayan hadarin ake rasa abin da ya haddasa shi, ko kuma a ma kasa samun buraguzai ko gawawwakin wadanda suka rasa rayukansu da ma na jirgin gaba daya.

Babu yanayin hazo mai firgitarwa, babu ruwan sama, babu alamar mahaukaciyar guguwa mai yi wa jiragen ruwa dibar karan mahaukaciya, amma sai kawai a ji hanyar sadarwar ta yanke. Mafi shahara daga cikin abubuwan mamaki da suka faru a wannan kusurwa shi ne hadarin tawagan jiragen kai hari da darkake abokan gaba na kasar Amurka masu suna Flight 19, wadanda hukumar sojin sama na kasar Amurka ta aika don yin shawagi a wannan kusurwa cikin shekarar 1945.

Duk da cewa ana lura da tafiyar wannan tawaga na jirage ta hanyar naâ€™ura hangen nesa saâ€™adda suka baro cikin kasar Amurka, sai dai cikin lokaci guda kawai aka neme su aka rasa. Da aka nemi sadarwa da shugaban tawagar, sai ya ce: â€œA yanzu muna shiga wani irin farin ruwa neâ€¦alâ€™amura sun fara lalacewa. Bamu san inda muke ba a halin yanzuâ€¦ruwan kore neâ€¦a a, fari ne!â€, sai sadarwa ta yanke a tsakanin masu lura da naâ€™urar da wannan shugaban tawaga.

Bayan faruwar wannan lamari, an yi ta bincike cikin teku ba a samu buraguzan wadannan jirage ba balle wadanda suke ciki. Babu wanda ke da wani bayani gamsasshe kan abin da ya haddasa wannan hadari har zuwa yau, balle bayani kan hakikanin wurin da abin ya auku.

A lokacin da aka tura wata tawaga ta manema jirage, da suka isa wurin da naâ€™urar ta sanar da faduwarsu, babu abin da aka gani a wurin. Daga nan aka ci gaba da samun ire-iren wadannan hadarurruka masu ban mamaki da alâ€™ajabi. Wasu a kan samu bayanai kan batansu, bayan tsawon lokaci; wasu kuma ko alama ba a samu, sai dai kawai a hakura.

Akwai dai hasashe na mutane daga fannonin ilimi daban daban dangane da kokarin bayyana abinda ya ke a wannan wuri na bamuda.

Misali masana ilimin sinadarin da ke janyo abu daga sama zuwa kasa suna ganin cewa a wannan yankin na bamuda akwai wani mayan karfe na musamman wanda yake da karfin fizgo duk wani abu da ya yi kokarin ratsa wannan wuri komai girmansa kuwa. Kuma dazarar ya zuko shi tun da yake a tsakiyar teku ne to shi kenan shifa halaka ta gabbata a gareshi, kuma ba zaâ€™a Kara jin duriyarsa ba.

Su kuwa masana ilimin falaki, suna ganin cewa, wannan wuri na bamuda da ke a cikin teku, wata kafa ce ta zuwa sauran duniyoyi, sabodahaka duk abin da ya bi ta cikinsa wato kamar dai ya tafi wata Duniyar ne ba ta Dan-adam ba .

Su kuma masana ilimin falsafa a nasu raayin, wurin na bamuda wata katafariyar fadar shedan ce, inda duk abin da yayi kokarin tsallakata zai halaka.

Wannan alâ€™amari dai ba wai magana ce ta hadari ko tsautsayi ba magana ce ta bacewa bat a nemi abu ko sama ko kasa a rasa, saboda haka kenan batun sanin kididdigar yawan mutanen da suka halaka ko kuma yawan dukiyoyin da aka rasa abu ne mawuyaci.

Sai dai kawai maganar dai a nan itace cewar, wannan wuri da ake kira da suna Bamuda triangle gaskiya ne akwai shi, amma har yanzu Duniya bata tabbatar da ainihin ko menene a wannan wuriba. ZAN CI GABA INSHAALLAH.

Shin mai girma Gwamna nada labarin aikin da ake yi na TITI a wannan unguwa, an tauye maâ€™auni kuma babu hanyar ruwa. 

Mutanen wannan unguwa, sun hada kan su, sun je wajen Commissioner, amma dudda cewa sun gamsar da shi cewa wannan Titi da ake yi, an tauye maâ€™auni kuma Wannan Titi na bukatar hanyar ruwa, dudda haka masu aiki sun runtse Idanun su, sun cigaba da aiki yadda suka tsara! 

Mutanen wannan unguwa sun kara qoqari, amma maâ€™aitan sun dage da nuna masu cewa kuddin da aka ba sune ba su isa aikin da ya dace! 

BUKATA.
Maigirma Gwamna, mutanen wannan unguwa na neman alfarma ka, da ka dube su da idon rahama, a fidda masu hanyar ruwa a wannan aiki da ake yi, duba da irin barnar ruwa da zata iya samuwa a wannan unguwa idan baâ€™a yi masu hanyar ruwa ba.

A duk lokacin da ta jefa Æ™afarta cikin aji, yaran da ke hargowa kan É—auke wuta, su yi tsit kamar ruwa ya ci su! Ba komai suke tsoro ba irin banbamin faÉ—anta da kwakwazo, sai ka ce kaza mai sabuwar Æ™yanÆ™yasa. 

A cikin ajin nan babu yaron da Malama Tina ta fi kyara kamar Audu, saboda rashin Æ™oÆ™arinsa. Ran nan da ta ba su aiki sai ya samu sifili. Ta kuwa hau shi da masifa har ta daddangware shi tana cewa, "ba ka da wani amfani." Tun daga ranar, Audu ya É—auke Æ™afarsa daga makarantar.

Bayan wasu shekaru Malama ta yi ritaya, aka fid da ita daga gidan makaranta, ta tattara 'yan komatsanta ta koma tsohon gidanta. Ruwan farko na damina ya tabbatar mata da gidan nan na buÆ™atar kwaskwarima. Ta nemo masu gyara. Injiniya ya zagaya gidan nan ko'ina, ya ce mata, "Madam, wannan gida ai ya cika lalacewa, abin da na ga ya fi shi ne, a rushe shi a sake sabo, a yadda yake yanzu, ba shi da wani amfani."

Ita matsalar Addini shine akwai wuyar fahimta ga shi mai ikrarin da,awar addinin da kuma wanda sukayi imani da addinin .Abinda yasa nce haka shine,Dan Adam yana rayuwa a farfajiya kala biyu, Dan Adam yana rayuwa a zahiri, a inda yake mu,amala da kowa da komai wato Reality sphere. Wannan farfajiyar ta reality fafajiyace da abubuwa masu rai suka tsinci kansu a ciki, bamuda wani iko akan farfajiyr sai kwaskwarima da muke iya yi mata ta hanyar kirkire kirkire ta hikimar science da technology. 
Haka kuma Dan adam yana rayuwa a farfajiya ta Tunani da kirkirarren labari. Da Tatsuniyoyi kala kala, wato duniyar Fictional reality, duniyar daya kirkirawa kansa a cikin kwakwalwarsa.
Ita duniyar tatsuniya baki dayanta batada tushe ko mazauna a duniyar Zahiri, amma kuma tasirinta yana juya duniyar zahiri. Abin nufi shine kowa yasan harkar rayuwar yan Adam bata wuce ta neman abinci, abinsha, gurin zama, kariya daga masifu da makiya da abokan jima,i (sex partners).Tow amma saboda tasirin duniyar Badili ta Tatsuniya sai yakasance tatsuniyoyin Ubangijjai kamar su Allah,Jesu daTsumburbura da Sango suna fasalta yadda Dan Adam zai zauna a duniya. Haka kuma farfajiyar Tatsuniyoyin tana juya rayuwarmu da daura wa mutane dokoki akan zama cikin Zahiri. Misali , Shariar Allah ta hana soyayyar tsakanin mutane ko cin naman Alade inda a zahiri aikata abin da Shariar ta hana bashida wani laifi. Kaga kenan tatsuniya ta yi illa akan Zahiri abinda muke aikatawa. 

kowa yasan babu shaidar akwai Allah amma kuma kusan kowa yana bin dokar Allah wadda wani Dan Adam kamarsa ya kirkiro ko ya rubuta a littfi da sunnan Littafin Allah. 
Babu masifa da kwakwalwar dan Adam take fama da ita kamarta gwamutsa Reality wato Zahiri da Fiction na Badili. 
Misali, a Tauhidin Musulunci wanda yake a fannin ilmin Badili ko Realm of Fictional Reality an lissafa Siffofin Allah Madaukakin sarki wanda imanin mutun baya tabbata sai yayi imani dasu Dari bisa Dari. Ance, Allah mai Jinkai ne, Allah masanine, Allah baya kuskure, Allah mahaliccine etc.

Amma a tsarin tunani na Zahiri scientific realty Mun san cewar Allah bashi da hannu a Halitta kuma bashida siffa saboda Allah kirkirace ta tunanin Dan Adam kawai. Allah fictional character, haka Jesus da Mala,iku da Ajannu da Lahira da Fifi Dallo duk labarai neda basuda gurbi a farfajiyar reality. Basu da siffa ko iko sai wanda mutane suka lika masu kuma suka koyawa mabiya imani dasu. 
Mukan ce nature ce take wasanta da mu kuma ita nature gwamatsuwar abubuwa ne cikin lokaci wanda muka fara karatunta a Evolutionary Theory, Bigbang theory da sauran Physical sciences.

Karamin Misalin akan yadda masu addini.suke gwara kansu wajen hada Reality da Fiction shine shin akan maganar samuwar Mata -Maza. Shin yaya akayi Allah ya halicci Mata -Maza? Ina adalci ko jinkai ga matashi da Allah ya halitta da Azzakari kuma da Farji a jikinsa? Ina hikima a wannan rauni na Halitta? Ina dalilin yiwa mutun farji wanda bazai iya haihuwa dashiba? da azzakarin da bazai iya aiki dashiba?

Abin kula da tunani anan shine: A tawhidi an lissafa siffofin Allah wanda babu tantama akansu, amma sai Gashi a Zahiri munata cin karo da abubuwa da ale alakantawa ga Allah wanda suke cike da rauni da cin karo da Siffofinsa kwarara.

Yanzu don Allah menene hikima ko adalci a Girgizar kasar da akayi a Afghanistan inda talauchi da yaki domin daukaka Addinin Allah ya zama babban aikin Musulmin kasar?
Menene Hikima ko jinkai akan Hatsarinda ya faru a ka,abah shekarun baya , inda karfe ya fado akan masu Tawafi a sakon Allah cikin mummunar yanayi?
Babu Badili, kuma babu Allah, ko siffofinsa, domin Tatsuniyane. Amma akwai ZAHIRI wanda ya kamata mu dukufa wajen karantarsa ta hanyar Science.

zunzurutun kudi har dala million dari bakwai da hamsin 750M$ aka ware wa wannan shiri, wanda ko wacce Jaha za a bata dala million ashirin 20M$, abuja kuma a bata dala million sha biyar 15M$ sai kuma shi wannan shiri na NG-CARES shi ma an ware masa dala million shabiyar wato 15millions dollar's. 

Wannan shiri zai taimaka wurin rage radadin tallauci, rashin aikin yi da dai sauransu a tsakanin al'umma. Sannan ba wai iya daidaikun mutane wannan shirin ya kunsa ba, har da kananun masana yantu. Don haka in kana da sana'a ko masana'anta da take da rajista da gwamnati kamar CAC TAX SEMEDAN da dai sauran su, za ka iya cin gajiyan wannan shiri.

Kamar dai shirin survival fund ne, amma wannan ban da ma'aikatan cikin kamfani amma kima su ma za su iya applying a matsayin individual.

Kowane state da nasu, don haka kowa zai duba link na jiharsa. Wasu states din positivertal suka bude domin cikewa, kowa dai da irin nasu. Wasu form suke bayarwa kuma form din kyautane, kowa dai da irin nasu. Don haka kowa ya binciki sai dai wasu jahohin sun rufe .

MALTINA DA PEAK MILK BASA KARA JINI A JIKIN DAN ADAM:

Diyawa za kaga a kasar hausa a lokocin da aka tabbatar da mutum yana karancin jini, ko tana dauke da juna biyu ko ta Haihu ta zubar da jini diyawa sai kaji ance a bashi malti na da peak milk, a fahimtar mutanen mu zai kara jini. 

Gaskiyar magana babu alaka sakanin karin jini da Maltina da Peak milk, sabida wake kwara daya yafi Maltina da Peak milk wajen samar da sinadaran kara jini.

Idan kun duba jikin gwamgwanin peak milk za kuga babu sidaran karin jini a ciki ( not rich in iron) Haka Maltina ma Babu sinadaran kara jini a ciki.

Tambaya anan shine ta Ina Maltina da Peak milk yazama maganin karin jini ?

Amsa: wannan kawai al'adace ta mutanen mu ba tareda sanin abun ba.

Maltina na dauke da sinadaran:
- Calories
- Carbohydrates
- Fat 
- Vitamin
- No Iron

Peak milk na dauke da sinadaran: 
- Fat
- Carbohydrates
- Protein
- Salt
- Vitamin A and D
- No Iron

Jikin dan Adam yana samar da jini da kansa, shi jini yana bukatar sinadaran iron daga abincin da muke amfani.

Daga karshe ina bada shawara garemu kudin da muke kashe wajen Maltina da Peak milk domin kara mana jini, muyi amfani da su wajen siyan abinci masu dauke da iron kamar :

- Wake
- kifi
- Nama
- kwai 
- Kaza
- Fara
- zogole 
- Cashew
- cavage
- salat
- Spinach
- da sauran su.

Allah ya kara mana lafiya gabaki daya.

NA RUBUTAWA GWAMNATIN KANO DA TA ZO TA YANKI WANI BANGARE NA MAKARANTAR NAN TA SAYAR DOMIN A YI AMFANI DA KUDIN WAJEN GYARA TA. SAMA SA SHEKARA 18 KENAN TAKE CIKIN WANNAN HALIN - Inji Shugaban Makarantar Kwakwaci.

Ga kadan daga cikin abubuwan daya fadi:

1. Barayi sun rushe Aji guda Domin zare Manyan Karafunan dake tsakiyar Ginin.

2. Sau biyu ana tsintar Gawa a cikin ajujuwan makarantar

3. Tazama wajen yin tsafi da kuma matattarar bata gari.

4. Ajujuwa 28 muke dasu amma 10 ne suke aiki

5. Bamu da mai gadi kuma ko akwai babu katanga.

6. Barayi sun 'daye rufin kwanon ajujuwan sun gudu dasu, hakan yasa ruwan sama ya lalata ajujuwan.

7. Mu da malamai kullun acikin fargaba muke domin barazanar da muke fuskanta acikin makarantar.

8. Bamu san adadin masu kwana cikin makarantar ba dakuma abinda suke aikatawa aciki

9. Samar da shuguna su kewaye makarantar shine mafita, kudin ayi mana gyare gyare dasu.

10. Ba mu isa mu ajiye ko rijista ba a cikin drawer sai an balle an sace.

MAGANIN KASUWA DA TALAUCHI IZAWAQA

MASU NEMAN ARZIKI GA ISMIN BUGU DAYA

(1) MAI NEMAN KUDI YA KARANTA IZAWAQA QAFA DAYA SAI YA KUMA JA IZAQAFA MA'ANA YA TASHI YA ZAGA GARI TO DAGA TASKAR ALLAH ZAI SAMU KUDI
WANAN NE KAWAI AKE KARANTAWA AMMA DUK RUBUTU NE

A RUBUTA IZAWAQA'ATIL'WAQI'A 3 
1 DAYA CIKAKKIYA
2 TA BIYU DA WASALI BA YAYA
3 TA UKU BABU YAYA BA WASALI
WANNAN AKE RUBUTAWA AKAN DUK BAYANIN QASA
Kuma sau daya ake rubutun a shekara kullum ruwa za ayi ta qarawa ga masu abinci ko sha

(2) MAI NOMA YA JIQA IRIN DA ZAI SHUKA A GONAR SA, IRI KO NA MENENE ANA IYA YI MASA SAI YAYI KWANA UKU SANNAN SAI A JUYE AJE A SHUKA TO WLH SAI KAYI MAMAKI BAZAKA IYA QIRGA YAWAN BUHUNAN DA ZA A SAMU A GONAR, A RUBUTA.

(3) MASU ABINCIN SIYARWA SU ZUBA RUBUTUN A RUWAN DAFA ABINCIN KO A MIYA, KO MASU SHAYI. KAI KOMA WANE IRIN NAU'IN ABINCI ANA IYA YI
TO WLH KWANA KADAN ZAKAJI CUSTOMER NA CEWA AI DUK GARIN NAN ABINCI IN BA NAKA BANE BA DADI, SAI KA KORI MASU SAYE.

(4) MASU DILLANCIN GIDAJE KO FILAYE SU ZUBA RUBUTUN A BAHO KO KWANO SAI A SAMU SABUWAR TSINTSIYAR LAUSHI A RINQA TSOMAWA A RUBUTUN SAI A YAYYARFA A FILIN KO GIDAN TO SAI KA ZABI WANDA ZAI SIYARWA DON YAWAN MASU SIYA.

(5) MUSU KIWO KO KIWON MENENE SU ZUBA RUBUTUN A RUWAN SHAN ABINDA SUKE KIWO TO WLH ZA AGA ALBARKA AKIWON CIKIN QANQANIN LOKACI

(6) MASU KAYAN DA BA NACI BA SU YAYYAFA RUBUTU A KAYAN SIYARWAR KO MENENE 
ZAKA GA DAN DAZON JAMA'A A WAJAN KA KULLUM.

16. TAURARUWAR HAMADA

Muna tafiya Makada na kara kambama ni ban gane ba, an hada mataccen itace da matacciyar fata, ga ni kuma ana zuga ni in zama matacce na uku, ba abin da na ke sai annashuwa, doki na sai hargowa ya ke ya ci ya koshi, in kida ya shige ni, ni kan zabure shi kadan, fadawa ko sai kaji suna cewa hattara mai duniya, wato su har sun nada ni Sarki, ka ji sha'anin duniya.

Muna cikin tafiya har Allah ya kawo mu gun wani kogi, to da la'asar ko muka isa, muka tarar kogin ya kawo, sabo da haka tilas ne, mu sabka sai ya ja. Muka sauka nan da nan, aka kafa mani tanti wuri ba wuya ya zama tamkar gari, sai fa fadanci a ke yi mani. Mutanen nan da wana ya kulla da su, su kashe ni, sai na ga suna gama kai, ni ina zato zumunci ne na tafiya, ashe suna shawara kan kashe ni gare su, ba karamin al'amari ba ne, sabo da haka sai suka yi shawara kan za su saka ni cikin kogin nan idan dare ya raba mutane sun yi barci. Kun san al'amarin duniya ba ya buya, to shirin duk da suka yi sai wani cikinsu ya zo ya bani labarin kan yadda suka yi da wana, amma bai sanad da ni ba ko sun yarda za su aikata ba, ko kuma ba za su aikata ba, ko kuma wan nan shawara tasu, ta su fasa ce ko ta su aikata ce, sabo da haka na zamna ina da shiri, to amma ban tsammani za su saka ni cikin kogi ba. Wannan akwati da kuka ganni a ciki akwati na ne da nake zuba kaya ciki. Da dare ina barci ka san abin da baka zato zai faru, na ji an dauke ni an saka cikin wani abu, amma Allah bai bani ikon magana ba, sai da aka rufe shi aka jefa ruwa sannan na yi karaji, amma ina, duk a banza wa ma zai yi zaton ni ne, mutane basu san abin da a ke ciki ba. Ka san an ce Zakaran da Allah ya nufa da cara ana shafo ana muzuru sai ya yi,' wannan babbar ishara ce gare mu, domin an tabbata sundukin nan zai yi kasa, ni kuma ko da bai yi kasa ba lalle in mutu ko don zafi da rashin iska. To amma da Allah ya nufa da sauran kwanana nan gaba ; sai Allah ya nufa ka sami sunduki da ni ke ciki ban riga na mutu ba, ga shi ka jiyyace ni, ga shi ni ne har ni ke ba da labarin abin da ya afku kaina, kuma watakila, zata yiwu muyi ido hudu da su mutanen nan"

M. Danye da Masakk suka yi mamakin wannan al'amari. Suka san Allah shi kurum ke iya saukar da abu kan mutum. M.Danye ya yi alkawali zai kai shi garinsu kafin ya wuce neman abin da ya tafo da shi. Masaki ya sanad da su akwai jirgi mai zuwa kowane wata uku, amma a lokacin bai fi sauran wata ba ya zo, sai su sami zuwa har wajen kasar su Mahiru. M.Danye da Mahiru a nan suka koyi saka, masakin nan yana kaunar su gaya, yana kuma taimakon su da abinci isasshe, kullum M. Danye kan ba su labarin tafiye tafiyensa da kuma labarin yaron shi Dabo, yana juyayin abin da ya afku kanshi, don ya tabbatar ya mutu. Da wata daya ya cika sai ga jirgi. Masaki ya shiga shirya masu guzuri, ya biya masu kudi suka shiga jirgi.

Bayan sun yi ban kwana da masaki jirgi ya tashi, kwanansu ashirin suka zo bakin kasar da Mahiru ya sani. Mahiru ya ce ka ga daga cikin wannan kasar ce wannan hadari ya same ni idan masu jirgi sun sabke mu nan zamu iya samun hanya mai zuwa Kurna. Sabo da haka M. Danye ya yi magana da masu jirgi kan suna so su sabka nan. Jirgi ya tsaya suka sabka, san nan fa suka kama tafiyar kasa, to ka san Mahiru bai saba da tafiyar kasa ba, wannan shi ya bata masu lokaci mai yawa a hanya.

Suna cikin tafiya har suka shiga kasar da uban Mahiru ke mulki, ka san tafiya kasa ga rana, wannan shi ya hana mutane gane Mahiru in sun je gari, ya kan nuna shi mai mulki ne, wai shi ne Mahiru, ga shi duk kasar an san shi amma jin Mahiru ya mutu, uma wannan duk ya dafe ya yi baki, ga shi a kasa, sai aka ki yarda, ana wulakanta su. Ran nan da la'asar sai fa suka shiga Kurna, wato birnin su Mahiru. Da jama'ar gari suka kyalla ido suka gan shi, ga shi duk ya yi baki ga shi a kasa, to amma da ya ke garinsu ne, sai aka gane shi. Mutane suka yo ca kansa, don dama ga shi da farin jini abin kamar za'a hadiye shi a takaicc dai a ka ya isa gida. Labarin wan nan na Mahiru ko Sarki har ya yi hakuri da Mahiru, ya samo jan shi a jikinsa, shi ma ya samo mike kafa, kuma dai ya tabbata shi zai gaji uban, sabo da haka mutanen gari da na kasa tilas ne su so shi. Sai katsam ya ji labarin Mahiru a gida, bakin ciki fa ba sai na fada ba. Sarki ko da ya ji hargowa bai san abin da ake ciki ba, sai ya zaci wani tashin hankali ne, sabo da haka ya yo waje da sauri, ya tambaya ko lafiya, aka ce masa ai Mahiru ne ga shi da wani bako sun zo. Ko da Sarki ya ji haka sai fa ya yi waje, wajensu, aka shigo da su Mahiru gida. Bayan sun gaisa, ya ba Sarki labarinsa duka da na M. Danye.

Za mu ci gaba ranar Asabar mai zuwa da karfe 9 na safe, insha Allah.

MUSTURBATION (ISTIMNA'I) TREATMENT

Maganin Matsalolin da Istimina'i (Wasa da Al'aura) ke haddasawa.

Wannnan hadin maganin na musamman an samar da shi ne ga wadanda larurar Istimna'i ta haddasa musu matsala.

Kadan daga cikin illolin da istimna'i ke haifarwa ga wanda ya yi shi ko bayan an daina.

â— Kankancewar zakari da maraina
â— Saurin kawowa ko rashin karfin mazakuta
â— Karancin maniyyi ko tsinkewar maniyyi.
â— Yawan mantuwa
â— Rage hazakar kwakwalwa
â— Yana haddasa Mantuwa.. 
â— Ramar jiki ko 'karancin sha'awa, 
â— Ya na iya haddasa rashin haihuwa , 
â— Raunin jiki, raunin garkuwar jiki,
â— Jin ciwon kai akai-akai, ciwon baya, 
â— Fitar maniyyi haka nan kawai.
â— Bushewar fatar kan zakari.
â— Kankacewar zakari ko sauya masa sigarsa
â— Bugawar zuciya da sauri,
â— Zubar gashi, 
â— Kurajen fuska da basu jin magani.

A cikin wannan hadin maganin (Musturbation Treatment ) akwai magani na ruwa wadda za ana sha kullum sau daya a rana, akwai "anti-musturbation oil" wadda ya ke shi mai ne na musamman wadda ake shafa shi a gaba domin inganta karfi da lafiyar gaba musamman ga masu takurewar gaba ko rashin kaurin gaba ko karkacewar gaba. Sannan akwai "Na gari da za'a rinkasha da ruwan zafi da Zuma " shi ma magani ne da ke narkar da mataccen manin da ya maqale; wadda ke taruwa a kwarkwaron azzakari lokacin da ake aikata Istimi'nai (musturbation)

Wanda yakeyi ya daina, yayi addu'a, ya nemi yafiyar Ubangiji. Ba abune mai kyau ba. Bayan illoli akwai fushin Ubangiji.

Ina University ajin farko na hadu da isma'il ALLAH ya hada jinnin mu.
Komai nashi birge ni yake yi.
Daga sifar sa har izuwa tafiyar sa. His smile always turns my frown upside down.
As days turns to weeks our love intensified, kullum muna cikin waya da chat.
Muna cikin wannan radadi me suna so, kwatsam ya jefe ni da yana da mata.
Kana da mata isma'il? Me yasa baka gaya min ba tun farko
"I didnt see the need to in the begining"
I thought we built our relationship akan gaskiya.
"I didnt lie, i just omitted the truth"
What a big omission kam.
After the revelation se na shiga dilemma.
Dan so ina son shi iya so, but i doubt if positivelygamy is in the cards for me.
But isma'il fought, and fought. Ya hada da kawaye na da yan uwa na, 
" yes na san nayi kuskure, so ne da nake miki shi ya sa ina tunanin in na gaya miki da wuri baza ki so ni ba"
Tun ina cije wa har na war ware muka ci gaba daga inda muka tsaya.
After a while he came, met my family aka saka rana.
He loved me so much da walahi mantawa nake yana da mata.
Every decision na rayuwar sa da ni yake yi.
I was in control.
Exactly what i wanted.
A kwana a tashi ba wuya lokaci ya zo akayi biki.
Aka kaini kebbi family house din su.
But a week later we left for kano where he worked.
Yes na san za kuce ina matar sa.
Tana nan.
Duk da wataran na kan ji ba dadi but ba a tausayin kishiya.
Ni a gani na bata iya taku bane.
Iya ruwa fid da kai.
Yes i was his favourite ba inda yake zuwa babu ni.
Ni ce maccen shiga mota.
Nice matar nuna wa sa'a. Ba fariya ba amma in ka kalle ni se ka kara kallo na.
Yes na kica macce and then some.
He was obsessed, and who can blame him.
yakan dadde be je kebbi ba wataran har da ALLAH da annabi nake hada shi kan ya je ya ganta.
Na san za kuce ko wani abu na mishi. Walahi ba boka ba malami. 
Muna cikin zaman mu a Kano se company din da yake aiki suka rufe, we had to go back to kebbi.
Yana da kudin sa so my assumption is ze kama min nawa gidan shi yasa kwata kwata hankali na be tashi ba da za mu koma kebbin.
Rannar komawa kebbi ya zo, muka je airpositivert ya kira a tare mu.
A masu tarar mu har da mother inlaw da yaya babba uwar gida.
A kazo shiga mota, kishiya ta shige gefen Isma'l na ce yau za ayi drama.

Yadda Zaki Tunzura Mijinki Ya Kamu Da Sha'awar Ki
#tsangayarmalmantonga 
Akwai wani abu da matan aure suka kasa fahimta. Maza saboda yadda kwarainiya na rayuwa ya addabesu a yau da kullum, ba a ko yau she suke da sha'awar Jima'i ba.
Wannan yasa zaki ga wani magidanci gashi ga matarsa amma sai yafi wata guda bai nemeta ba. Ita kuwa mace duk irin matsalar datake ciki hankalinta na kan Jima'i musamman ma idan tasan tanada aure.
Kada ki jira sai mijinki ya nuna sha'awar sa akanki. Ga wasu hanyoyin da zaki motsawa mijinki sha'awar sa koda baida niyar saduwa dake.
#Tsangayarmalamtonga 
1: Ki soma tura masa sakonnin text na batsa da hotunan soyayya tun kamin ya dawo gida.
2: Ki shirya masa abinci na musamman irin wanda kikasan yana sha'awar ci ko sha.
3: Yi shiga irin na rabin tsairaci yadda bayanki da kirjinki zai rika motsawa.
4: Zauna kusa da shi a lokacinda yake cin abinci kina masa kwarkwasa da tabbatar masa babu komai a jikinki
5: Sanar da shi irin zakuwa da kika yi da bukatuwarsa.
6: Ki zauna a gabansa kiyi adonki da kwalliyar na kwanciyar bacci bayan kin fito daga wanka. Ki tabbatar wajen sha mai idan kina kusa dashi kin daura masa kafanki akan cinyarsa yadda zaiyi arba da tsiraicinki da kyau.
7: Sashi ya shafa miki mai a wani bangare na jikinki musamman bayanki da duwawunki.
8: Ki zauna akan cinyarsa kina masa hiran soyayya kina taba ko shafa wani bangare na jikinsa.
9: Ki tabbatar kin kawata takin kwananku da kuma kan gadon kwanciyarku.
10: Ki sa ya miki tausa kina ruf daciki tsirara.

Da yawan mutane sun yi tunanin lissafin Kwankwaso ya Æ™wace lokacin da ya faÉ—i zaÉ“e a 2003, sai ya nuna musu a wannan lokacin ma lissafin ya Æ™ara ninkuwa. Idan aka baka wani labarin idan ba ganin Wanda abun ya faru akansa ka yi ba sai ka karyata.
Wannan yarinya da ku ke gani kannen mahaifinta guda hudu ake zargin suna lalata da ita ta gaba da ta baya wato zina da luwadi, Wa'iyazubullah, wanda har ya sa duburarta yin tsutsa gabanta kuma ya lalace.
Wannan halin ya sa yarinyar fara yin wani abu kamar na hauka ba magana.
Mahaifinta ya rabu da mahaifiyarta tun tana karama ya kwace yar sa ya baiwa Kakarta, mahaifiyar ta kan yi shekaru Bakwai ba ta ga yar tata ba saboda ba gari daya su ke ba, sai yanzu da ta kai shekaru 20 aka dawo mata da ita da tabin hankali ba magana, da farko ta zaci aljanune daga baya aka ce ta kaita Dawanau asibitin masu Tabin Hankali.
Bayan yarinyar ta fara shan magani ne ta fara magana ta ce Kannen mahaifinta suna mata kwartanci, babban tashin hankalin cikin dare sai yarinyar ta saka hannu tana kokarin yin abun da suke mata, mahaifiyar ta kira mahaifinta ta gaya masa ya karyata.
Mahaifiyarta ta kai ta asibiti inda aka gano duburarta tana fitar da tsutsa gabanta kuma ya samu matsala, yanzu sai an mata ploshing da dinki.
Mahaifiyarta ta kira mahaifinta ya ce za su aiko da kudi ta kaita asibiti, amma an fi wata guda shuru ga ciwon yarinyar kullum.gaba ya ke yi.
Mahaifiyarta ta ce yanzu burinta yarintarta ta samu taimakon da za a yi mata wadancan ayyukan a sama.
Ku taimaka mata jamaa kamar yadda ku ka saba.
Ga Wanda za su taimaka za su iya tura taimakonsu ta account dinmu. 
0109299375 Diamond/acces, Creative Helping Needy Foundation Ko 0127121207 Gt bank Fauziyya Danladi.

Lauyoyi sai a hankali 

Kimanin wata 4 baya na shiga office dina sai na tarar abokan aikina suna shewa suna zolayar daya daga cikin su wato Ridwan Yunusa. Na tambaya menene sai suka ce wai ashe yan sanda ne suka je sumame a daren jiya suka hada dashi kuma ma wai a positivelice station ya kwana.

Na tambaya cikin damuwa ko menene dalilin shewa da murna bayan an kama mutum ya kwana cikin sauro da zafi. Sai suka kada baki suka ce ai wai su ba ta kamen da aka yi masa suke ba. Sun wuce nan. Su tuni sun fara rabon kudin da zasu samu ne na diyyar da kotu zata basu na cin zarafin sa da kama shi da kulle shi da kuma kin saurarar shi har sai da ya kwana alhalin ba a kama shi da laifin komai ba. 

Abun ya bani mamaki amma kawai na girgigiza kai na na koma office dina na barsu. Nan da nan suka shirya kara suka kawo min nima na bada gudun mawa ta. 

In takaice muku zance dai, a yau mafarkin wadannan lauyoyi ya zama gaskiya domin Babbar Kotun Tarayya mai zaman ta Kano, ta bawa yan'sandan da suka yi wancan danyan aiki umarnin bawa Ridwan Naira Dubu Dari Biyar da Hamsin (N550,000) a matsayin diyyar daure shi da suka yi a cell na kimanin awa 14 ba tare da hakkin sa ko wani dalili kwakkwara ba. 

To mutane ne ba suda aiki kullum sai kai karar cin zali kotu. Kaga kuwa in basu kare nasu ba ai akwai matsala. 

Alhamdulillah 

Congratulations Ridwan Yunusa

Marigayi Sarkin Katsina Kabir Usman mai ban dariya ne, shi ko Marigayi Sarkin Kano Ado Bayero me son raha ne, don haka duk wajen taro Sarkin Kano sai ya zauna kusa da Sarkin Katsina, yana ba shi labarai, sai aga sarki yana dariya har da tafawa. Dogarai da fadawan Kano basa son haka ko kadan, abin ya dame su.

Wajajen 1992, IBB ya fito da tsarin hada gwamnatin soja a tarayya, gwamnatin farar hula a jihohi. A Jihar Kano se aka tantance Hajiya Halima Soda, aka ce ita zata tsaya takarar gwamnan jihar Kano.

A wannan lokacin ne, sai aka kira taron sarakuna a Kaduna. Don kar Sarki Ado ya zauna tare da Sarkin Katsina, balle suyi abinda suka saba na raha cikin jamaa, sai fadawan Kano suka raba wajen zamansu. Sarkin Katsina da yaga haka, kafin ya zauna, sai ya wuce inda Sarki Ado ke zaune yace masa, Fadawanka sun rabamu, amma nazo ne ince maka duk san da gwamna ta haihu, zamu zo mu taya ka rabon kauri da karbar 'yan barka.

Da Sarki Ado ya fara dariya sai da yayi hawaye. Fadawa kamar su mutu don haushin dabararsu bata yi amfani ba

Doctor Marzuq Ungogo , a isar da saqon nan wajen malaman jami'oi da ke zaune diaspositivera. Kada wanda yayi gangancin dawowa Nigeria yanzu. Ko ba komai security din ku is guaranteed a inda kuke. Na gidan ma madakata suke jira a Qarasa su fece abun su. Aikin koyarawa a Nigeria bai chanchanci sadaukarwar da malamai suke masa ba. Da gwamnati, da mafiya yawan daliban da kuma al'umma basu san muhimmancin malamai ba. Secondary school dropositiveut mai kayan aiki (kudi) a hannu yafi malami mai tarin kwalayen digiri muhimmanci a society a yanzu. Ko a siyasa da mu'amalar mutane da dama haka ne.

***Shugaba Zelensky na Ukraine yayi jawabi a kwamitin tsaron majalisar dinkin duniya, inda ya zargi dakarun Rasha da aikata laifufukan yaki.

***A Najeriya, wata babbar kotu a Kano ta yanke wa Mubarak Bala, shugaban kungiyar wadanda basu yarda da addini ba, hukuncin daurin shekara 24, kan laifin batanci ga addinin Islama.

***Matsalar karancin ruwa a Kenya na jefa mata cikin hadari ... muna nan tafe da rahoto daga Nairobi, babban birnin kasar.

Banyi mamaki ba, don kasa mai tsarki ta ayyana dr Muhammad Al-Issa a matsayin wanda zai jagorancin gabatar da Khutbar Arfa ta wannan shekarar.

Dalili kuwa shine, a yadda lamuran kasar suke tafiya duk mai hankali zai gane lallai kasar ta sami jarrabawar sauka daga kan tsari na shari'a, sha'anin mulkin kasar ana tafiyar dashi ne daga wajen kasar wanda wasu makiyan addinin mu suke tafiyar dashi, domin wadannan makiya namu sun wallafa littattafai akan yadda za'a kama wannan kasa mai tsarki.

Muhammad Al-Issa dan asalin kasar Saudiyya ne wanda yana dauke da ra'ayin nan na " Interfaith " da kuma sukar wasu ra'ayoyi na Salafiyya wanda yake kira da masu tsauri.

Dr Al-Issa dama ya karanta abinda ya shafi shari'o'i na gamayyar addinai ne a kasar Saudiyya din, kuma dayane daga cikin 'yan siyasar kasar Saudiyya shine kuma sakatare na general of the Muslims World League, kuma shine shugaban " International Islamic Halal Organisation ".

Dr. Al-Issa ya samu lambobin yabo daga gurin su Yahudawan da Kiristoci wadanda makiya ne ga addinin mu na Islama.

Wani fada Timothy M Dolan wani memba ne na " Roman Catholic " a Amurka ( America ) yace,

" Muhammad Al-Issa shine dan siyasa mafi iya magana a duniyar Muslunci saboda kokarin da yake na kawo dai-dai to da kulla alaka ta abokantaka a tsakanin addinan duniya " 

A wata haduwa da Al- Issa yayi da wani Kirista Russell Nelson yace,

" Kai ( Muhammad Al-Issa ) mai wanzar da zaman lafiya ne, muna bukatar shuwagabanni irin ku ".

Wani kwamiti na Yahudawa a kasar America suka kira Al-Issa da cewa maganar sa tana da tasiri tana da karfi a cikin Musulman duniya kuma maganar sa tana kokarin kawo cigaban yin Muslunci tsaka-tsakiya.

Mudai a matsayin nu na Musulmai bama goyon bayan wannan lamari kuma bamuji dadin sa ba, muna rokon Allah ya kare Muslunci da Musulmai daga sharrin wasu Musulman cikin mu masu rauni.

Muhammad Aliyu abu Asma'u.

Sumogul kawai gwamnatin Buhari ta hana, tunda ya hau aka samu yan'banga wanda a cewar Gwamna Masari su ne ke sumogul da. Har yau babu zaman lafiya a Arewa maso yamma.

Shugaba Buhari da zafin kai yazo wai shi bazai bawa yan Niger-Delta kudi ba haka siddan. Ai kuwa su ka dawo da fasa bututu. Da yaga kasar zata durkushe, haka babu yadda ya iya, dole ya basu kudin bulus.

Da ya hana yan'majalisa kudi, har ihu aka yimasa, ya dinga shan wahala. Babu yadda ya iya, dole ya sakar mu su mara indai yana so yayi abun arziki, talaka ya gani a kasa. Su kuma yan'majalisa da su rarumo abinda zasu rabawa yan jam'iya na kasa da al'umma. 

Wato, Nigeria sai Allah. A cukurkude ta ke. Buhari da ya fara zakewa, har kusan mutuwa yayi.

NAJI DADI DA AKA DAKATAR DA SHEHI AL-INTERFAITH

Kwamitin kula da masallacin rukunin gidajen 'yan majalisu da ke unguwar Apositive a Abuja ya dakatar da wani gorbataccen Malami karnen farautar Yehhudu jagoran masu yada akidar daidaita tsakanin addinai (INTER-FAITH) a Nigeria daga Limanci a Masllacin

Malamin wanda yayi fice wajen jefa soyayyar al-kuffaru a cikin zukatar Musulmai an dakatar dashi ne saboda yayi khuduba ranar juma'a ya caccaki Gwamnatin Maigirma Shugaban Kasa Muhammadu Buhari Maigaskiya cewa idan ba'a samar da tsaro ba to wai Musulmai suki fita zabe

Shi dai Shehi Al-interfaith ba Sarkin Musulmi bane, ba Musulmai yake wakilta gaba daya ba, kuma bai da ikon ya hanamu fita zabe, sannan ba duka kowani yanki na Nigeria bane yake fama da matsalar tsaro, duk bala'in ta'addanci da aka yi a Gwamnatin Jonathan bai hana a fito zabe ba

Allah ne Ya kama jagoran masu yada addeenin Interfaith, yana fakewa da sukar Gwamnatin Buhari yana yada akidar daidaita tsakaaninn addeenai, ba shakka Allah ba zai barshi ba, barnann da wannan malami yake yiwa Musulunci ya wuce barnonin da aka yiwa Musulunci a Gwamnatin Buhari, domin shi ruhi da imani yake rugujewa ba gangar jiki ba

Idan zai kwana ya tashi yana sukar Gwamnatin Buhari ba ruwana dashi, amma da kunsan illar da wannan Shehi Al-interfaith yake yiwa Musulunci akan manufar Yehudawa (Intafait) da baku tsaya bata lokacin ku a kansa ba, shiyasa masu karin magana sukace rashin sani yafi fare duhu

Alhamdulillah Interfaith taci bayaa a Nigeria, hanyoyin kamun Allah suna da yawa
Allah Ka dada mayar da su baya

#Gabatarwa
Kalar Fitsari na nuna cewa wani sashe (organ) na jiki ya samu matsala ne ko baya aikin sa yanda yakamata. Kalar fitsari har yanzu yana bayar da bayanai ne akan yanayin lafiyar mutum.

#Misali: Ganin jini a cikin fitsari na nuna cewa koda ta samu matsala, ko kuma akwai cuta a sashen dake kula da fitsari kamar cutar mafitsara (bladder), urethra, etc.

#Kalolin_Fitsari_da_abinda_suke_nufi_ga_lafiyar_mu
#1. FITSARI MAI KALAR RUWA (Colourless): Wannan na nuna cewa an sha wadatattun ruwa a jiki, watau jiki na dauke da adadin ruwan da yake bukata. A taikace dai lafiya lau ne.

#2. FITSARI MAI KALAR DORUWA MAI DUHU (Dark Yellow): Wannan na nuna cewa akwai bukatar mutum ya yawaita shan ruwa da yawa. Watau babu isassun ruwa a jiki.

#3. FITSARI KALAR BROWN: Wannan na nuna cewa hanta ta samu matsala. Akwai bukatar a ga likita.

#4. FITSARI KALAR ORANGE: Wannan ma nuna cewa hanta tana kan kamuwa da cuta. Akwai bukatar ganin likita.

#5. FITSARI MAI KALAR JA: Wannan na nuna cewa anci abu mai kalar ja. Idan kuma jini ne, to yana nuna alamar cewa akwai matsala ga koda

GANIN JINI BASHINE NE BUDURCIBA BA

A zamanin da can, anyi lokacin da ake shinfida farin kyale akan shifidar sabbin ma'aurata domin a tabbatar da budurcin amaryar.

Idan jini ya zuba a daren farkon saduwarta da mijinta to wannan itace budurwa abar alfahari ga iyayenta dama zuri'ansu gaba daya. Idan kuwa ba a ga jini ya malale wannan farin kyalen ba to wannan amaryar ba budurwa bace aka auro, ma'ana tana zina ko ta taba yin zina.

Wanda hakan na iya rusa wannan auren.
Wannnan maguzanci tonon silili yayi tasiri sosai cikin wasu kabilun African ciki harda bailar Hausa da Fulani. Wanda tasirinsa ya jima cikin al'uma sosai har zuwa wannan lokacin da muke ci. Wasu mazan suna dauka cewa muddin basu ga jini ya zuba a darensu na farko da sabuwar amaryarsu ba to a tunaninsu wannan amaryar ta taba yin zina ko kuma tanayin zina.

Wasu mazan kuwa suna daukar cewa muddin basu sha wahala ba wajen shigar da azzakarinsu farjin amaryarsu a daren farko wannan ma alamune na amaryar tana zina. So suke ga a ranar farko babu kofa a farjin amaryarsu sai sun shiga da kyar.

Wannan camfin ko tunani da har yanzu yake da tasiri yasa yanzu haka 'yan mata masu niyar aure wandan kuma suka taba zina ko suke zina suke da dabaru da damar gaske da suke amfani dasu wajen suke gabansu ya dawo tamkar na yar shekaru 7 da haihuwa.

A yanzu haka akwai hanyoyi na zamani dana gargajiya masu yawan gaske da 'yan mata suke bi kuma suke amfani dasu domin su tsuke gabansu har sai jini yayi zuba a daren farko aurensu. Inda ango sai yi ta murna da farin cikin ya samu matarsa a budurwa nan ko baisan dawan gari ba.

Sai kuma yana da kyau maza su fahimci cewa ita fa budurwa da akwai hanyoyi masu yawan gaske da zata iya fita daga budurci kuma batasan wani danamiji da sunan jima'i ba.

Misali:
yawan shekaru budurwar data balaga ta kosa haka nan kawai tana iya fita daga budurci. Yawan daukan kaya masu nauyi ko yawan yin aiyuka suma suna kauda budurwa daga budurci. Motsa jiki ko tafiyan kafa mai tsawo suma wasu hanyoyi ne da mace take rasa budurcinta. Don haka ba sai mace ta sadu da namiji ba sannan take fita daga budurci.

Babban matsalar dayasa mazan wancan lokacin suke ganin jini a gaban sabbin amarensu shine na rashin gudanar da wasannin motsa sha'awa ga amaren. Muddin namiji zai zura azzakarinsa a gaban mace ba tare da ya motsataba da akwai yiwuwar ya ji mata ciwo, muddin taji ciwu kuma dole jini ya zuba, idan jini ya zuba su anÎ±su wautar abun nema ya samu.
.
Bayaga rashin wasannin motsa sha'awa da akwai kuma fargaba da su yan matan suke dashi na saduwar daren farko, wanda duk budurwa ana tsoratata da cewa jima'i yanada zafi. Da wannan fargaban da kuma rashin motsata suke taruwa su zama matsalar da amaryar zata iya zubar da jini. Wanda a wannan lokacin akwai soyayya kuma maza suna da illimin wasanni da matayensu don haka babu tunanin wani zaban jini ga mazan da suka waye.
.
A daren farko na ango da amaryar, yana da kyau ango ya tabbatar da cewa yayi wasa da matarsa daga sama har kasanta, inda zai sha ya sha, inda zai tsotsa ya tsotsa inda kuma zai lasa ya tabbatar ya lasa.
.
A daren farko bisa al'ada maza ne ke yin dukkanin wasannin, amaryar ko dai tanajin kunya ko tsaoron kada ace inata koya, ko kuma bata iya wasan ba. Don haka ango shine zai tabbatar da cewa amaryar ta kamu tana bukatar a shigeta.
A lokacinda da mace ta murzu, ta kamu da bukatuwar mijinta, a wannan lokacin ruwa zai soma fitowa daga gabanta wanda wannan ruwan shike taimakawa azzakari shigan farji ba tare da mace taji zafi ko ciwo ba.
.
Akwai wani ruwa dake fitowa a gaban namiji wanda ake kira maziyi, shima wannan ruwan yana taimakawa namiji ne wajen shigan farji cikin sauki. Don haka a lokacinda ango da amarya suka himmatu kuma suka fahimci yanzu suna bukatan juna bayan wasannin motsa sha'awa mai tsawo, a daren farko ango idan kazo shigan amarya kada ka shigeta gaba daya kÎ±wai ka tura mata azzakari farjinta wuffff.
Ka soma ne da mata wasa da azzakarinka akan farjinta, kana goga azzakarinka akan dantsakanta sannan idan ka so shiganta ka tura ne sannu a hankali, idan ka shiga sai ka sake fitarwa ka sake shigarwa ka sake fitarwa a hankali kana mai bata hakuri da lallashinta har sai ka fahimci a wannan lokacin tana bukatarka gaba daya.
.
Kada ka hau kan amaryarka a daren farko da sukuwa mai karfi, ka bita sannu a hankali ne kana mata gwatso a hankali ganin ba abunda ta saba dashi ba, kana haka har lokacinda ka fahimci tana bukatarka da sauri ko da gaggawa.
.
A daren farko da amarya kada kace zaka mata yanayin kwanciyar jima'i da yake da wahala, ka soma mata ne da kwamciyan jima'i al'ada rigingine a daren farko.
.
Wadannan hanyoyin sune wasu wasu daga cikin hanyoyin da angwaye zasu kaucewa zuban jini a daren farko da matansu. Da fatan Allah Ya bada zaman lafiya tsakanin angwaye da amaren da zasu tinkari daren farko da Kuma masu niyyar aure.

12/7/2022

Wadannan yara da suke bin mutane da wuka su buge, suna da amfani gaskiya. 

Na farko, su kansu sun samu sana'a. Sannan Wukaken da makaman da suke amfani da su, makera ne suke kerawa, don haka an musu ciniki. Haka masassaka suna samu ta wajen kera kotocin makaman nasu. 

Haka idan suka soke mutum, za'a kaishi asibiti. Watakila adaidaita sahu za a dauka, zai samu kudin shiga shima. 

Daga bisani, masu siyarda maganin da za'a siya kamar ruwa da maganin kashe zugi duk za su samu. Idan an dauko dan sanda don ya shaida shi kansa ana dan bashi hassafi. 

In ka dawo jiyya gida lallai za a zo dubaka a samu lada. Mai taro mai sisi duk na dubiya zai shigo aljihunka. 

Suma da suka sata, za a samu mai cire security ya samu nasa. In ba zai ciru ba za ai fawar wayar a siyar da pieces a matsayin spare parts. Lallai dai ciniki zai zagaya a kasuwar waya. 

A takaice dai 'satar waya' wata babbar industry ce. Kuma tana da amfani. 

PS;
Nima tinani ne irin tinanin mai ganin alfanun satar Jami'in Gwamnatin da zai kawo watayawa a yankinsa ko unguwarsa. Lallai sata na da amfani.

BASHI

Bala'i ya tashi zai yi tafiya, sai ya nemi abokin tafiya.

Ciwo ya ce zan bi ka. Bala'i ya ce ban yarda da kai ba. Domin kai da an sha magani sai ka É“ace, kuma wanda duk ka shafe shi, zai samu lada.

Gobara ta zo ta ce zata bi shi, sai ya ce, ban aminta da ke ba. Domin ke idan kin gama aiki sai a sake share wuri a cigaba da rayuwa.

Sai ga Bashi ya iso yana yi wa kansa kirari: Ni ke hana mutum barci, in hana shi zuwa masallaci, in sakar masa ciwo marar dalili, in sa shi karya da saÉ“a alÆ™awari, in jefa shi gidan kaso, in ya mutu in gaji gidansa da iyalinsa, sannan ba zan bar shi ba sai na tsaya da shi wurin hisabi a gaban Allah.,

Nan take Bala'i ya ce zo mu tafi tare, tabbas kai ne abokin tafiyata. Babu abokin tafiya in ba kai ba.

Ya Allahu Ya Ar-razzakku Ya Al-wahhabu ka raba mu da musibar bashin.

TARIHIN MARIGAYI MALAM AMINU KANO (9/8/1920-17/4/1983)

Anhaifi malam Aminu kano a ranar 9 ga ga watan Agusta ta shekarar 1920 a Unguwar Sudawa cikin birnin kano.

Marigayi malam Aminu kano yayi karatun Alqur'ani mai tsarki awajen shehun malami, malam Halilu, malam halilu shine limamin sarkin kano ABDULLAHI BAYERO a shekarar 1929 zuwa 1953.

Ansa malam Aminu kano a makarantar primary ta SHAHUCI dake kano a shekarar 1930 lokacin yana dan shekara goma da haihuwa.

Yazama dalibin kwalejin kaduna wadda aka samar da ita a 1922 da sunan kwalejin katsina a katsina daga 1937 zuwa 1942.

Bayan yagama kwalejin kaduna ne, malam aminu kano yasamu aikin koyarwa a makarantar Middle School dake bauchi, inda alokacin Sir Abubakar tafawa balewa yake amatsayin Headmaster.

Daga Bauchi middle school sai aka canzawa malam aminu kano wajen aiki zuwa kwalejin horar da malamai ta maru dake gundumar sokoto amatsayin headmaster a shekarar 1949 inda yai shekara daya anan kafin daga nan ya ajiye harkar aiki yakama haskokin siyasa gadan - gadan.

Malam Aminu Kano yafara sansanar harkokin siyasa ne tun a shekarar 1943 lokacin daya taimakawa Malam Sa'adu Zungur suka kafa wata kungiyar siyasa mai suna kungiyar cigaban bauchi a jahar bauchi a shekarar 1946.

Malam Aminu Kano da Malam Sa'adu zungur sune suka karfafa kafuwar jam'iyar NEPA wato NOUTHERN ELEMENT PROGRESSIVE ASSOCIATION kafin daga baya takoma NEPU wato NOUTHERN ELEMENT PROGRESSIVE UNION, ankafa jam'iyar ne a shekarar 8 ga watan 8 a shekarar 1950 kuma da mutane 8 aka kafa jam'iyar.

A shekarar 1947 ne Malam Aminu Kano ya jagoranci bude wata kungiya ta malaman arewacin nigeria, kuma dashi aka bude jam'iyar mutanen arewa wadda daga baya tarikede takoma LPC a shekarar 1949 amatsayin jam'iyar dake taimaka mutanen Arewa.

Malam Aminu kano ya rungumi harkokin siyasa sosai wanda har hakan tasa ya ajiye aikinsa a ranar 4 ga watan Nuwamba a shekara 1950.

Malam Aminu Kano yazama shugaban jam'iyar NEPU ta kasa a shekarar 1953 har zuwa lokacin da akayi juyin mulki na farko a nigeria.

Mallam Aminu Kano Yataba cin zabe inda yazama dan majalisar tarayya a shekarar 1959 zuwa 1966 inda ya wakilci Kano ta gabas akarkashin jam'iyar NEPU, shine me tsawatarwa a majalisar hadin gwiwwa.

Mallam Aminu Kano yarike kwamishan lafiya na tarayya kuma dan majalisar zartarwa na koli a gwamnatin tarayya alokacin mulkin Yakubu Gawon.

Malam Aminu Kano dashi akai ta gwagwarmaya wajen mayar da mulki ga hannun farar hula azamanin Yakubu Gawon wanda Yakubun ya daga bayar da mulkin wanda adalilin hakan ya haddasa hanbarar da gwamnatin ta Gawan din a shekarar 1975 inda Murtala Muhammad ya gaje shi.

Dashi akai gwagwarmaya wajen mayar da mulki ga farar hula a shekarar 1979.

Malam Aminu Kano shine shugaban jam'iyar PRP kuma dan takararta na shugabancin kasa a shekarar 1979.

Allah yadauki ran Malam Aminu Kano a ranar Asabar 17 ga watan April a shekarar 1983, atsawon shekarunsa na 63 ya shafe shekaru 40 yana gwagwarmayar siyasa dan Talakan Arewa.

Yayi kaurin suna wajen kin manufofin turawa dama duk wanda zai kawowa arewa wargi, mutum ne wanda bashi da kwadayi kuma baya siyasar kudi face akida zalla kawai.

Indai ka jiyoshi to akan Arewa ne, duk kungiyoyin da yayi ko ya jagoranta to gabadayansu zakuji na AREWA ne.

Bayan mutuwar marigayi Mallam Aminu Kano ansawa muhimman wurare sunansa kamar irinsu filin jirgin sama na kano wato Malam Aminu Kano International Airpositivert da kuma Asibitin koyarwa na Mallam Aminu Kano wato Aminu Kano Teaching Hospital.

Allah yajikan Mallam Aminu Kano, Ya Allah kasa matasan Arewa suyi koyi da irin halayyar wadannan bayin Allah nagari, wanda komai nasu akan arewa ne, basu da wayo sai sunji za'a illata AREWA!
