KALUBALE GA MATTHEW HASSAN KUKAH!

Shararren Malamin nan da yayi fice wajen zaman mukabala da Kristoci a Najeriya da wajen Najeriya Sheikh Hussaini Yusuf Mabera Hapizahullah yace: MATTHEW HASSAN KUKAH DA MAGANAR DEBORA SAMUEL AKAN BACIN ANNABIN RAHMA :- Idan ka isa mu hadu filin Sukuwa ko Stadium, Sokoto , ko kuma Eagle Square Abuja , ko kuma kowane wuri koda a Church ne don muyi mukabala ko tattaunawa acikin aminci game da zuwan Annabi Muhammad amincin Allah ya tabbata agare shi . Wallahi zamu tabbatar ma cewa akwai hujjoji fiye da dubu acikin Baibul da suka tabbatar cewa shine karshen Annabawa daga tsatson Annabi Ibrahim . Duk wadannan ayoyin irin su Deuteronomy 18 v18-22, Deuteronomy 18 v 15 , Acts 3 v 21-23, Isaiah 12 v 29 , Deuteronomy 33 v 1-3 , Habbakuk 3 v 3 , Song of Solomon 5 v 10 and 16 , Matthew 21 v 42-43 , Psalms 118 v 22-26 , John 16 v 12-14 , John 16 v 7-9, John 14 v 16 , John 14 v 26 , John 14 v 30, John 15 v 26, John 1 v 19-21 , John 1 v 25, Revelation 14 v 6-7 , Isaiah 21 v 13-17, Isaiah 42 v 1-13 , Isaiah 60 v 1-14, Michael 4 v 1-3, First Corinthians 13 v 9-10 , Psalms 84 v 4-6, da sauran su wallahi duk suna bayani ne da zuwan Manzon Allah acikin bible da kuke karatu ko kun fahimta ko Baku fahimta ba . 

Shin wai Matthew Hassan Kukah , halan ka manta da alkawalin da Allah yayi game da Annabi Ibrahim acikin Baibul na cewa zai saka ma dansa Annabi Isma'ila arbaka , kuma za yawaita al'ummarsa kuma zai daukaka shi a dukkan duniya bayan ya bashi zuri' a mai girma da daraja ? Ka duba wannan alkawalin har guda biyar acikin Genesis 17 v 20 , da Genesis 21 v 13. Ka manta cewa hatta ruwan Zamzam dake makkah bible dinka yayi maganarsu acikin Genesis 21 v 19, Ka manta cewa bible ya ambaci zuri'ar Annabi Isma'ila kakan Manzon Allah su goma sha biyu acikin Genesis 25 v 12-17 ? Matthew Hassan Kukah don Allah Kasa muna lokaci don mu hadu da kai acikin aminci da amana don mu tattauna wadannan maganganu acikin baibul kamar yadda baibul ya bada shawara a cikin Isaiah 1 v 18 kuma Alkur'ani ya tabbatar game da wannan dialogue acikin Suratul Ankabut aya 46 

BIBLE YA YANKE MA DEBORA SAMUEL HUKUNCIN KISA AKAN BACIN MANZON ALLAH 

Bugu da kari , Matthew Hassan Kukah kasan kamar yadda Nissan cewa Baibul ya hana kowace maganar banza ko cutarwa ga Annabawan Allah . Acikin Psalms 105 v 15 da IFirst Chronicles 16 v 22 cikin Baibul , Allah yace "KADA KU CUTAR DA ANNABAWA NA KO ZABABBUNA DAGA CIKIN MANZANNINA". Acikin Second book of Chronicles 36 v 16 Baibul yace" Hushin Allah da azabarsa sun sauka ga wadannan da suka yi izgilanci da cin mutuncin Manzannin Allah da Annabawan Allah kuma ba wanda ya kubutar da su daga wannan azabar ." . Acikin Leviticus 24 v 10-16 Allah yayi umurni ga Annabi Musa cewa mutanen gari da baki dukkansu su jefe wani bayahude da ya baci Allah kuma yayyi izgili ga Annabi Musa . Kuma aka jefe shi da duwatsu har ya mutu . Don haka Allah yace duk wanda ya baci Allah ko Annabawan Allah akashe shi . Acikin First Kings 21 v 10-13 Baibul yayi umurni an jefe wani mutum da ya zagi Allah da nagartaccen Sarkin wannan Zamani har ya mutu . . Acikin Second King 2 v 23-25 Allah ya umurci wasu namun daji guda biyu su kashe mutum 42 daga suka baci Annabi Al'ysa'u (Prophet Elisha) kuma haka akayi . Acikin Second book of Samuel 16 v 5-13 , an tashi hille kan wani Mutum da ya Zagi Annabi Dauda da jama'arsa in bancin da wasu bayanai suka zo ma Annabi Dauda akansa . .
Ina son Matthew Hassan Kukah yasan cewa Baibul yace duk wanda ya zagi uwarsa ko ubansa shima akashe shi har sai ya mutu . Ka duba Leviticus 20 v 9 da Exodus 21 v 17 da Matthew 15 v 4. Idan har bible yayi umurni ga kashe duk wanda ya zagi uwayensa , ina ga wanda ya zagi Allah ko Manzon Allah ? Ina son Matthew ya bani Amsa . Acikin Genesis 20 v7 Allah yayi gargadi ga wani Sarki a Masar da cewa kada ya kuskura ya cutar da Annabi Ibrahim ko ya amshe masa matarsa , idan ko ya aikata haka zai kashe shi . Shi kansa yesu waton Jesus , yace akashe duk wanda yayyi musun sarautarsa ko Annabtar sa , yace a yanka shi kamar rago. Ka duba Luke 19 v 27 cikin Bible . Daga karshe ina son Matthew Hassan Kukah da sauran Kiristoci su kara duba Matthew 12 v 32 inda Jesus yace duk wanda ya zagi Mala'ika Jibril waton Holy Spirit kenan , ga wani Bangare na bible an kira shi Holy Prophet kamar First book of John 4 v 1-3 , ba za a gafarta masa ma duniya da lahira har abada . Waton za a kashe shi kenan a nan duniya kuma gobe kiyama zai dawwama cikin wutar jahannama . . Bayan wannan akwai hukunce hukuncen kisa da dama acikin bible wanda zamu iya nuna maka . 

Saboda haka , Matthew Hassan Kukah wallahi kaji tsoron Allah kada wannan rayuwa ko matsayin da kake da shi acikin kiristoci su rude ka har ka daure ma karya gindi . Don Allah ka fito fili ka fada ma kiristoci gaskiya kada ka yaudare su . Idan har kace wai ba a yiwa Debirah adalci ba don kashe ta da akayi to ita tayi ma musulmin duniya adalci da ta fito karara har ta baci Manzon Allah Amincin Allah su kara tabbatuwa gareshi ? Ko kasan Musulmi nawa ta jefa cikin bakin ciki da rashin lafiya akan wannan mummunan zance Nata? Idan har kai mai adalci ne ya kamata ka nuna hushinka ga abinda ta fada ga Manzon Rahma na muni kamar yadda ka nuna hushinka akan kisan da aka yi mata . 

Wallahi Matthew , ina son ka sani cewa duk abinda ta fada na batanci ga Annabi , idan kai kanka ko wani Musulmi ya fadi irin wannan mummunan magana shima za a kashe shi komi matsayin sa a duniya ko Nigeria. Daga karshe idan baku son hukuncin kisa , abinda ya kamata gareku sai ku daina bacin Annabawan Allah ko kuma ku sake canza baibul dinku da shima yazo da hukunce hukuncen kisa daban daban . 
Gudunmuwa da kuma Sako zuwa ga Matthew Hassan Kukah daga Husaini Yusuf Mabera

YA ALLAH YA HALICCI KANSA?!

Haka wani bawan Allah ya tambayeni ta â€œMessengerâ€ amma yace wani â€œatheistâ€ ne ya tambayeshi. Tare da cewa wasu za su dauki tambayar a matsayin daya daga tambayayoyin da suka haramta a fahimtar da suka yi wa addini don haka ya wajaba a wurgar da ita, ni ina ganin babu wata tambaya mara muhimmanci a addini sai wacce aka fi son jahilci akan ilimin amsarta. Jahilci kam kowane iri ne duhu ne. 

Ni ban taba tsoron tambayoyi ba, ko daga gurin jama'ar gari ko daga gun manyan mulhidai daga masana falsafa. Na shirya karanta litattafan duk wani gagarumin mulhidi, tun daga Epicurus, Nietzsche, Freud har zuwa kan Dawkins ko Krauss. Imani a gurina baya nufin zama cikin jahilci bayan haddace shika-shikai 6, yana nufin ci gaba da neman gaskiya har sai zuciya ta nutsu. Wannan shi na fahimta da cewa imani yana karuwa ko yana raguwa, gwargwadon aikinka na daâ€™ar neman gaskiya bisa tauhidin Ashâ€™ariyya. 

A tsarin ilimin â€œLogicâ€ ko â€œMandiqâ€, tambayar ya Allah ya halicci kansa tana daga cikin manyan shirmen tunani. Irin tunanin da masanan falsafar suke kira da â€œLogical Fallacyâ€. Lokacin da mutum ya tambayi ya Allah ya halicci kansa, yana nufin kenan dama can da akwai Allahn sannan yazo ya halicci kansa! Wannan shirme ne. Abu ba zai taba zama akwai shi sannan babu shi a lokaci daya ba. Kamar kaine ka tambayi ya akai ka samar da kanka. To hakan na nufin dama can da akwai ka sannan kazo ka samar da kanka! Hakan kuma ba zai yiwu ba. Sai dai akwai ka sannan ka samar da waninka amma ba kai ka samar da kanka alhalin dama akwaika ba.

Bisa ilimin sufanci da â€œtheologyâ€, masana kamar Abu Hamidil Gazzhali a Musulinci da Saint Thomas Aquinas a Kiristanci (wanda shi ma agun masu â€œIlmul Kalamâ€ ya dauka), suna ganin cewa babu ta yadda zaka san abu ba tare da sanin kishiyarsa ba. Ka san duhu ne saboda ganin haske da kake. Ka san sharri ne saboda samuwar alkhairi. Ka san fari ne saboda samuwar baki. Da ace babu samuwa to ba zaka san rashi ba. Idan kana son ka san Allah to duk halittarsa da ka gani sai ka yi tunanin shi sabaninta ne. Tsarin Ubangiji gaba daya ya saba da tsarin halitta. Duk abinda kake gani yana samuwa to ya saba da irin samuwar Allah. Wannan shi Allah ya dunkule a wata aya yake cewa bashi da tamka ko guda daya. Ù„ÙŠØ³ ÙƒÙ…Ø«Ù„Ù‡ Ø´Ø¦ 

To amma akwai wani abu da Immanuel Kant yake fada a littafinsa â€œCritique of Pure Reasonâ€ cewa duk abinda zamu iya tunani to ba zai iya fita daga abubuwan da muke iya gani ba. Tare da cewa Allah ba shi da jiki kuma ba shi da guri kamar yadda sauran halittu suke, to amma tunanin dan Adam dole yana haskomasa Allah mai jiki da guri saboda bai taba ganin abu mara guri da jiki ba. Don haka wasu suke tunanin Allah a sama yana zaune akan kujera da malaâ€™iku suna shawagi. A tauhidin Kiristoci kuwa har zanen Allahn suke. Wannan kam duk kuskuren sanin ya Allah yake ne da yake tasowa daga â€œtashbihiâ€ ko â€œtajsimiâ€ da ake kira da â€œanthropositivemorpismâ€. Babu wanda ya san ya Allah yake ko ya taba ganinsa, don haka babu mai iya tunaninsa daidai. Duk abinda ya darsu a zuciyarka game da Allah to ya sabawa haka, saboda zuciyarka tana tunanin iya abinda ta taba gani ne. Kai kuma baka taba ganin Allah ba.

Maulana Jalaludden Rumi yana fadin cewa : mafi girman sanin Allah shi ne shiru! Kalmomi sun yi kadan su fadi waye Allah. Duk abinda zaâ€™a iya magana akansa to sabanin Allah ne. Daga lokacin da ka gane haka to shi ne ka san Allah, kuma mai fahimtar haka ake kira da â€œArifiâ€ a sufanci. 

Allah ne mafi sani 

Aliyu Dahiru Aliyu 

25th July, 2018

Abokan zaman ta sun tabbatar da cewa tunda ranar da aka kaita har zuwa ranar da aka fitar da ita kullum tana cikin tsayuwar ta rokon Allah mafita.

Cikin ikon Allah bata cika sati 2 ba Allah ya kawo mata mafita ta zamo daya daga cikin wadanda MSII ya biya wa bashi aka cire su.

Wannan website din 17 positivest ne kawai acikinsa, na turawa Adsense ranar 12 July

Adsense yakarbi shi yau 17 July kwana biyar kenan, website din WordPress ne kuma ko sau daya ba a dawo dashi ba

Karin Haske:

Akasarin abin da Google yake dubawa idan katura site shi ne ingancin (Quality) wannan website din

Ba iya rubutun da ba kayi copy a wani waje Google yake kaddarawa amatsayin Quality content ba

Abin da akasari Google yake dubawa (a fahimta ta) yaya wannan website din yake a idon masu shiga (visitors)

Ma'ana, muddin kana rubutun da zasu dauki hakalin visitors to Insha Allah Adsense zai karbi website dinka

Duk lokacin daka tura website shima Google abin dayake dubawa shin rubutun ka zai dauki hankalin visitors ko a'a

Idan yaga abin da kake rubutawa bashi da muhimmanci to koda ba copy bane, Adsense zai dawo da website dinka (rejected)

Karin haske: kadena yin rubutun da zaka dauki hankalin Adsense, kanemo abin da zai dauki hankalin visitors, zakayi mamakin yadda Adsense zai karbeka cikin sauri.

Note: Akwai rubutun da nakeyi akan Adsense Approval kamar yadda nayi alkawari

ZALUNCIN WASU DAGA CIKINMU BA ZAI BARI MU GA DAIDAI BA

Kanin Mijinta ne ya yi raping yarta karama, aka wayi gari cikin tashin hankali, cikin kuka mahaifiyar ta nemi a kaita asibiti kanin mijin ya ce ba shi da kudi, haka ta dauki yar aka tafi da ita asibiti likitoci suka bukaci dole sai an kamo wanda ya yi aika-aikar, daga karshe jami'an tsaro suka kamo shi aka yiwa yarinyar dinki saboda ya lalata gabadaya, shi kuma kotu ta yanke masa hukunci aka kai shi gidan gyaran hali, sai dai tun da aka yanke hukuncin mijin ke masifa za ta raba masa zumunci ta sa an kama kaninsa, kwanaki uku da yanke hukuncin ya ce mata shi zai yi tafiya, ya tsallake ya barta da yara goma sai da aka yi wata shida bata ji ko labarinsa ba, wahalar ciyar da yayan nan guda goma ta rataya a wuyanta, har da jariri dan sati biyu ya tafi ya barta, don haka ko ina amso bashi ta ke yi domin ta ciyar da yarannan, da wahala ta isheta ta nemi wani abokinsa ta tambayi ina ya ke, yace ai shi sun rabu da shi tuni yana can, ba ta dai saka wannan mutumin a idonta ba sai da aka shekara cif aka kawo shi gida ranga-ranga ba shi da lafiya, babban tashin hankalin yanzu bashi ya mata yawa har an kaita kotu ana neman a kamata a kaita prison, yanzu haka gudu ta ke yi ba ta iya kwana a gidanta, rannan cikin dare ga ruwa aka zo kamata ta gudu, ta buya wani kofar gida za ta kwana anan, wani mai shayi ya ganta a titi cikin dare ga sanyi ya bata aron shagonsa ta kwana, yanzu don Allah matar aure tana kwana a shago saboda gudun kar a kamata, ya ya ku ke tunanin rayuwar yaran da ta haifa goma da hakkin ciyarwarsu akanta ya ke, kuma tana gidan ma an yiwa daya daga cikin fyade ina ga bata gidan, kuma babu abinci?

Ta biyu kuma rabuwa suka yi da mijinta ya ki ciyar da yaransa ta kaishi kotu aka yanke masa hukuncin zai dinga bata wani abu duk wata, to yaki ta yi sintirin kotun har ta gaji ya ki ciyar da yaransa, yanzu ta rasa ina za ta saka kanta saboda masifar babu ga yara.

Ta uku mahaifinta ne tace ba ta taba gani yayi sallah ba ko da azumi kuwa, ga bakin talauci da suke ciki sai su yi sati basu dora abinci ba a gidansu, ga gidan duk ya rushe, ko ina zubar da ruwa yake duk kwanikan gidan sun daye, daga mazan har matan gidan sai dai kowa ya nemi abunda zai ciyar da kansa, babu mahaifinsu da ruwansu, har harkar fim ta so shiga amma ba ta samu an dauketa ba, yanzu don Allah ta yaya za ka samu tarbiyya a wadannan yaran? yaran da suke neman yadda za su rayu ko ta halin kaka.

Daga daran jiya zuwa yau da safe na ji wadannan koke-koken kaina kamar zai fashe, ni na rasa ta ina zamu fara gyara wadannan masifun da ke bibiyarmu, wato ba za ka gane irin masifar da muke ciki ba sai kana sauraran shirin Rayuwa da 'Yanci na freedom radio, tabbas da nice Barista Badiyya da ke jin irin wadannan koke-koken wallahi da yanzu hawan jini ya kama ni ko ciwon zuciya, Allah dai ya kawo mafita, amma akwai jan aikin a gabanmu.

Senator Ahmad Babba Kaita ya bada Umarnin a amshi CV din Kawu Malami, Graduate din Agricultural Engineering din nan wanda rashin aiki yasa ya fara tura kurar Yana sayar da Ruwa.

Kawu dai tun 2014 ya kammala karatun sa a UNIMAID, Bai samu aiki ba. Dukda kasancewa shi Dan Bauchi ne, Amman Sanatan Sanatochi, Borderless Senator ABK, yasha alwashin, idan dama ta samu zai bashi aikin yi.

Allah ya saka wa Distinguished Senator Ahmad Babba Kaita da alkhairi. Allah ya Kara wadata mana su cikin al-ammah, Amin.
PHYSICAL CHALLENGE IDAN KASA ISA KA KIRA SUNANA MANA DA WLH NA CHI UBANKA MAKAHO MAI KWANA DAKIN MAI GADI

Nasan malaman sakandire da na jami'a da yawa wanda su ka mallaki gidan kansu ba tare da chin bashi ko Naira daya ba. Nasan kananan yan'kasuwa da su ka mallaki gidajen kansu a Kano, kuma babu bashin banki ko daya.

Amma anan Amurka kusan kowa a bashi yake siyan gida. Talakawan su kuwa, a haya su ke karewa. Ko kana da gida, sai ka biya masa harajin dole duk shekara. A Nigeria ma akwai wannan harajin (property tax) amma kusan kowa baya biya.

Ko kun ki, ko kun so, dole a cewa da mijin iya Baba. Nigeria akwai damarmaki, sai godiya.
idiomatic express: dole ace da mijin iya Baba

Muna Fatan A Samu Wanda Zai ÆŠora A Inda Buhari Ya Tsaya, Cewar Ambaru Sani Wali

A bayyana shugaban tarayyar Najeriya, Muhammadu Buhari a matsayin mai yin aiki tukuru domin kafa Najeriya kan ingantacciyar turbar sahihin ci gaba mai dorewa.

Ambaru Yahaya Sani Wali, ce ta bayyana hakan lokacin da take ganawa da manema labarai a Daura.

Ambaru Sani Wali, ta ce daman tun farko, kokarin da shugaba Muhammadu Buhari yake kokarin yi shi ne kafa kyakkyawar turbar ci gaban Najeriya domin Dora komai a bisa turbar da ta dace, kuma a halin yanzu, shugaba Buhari na kokari kan aiwatar da hakan.

â€œSaboda haka muke kara yin kira ga daukacin yan Najeriya da su ci gaba da bayar da cikakken hadin kai da goyon baya ga shugaba Muhammadu Buhari domin ya sauke nauyin da ke kansa na jagoranci a kasa baki daya, kasancewar abin da shugaban yake yi aiki ne ba na mutum daya ba kowa sai ya bayar da cikakken hadin kai da goyon baya da nufin Bukata ta biya nufiâ€.

Ambaru, ta kuma yi kira ga daukacin alâ€™umma baki daya da su bayar da hadin kai da goyon baya ga wanda Jamâ€™iyyar APC ta tsayar takarar shugaban kasa domin ya ci gaba da aiwatar da ayyukan alkairin da shugaban Muhammadu Buhari yake domin kasa tare da jamaâ€™arta su kai ga nasaraâ€,.

Haka zalika Ambaru Sani Wali, ta ce abu ne mai matukar muhimmanci ga jamaâ€™a su sani cewa ya na da alfanu kwarai su ci gaba da bayar da hadin kai ga yan takarar da APC ta tsayar a dukkan matakai daban-daban saboda a samu nasarar gudanar da jagorancin alâ€™ummar kasa.

Sai ta kara fadakar da jamaâ€™a game da muhimmancin kowa ya tabbatar da duk wanda ya Isa kada kuriâ€™a da ya karbi rajistar da za ta bashi damar yin zabe a shekarar 2023 mai zuwa.

Ta kuma ce su masu aikin yin rajista da kuma yi wa jamaâ€™a katin dan kasa da su ci gaba da yin hakuri da jamaâ€™a saboda wasu da yawa ba su san muhimmancin yin katin ba, amma idan aka yi hakuri aka kuma fadakar da jamaâ€™a, sai a yi wa kowa da ya Isa zabe rajistar ko kuma ga yan kasa a yi masu katin dan kasaâ€.

â€œAkwai lokacin da muka yi aikin hadin gwiwa tare da matar Gwamna aka rika biyan kudin Babura ga mutane su je ayi masu rajista domin sanin muhimmancin kuriâ€™ar lokacin zabe da kuma bayan zabenâ€.

Majiyar Focus News Hausa, Gaskiya Ta Fi Kobo

Lokacin da mace ta ce tana son namiji da gaske, a matakin farko tana tunanin aurensa ne, don haka za ta yi duk abin da ta san ba zai rabata da shi ba. A lokacin za ta fara tunani a zuciyarta shin ta barshi ya tabata idan ya nema don kada ta bata masa rai ko kuma ta ce masa aâ€™a don ya dauka tana da tarbiyya? Shin ta karbi kudin da ya bata ko kuma ta nuna masa ba ta so don ya dauka ba â€œlashe moneyâ€ ba ce? 

A hakika macen da ta hana wanda take so ya tabata ba lallai ne tarbiyya ce ta sanyata hakan ba. Tsoro ne na kada ta barshi ya tabata daga baya ya dauka bata cancanci ya aureta ba. Wacce kuma ta bari ya tabatan tana tunanin rashin barin zai sa ya gudu ya ce mata ba wayayyiya ba ce, karshe ta yi asararsa. Tare da cewa yanayin muhallin yarinya yana da tasiri akanta, amma so ya fi juyata fiye da yadda ake zato domin so ya kan rufe idon mai yinsa. 

Tamkar macen da za ta nuna maka ba ta son kudi ne don ka aureta. A zuciyarta tsoro take kada ta rasaka idan ta fiye karbar kudinka don haka sai ta dinga ce maka ka barshi. Kai kuma a tsakanin abokanka kana ta cewa ka samu macen da bata damu da abin duniya ba. Da ka aureta za ka gane rashin son kudin na ta na tsoro ne ba na gaskiya ba a lokacin da ta ce maka kudin cefane bai isa ba. 

Bahaushe na cewa maso abin ka ya fika dabara, don haka mata suke da dabarar da maza basu santa ba. Wasu halayyoyin sai bayan aure suke fitowa sai ka ji namiji yana cewa â€œba zaka taba gane wadannan mutanen baâ€. Amma a hakika da tun asali ya yi duba na tsanaki ko ya yi karance-karance akan wasu abubuwan da bacin ransa akan abin da ya gani zai ragu tun da ya san zai iya zuwa tun kafin ya zo. 

Ta haka mace take yin rufa-rufarta a lokacin da namiji yake ta yi mata karyar yana da abin da bashi da shi don ya janyo hankalinta. Idan ya ce mata shi wani ne alhalin shi din ba shi ba ne, sai ta nuna masa tana da halayyar da a hakika bata da ita domin ta ja hankalinsa har ta ga ta sameshi.

Anyi wani alhaji a wani kauye da ake Kira KUZO KUJIYA

WANNAN ALH akwai yawan dukiya Amma bashi samu haihuwaba tsawon rayuwarshi
Sai ya dinga tunane a zuciyarsa cewa yanzu idan ya mutu suwaye zasu gajesa,

Allah maijin kukan bawa, wata Rana ya Kai matarsa asibiti domin zazzabi Yana damuwarta, kawai Sai likita yagamai cewa matar tanada juna biyu

Tun daga wannan ranar alh yake cikin farin ciki, har aka wayi gari anhaifi yaro namiji

Alhji ya dinga baiwa wannan yaro kulawa fiye da yadda yakamata, duk abinda yaron yakeso shine zabin alh, yaron baya mutunta kowa baya dajarja kowa hakankuma baya ganin kowa da mutunci, saboda babansa shine babban attajiri a wannan kauyen, yaron Yana rashin mutunci iri-iri Amma ko ankaishi awajen hukuma AIKIN banza Sai alhaji yayi anfani da Kudi a magagance matsalar

Wata Rana wannan yaron dadan alhaji, Sai ya hadu da wata budurwa wadda yake mutuwar sonta, Amma ita sbd ta sanan halayensa Sai tagayamai cewa ita batason mutune masu irin halayyarsa,

Sai wannan yaron take gudabwajen mahaifinsa yagamai yaga budurwa Yana sonta Amma tagayamai ita batason mutune masu irin halayena, Sai alh yasanya fadawansa suka kaje wajen IYAYEN wannan yarinya domin suyi masu rashin mutunci, Amma suna zuwa Sai sunka tarar da dadan alhaji awajen Yana rokon wannan budurwa tayi hakuri ta amince da soyayyarsa, shikenan suka dawo sukayiwa alhaji bayanin abinda sunkagani

Dadan alhaji Yana cikin rokon wannan budurwar Sai ga mahaifita yafito daga gida Sai mamaki yakamasa Amma Bai Bari sunganshiba, da wannan budurwar ta Koma cikin gida Sai mahaifinta ya tanbayeta minene dadan alhaji yazo Yi akofar gidanan, Sai tace ai yadade Yana nuna yana Sona ,Amma ya zanyi da mutun Mai irin halayensa

Da yake mahaifita malamin ADDININ MUSULUNCI ne, Sai yace alhamdulillah, Sai wannan budurwar tace meye yake faruwa babana, Sai yace ba mamaki wata kila Allah zaiyi anfani dake wajen gyara halayen dadan alhaji

Zanci gaba da kawo maku wannan lbr give, INSHAA ALLAH,

Ta wace hanya za a kauce wa matsalar?

Sau da yawa, idan mutane suka ga yaron da kansa ya É—an mole ko ya taÉ“e daga goshi ko Æ™eya sai su ce wai laifin ungozomansa ce da ba ta daidaita kan yadda ya kamata ba. Sai dai, wannan magana ta yi hannun riga da binciken masana. Domin Æ™oÆ™on kan jarirai an haÉ—a shi ne da Æ™asusuwa masu faÉ—i guda bakwai, waÉ—annan Æ™asusuwa suna haÉ—ewa kuma su yi Æ™arfi har su bayar da cikakkiyar siffar Æ™oÆ™on kai a cikin watanni shida. 

Saboda haka, kan jarirai na iya canja sifa idan aka samu Æ™arancin lura yayin raino, musamman a watannin farko bayan haihuwa. 

Me ke kawo kan jarirai ko yara ke molewa, taÉ“ewa ko kusurwa daga goshi ko Æ™eya?

Daga cikin matsalolin da ke haddasa wannan matsala akwai matsalar nan da a ke cewa "positivesitional Plagiocephaly" a turancin likita. Wannan matsalar sifar Æ™oÆ™on kai tana faruwa ne sakamakon kwantar da jarirai a bayansu tsawon lokaci ba tare da ana jujjuya su ba. Sakamakon Æ™oÆ™on kan jariarai bai gama yin Æ™wari sosai ba, wannan ya sa Æ™oÆ™on kansu ke da haÉ—arin yin kusurwa.

Daga cikin alamun sun haÉ—a da:

1] Molewa, taÉ“ewa ko kusurwar Æ™oÆ™on kai daga Æ™eya.

2] SaÉ“awar kunnuwa; ta yadda idan aka kalli kan yaro ko jariri daga sama za a ga kunnen É“arin da ke da matsalar ya zarce gaba zuwa fuska fiye da na É—aya É“arin.

Wannan matsala an kasa ta zuwa : Mafi Æ™aranci, matsakaiciya da kuma mafi tsanani.

Amma wannan matsala ba ta shafar aiki ko lafiyar Æ™waÆ™walwa, sai dai matsalar sifar Æ™oÆ™on kan kawai.

Abubuwan da ke iya janyo wannan matsala:

Bayan kwantar da jarirai tsawon lokaci a bayansu ba tare da ana jujjuya su zuwa hagu, dama ko rib-da-ciki ba.

Akwai abubuwan da ke Æ™ara haÉ—arin samun molewar kan jarirai kamar haka:

1] Æ˜arancin ruwan mahaifa yayin goyon ciki.

2] Æ˜uncin Æ™ugu ko mahaifar uwa.

3] ÆŠaukar cikin tagwaye, ko fiye da haka.

4] ÆŠaurewar tsokokin gefen wuya da ke kawo noÆ™ewar wuyan jariri zuwa gefe guda wato "muscular torticolis", da dai sauransu.

Yadda za a magance faruwa matsalar.

Abin yi shi ne da zarar an haifi jariri to lalle ne a É—inga lura da yanayin kwanciyarsa. 

Misali:

a] A riÆ™a zuya shi daga kwanciyar rigingine zuwa kwanciyar [magirbi] gefe; wato hagu ko dama ta hanyar tokarewa da naÉ—aÉ—É—en tawul ko zani. Ko kuma kwanciyar rib-da-ciki, amma a yayin kwanciyar rib-da-ciki akwai buÆ™atar Æ™ara lura da kuma sanya ido sosai. Domin kada hancin jariri ya toshe ya hana shi numfashi.

b] A É—inga canja gurbin kai da Æ™afafu, misali, idan yanzu kan jariri yana Gabas, to sai a juya ya koma Yamma. Hakan nan daga Kudu zuwa Arewa.

c] A rage yawan lokacin da jarirai ke É—auka a cikin kujerar raino ko keken raino.

d] A É—inga jujjuya kai ko fuskar jariri daga wannan É“ari zuwa wancan É“ari.

Idan iyaye ko ungozomomi za su lura da waÉ—annan shawarwari za a rage afkuwar wannan matsala.

Sai dai, idan kan yaro ya wuce fiye da watanni uku bai koma daidai ba, ko kuma akwai jinkirin matakan girma, to akwai buÆ™atar zuwa asibiti domin ganin likita.

Bugu da Æ™ari, idan kin lura jaririnki ba ya son kallo ko juya kansa zuwa wani É“angare, ko kuma idan aka yi Æ™oÆ™arin juya fuskarsa zuwa wani É“angare yana kukan ciwo, to akwai buÆ™atar ganin likitan fisiyo.

Jirgin Santiago 513 Wanda Ya 'Bace' A 1954, Ya Dawo Zuwa Kasa A 1989 Tare da kwarangwal.

Labarin al'amarin mai daure kai da ake zargin ya afku a jirgin Santiago mai lamba 513 tsakanin 1954 zuwa 1989 yana ta zagayawa tsakanin mutane Da Wanda Su ka Yadda Da Wadanda Basu Yadda Ba! shekaru da yawa yanzu kuma har yanzu.

Bisa labarin da tabloid Weekly World News ta buga a shekarar 1989, Jirgin Santiago mai lamba 513 ya tashi a ranar 4 ga Satumba, 1954 daga Aachen, Jamus ta Yamma Da Fasinjoji 88 Da Ma'aikatan Jirgin Guda 4, kuma an shirya zai Sauka A positiverto Alegre, Brazil bayan sa'o'i 18. 

Sai dai kuma jirgin ya bace Tekun Atlantika. A lokacin bacewar, hukumomi sun yi imanin cewa jirgin ya fado Ne, an kafa Kwamitocin bincike da dama domin gano Gawar fasinjojin ko Tarkacen jirgin amma ba a gano komai ba. Kuma Ba'a Gano Inda Jirgin Ya Fada Ba.

Lokaci ya wuce kuma shekaru da yawa sun shude. Tuni dai kamfanin jirgin na Santiago ya Tsaya Da Kasuwanci Kamfanin Ya Rushe, a shekarar 1956, shekaru biyu kacal bayan bacewar Jirgin kuma bayan an kasa gano ko da wata alama ta hadarin jirgin, aka dakatar da binciken.

Bayan shekaru 35 Da Fatan Jirgin a ranar 12 ga Oktoba, 1989, A filin jirgin sama na positiverto Alegre a Brazil Sai A ka hango wani jirgin sama Ba Zato Ba Tsammani Ba Tare Da Neman iznin Sauka ba, yana kewaya Filin jirgin saman. Jamiâ€™an kula da zirga-zirgar jiragen sun yi kokarin tuntubar matukin jirgin amma ba su samu amsa ba.

Daga Æ™arshe, jirgin ya zo kusa da titin jirgin kuma ya makale Tayoyin Sa Ya sauka A Cikin tsari mai kyau kuma injinan suna ci gaba da aiki ko da bayan Da jirgin ya taÉ“a Kasa. 

Da mahukuntan filin jirgin suka tunkari jirgin cikin taka-tsan-tsan, sai suka bude kofofin jirgin daga waje.

Dubawar Nan Da Sukayi, Sai Suka Hango kwarangwal 92 na mutanen da ke cikin jirgin (fasinjoji 88 da ma'aikatan jirgin hudu) "sun makale a cikin kujerunsu. Lokacin da suka bude kofofin jirgin, sai suka ga matukin jirgin, Kyaftin Miguel Victor Cury, shi ma a kwarangwal, hannu sa a kan na'urorin Jirgin.

Ibrahim Y. Yusuf Wata Rana yake cewa:- 

HAR YANZU AKWAI MATSALA FA
ğŸ‘ªğŸ‘ªğŸ‘ªğŸ’‘ğŸ‘ªğŸ‘ªğŸ‘ª

Daga Lokacin da ya zamto mace na goyon ciki amma kullum tana cikin kunci da Kuka lokaci zuwa lokaci, wannan na shafar yanayin bugun zuciyar abunda take dauke dashi (heart rate) wanda yakan iya developing din heart problems tun aciki jaririn Sannan a ita kanta bazata ke saurin warkewa ba Akan lokaci in rashin lfy ta sameta. Don wajibi ne mazaje kugane matarka fa abokiyarka ce, kanwarka ce, kawarka ce, jikinka ce baki daya don haka kai duk yadda zakai ka kyautata.

GA INDA BAYANIN NAWA YAKE

Akwai babbar matsala tabbas ayanxu mata sun dukufa suna zuwa Awo (ANC) Amma Basa zuwa asibiti haihuwa.

A gaskiya muna asarar rayukan mata masu dumbin yawa Sakamakon matsalolin dake biyo baya bayan an haihu. Kamar yadda nake fada muku bafa agane an haihu lafiya sai ansami kwana 40 da haihuwa. Wallahi mu muka san irin kididdigar da muke samu kauyuka, garuruwa da birane.

Lallai muna bukatar mata su ringa zuwa asibiti haihuwa, Saboda jijjiga, da zubar jinin da komi, Wallahi dole mu kau da tunanin babu da zancen talauci. Daga Sanna kaga iyalinka da ciki ya kamata atanadin da zaka fara ya zamto harda na kaita asibiti ta sami kulawar jami'an lfy wajen haihuwa don girman Allah.

Musamman jihata ta kano tana daga gaba gaba cikin jihohin da ake rasa mata. Yanzu anyi tsari aduk yadda mace ta saba haihuwa za'a barta ta haihu ahaka; walau a ruwa, a tsugune, atsaye, akwance ko adire.

Fatan wannan sakon ya shiga kunnuwan mu, musamman Yan uwana maza wannan matsalar daga kune, wani azzalumin yana da hali Amma in an magana sai Yace za'a jawo masa wahala ko kuma wani ma da niyya Amma Yan uwansa su hana, to kasani iyalinka hakkin ka ne kuma kai Allah zai kama da laifi ba Yan uwanka ba. 

Domin inta mutu hidimar abincin da zakai da sauran dawainiya ai ka kashe ninkin kudin asibitin, wani dama baya gane Allah yai masa baiwa sai Randa ya rasa abunda yake ganin ada bakomi bane.

Inkana son matarka da gaske to mugani a asibiti. Allah yasa mudace.

(Ibrahim Y. Yusuf)

Tsawon Shekaru sama da 100 da kirkirar wasan kwallon kafa a duniya ,inda aka kirkireta a shekarar Alif dubu daya da dari takwas da sittin da uku (1863 ) a kasar ingila dake nahiyar Turai, inda taci gaba da gudana har zuwa lokacinda muke ciki yanzu.
Tun daga wancan lokaci da aka fara gudanarda kwallon kafa zuwa yau an cigaba da kafa Tarihi kala-kala na ban mamaki ban, haushi da Al'ajabi ya danganta da tasirin abun ko faruwarsa akan masu kallo.

1885 - 1886

A ranar 12 ga watan 
Satumba a shekarar 1885 tawagar kungiyar kwallon kafa ta Arbroath Ta lallasa Bon daci 36 babu ko daya a gasar cin kofin kungiyoyin kwallon kafa na kasar Scottish mai taken (Scottish Cup) a zagaye na farko a gasar.
Wasane wane daya kasance mafi muni ma'ana Wanda akafi cin zarafin kungiyar kwallon kafa A tarihi.

Tun a farkon farkon fara wasan ne Arbroath suka jefa kwallaye 15-0 a gaga zuwa rabin lokaci, inda bayan an dawo hutun Rabin lokaci ne suka zira kwallaye 21 raga. Jaridar wasannin ta Scotland ta bayyana Cewar a lokacin da aka buga wasan an bugama mai tsaron raga kwallaye guda 41 amma saidai guda biyar ne kacal basu shiga raga ba.

Alkalin wasa Dave Stormont ne ya busa wasan inda daga baya ya yi ikirarin cewa "ya busa mummunan wasa kuma mai matukar wahala a Tarihin Rayuwarsa".
An yi iÆ™irarin cewa mai tsaron gidan Arbroath Jim Milne Sr bai taÉ“a Æ™wallo ko dayaba har aka tashi daga karawar.
John Petrie ya zira kwallaye 13 a karawar kuma har yanzu shike rike da kambun 'yan wasan mafi yawan kwallaye da aka zira a wasa daya a Tarihin kwallon kafa na duniya.

An haife shi a Tehran, Iran a ranar 12 ga Nuwamba, 1817, sunansa na yana mirza Husayn-' ya taso cikin gidan attajirai da babbar daula. Tun yana Æ™arami, yake nuna ilimi da hikima na ban mamaki.

A matsayinsa na matashi, maimakon neman aikin gwamnati kamar yadda mahaifinsa ya yi, Mirza Husayn-'AlÃ­ ya zaÉ“i ya ba da loÆ™acinsa da rayuwarsa wajen kula da talakawa. Bai nuna sha'awar neman matsayi a siyasa ko aikin gwamnati ba.

Kamar yadda yake a tarihi Allah yana aiko da Æ´an aike ga bil'adama ta hanyar jerin manzanni na Ubangiji wadanda kowannensu ya kafa addini mai girma. Manzannin sun haÉ—a da Ibrahim, Krishna, Zoroaster, Musa, Buddha, Yesu, da Muhammad.

Na baya-bayan wadannan Manzanni shi ne Bahaâ€™uâ€™llÃ¡h, wanda ya kawo sabbin koyarwar ruhi da zamantakewa don zamaninmu da muke ciki. Ya koyar da cewa Allah É—aya ne, cewa dukan addinan duniya daga Allah suke, kuma yanzu ne lokacin da â€™yan Adam za su gane kaÉ—aitanta kuma su haÉ—a kansu banda wariyar addinin ko Æ™abila.

Yayarda da dukkanin manzannin da suka gabace shi kamar Musa , isa, muhammad, da dukkanin addinai yana koyarwar cewa kana da zaÉ“in Æ™in bin ubangiji ko binsa sannan kana da zaÉ“in yin addinin da ka ga ya dace da dai-dai fahimtarka ta hanyar nazari da tunaninka.

Menene jigon Addinin?

Addinin baha'i ya Æ™arfafane ga mutunta kowanne É—an adam da kyautata mu,amala ga kowa sannan ba wani bauta keÉ“antacciya kowani sadaukarwar dabba ko yanka abu mai rai dan hidimtawa Allah.

Æ™in jinin wariyar launin fata, daidaiton jinsi, yadda da kowanne addini, ilimin kimiyya sune ginshiÆ™in addinin.

adadinsu a duniya a Æ™idayar 2020 sunkai miliyan takwas da dubu É—ari biyar da talatin da É—aya da guda hansin.(8,531,050 in 2020.).

A shekarar 1990 ne gwamnatin Æ™asar iran ta sanar da cewa duk inda aka ga baha'is kashe shi. hakan yasa suka ta yanka su suna jefawa rijiya manya da Æ™ananasu har da Æ´an makaranta.

Ko a yanzu mabiya addinin baha'i suna fuskantar muzgunawa da kisa daga Æ´an shi,ar Æ™asar iran ta É“angaren samun guraben karatu kuwa baka isa kaci takardun manyan makarantu da sunan kai É—an addinin baha'i bane.

MU KOMA GA ALLAH

1. Da zarar ka tashi za ka bude data don ganin sakon duniya. Amma Sallar Asuba cikin jam'i ta gagare ka. Mu koma ga Allah.

2. Kana iya minti 90 cikin kallon ball idan an yi rashin sa'a a tafi karin lokaci. Amma Sallar farilla ta gagare ka cikin Jam'i don kallon ball. Mu koma ga Allah.

3. Kana iya haddace 'handout' don ganin ka ci jarrabawar duniya ta dan Adam, Amma baka iya haddace surah daya ta Alqur'ani don guzurin lahira. Mu koma ga Allah.

4. Kana da halin kyautar mota don neman suna, Amma baka da hannun kyautatawa gajiyayyu da marayu don neman lahirarka. Mu koma ga Allah.

5. Kana da lokacin musu, Amma baka da lokacin yi wa Annabi salati. Mu koma ga Allah.

6. Kana da kudin sayan mota da sutura ta alfarma, Amma sayan tsinsiya ta sharar dakin Allah ta gagare ka. Mu koma ga Allah.

7. Kana da lokacin karanta jarida, Amma baka da lokacin karanta maganar mahaliccinka. Mu koma ga Allah.

8. Kana iya kuka don asarar abun duniya, Amma tuna azabar kabari ya gagare ka. Mu koma ga Allah.

9. Kana da lokacin kallon 'season film', Amma vaka da lokacin sada zumunci tagagarebka, don neman haye siradi. Mu koma ga Allah.

10. Kana da lokacin zuwa ko ina ne don neman abun duniya, Amma neman ilimin sanin mahaliccinka ya gagare ka. Mu koma ga Allah.

11. Kai ne jagora wajen zalunci da cin dukiyar al'umma, Amma kiran sallah (Ladanci) abun kunya ne a gareka. Mu koma ga Allah.

12. Ka zabi rayuwar duniya fiye da ta lahira, bayan ba ka san yaushe za ka mutu ba. Mu koma ga Allah.

KAI DAN UWA A MUSULUNCI KA SAKE TUNANI

1. Talauci ba ya hana bautar Allah. Tuna da tarihin Annabi Muhammad (S.A.W).

2. Idan hassada ake yi ma, Tuna da tarihin Annabi Yusuf. (A.S)

3. Idan radadin ciwo zai sa ka manta da Allah tuna da tarihin Annabi Ayuba. (A.S)

4. Idan zallan kin ka ake kan gaskiya, tuna da tarihin Manzon Allah (S.A.W).

5. Idan wani abu ne ya dame ka, waraka na cikin *Alkur'ani.* Karanta ka bar wa Allah komai.

Idan ka karanta ka tuwa wani don shi ma ya karu.

Allah ya sa mu gama da duniya lafiya.

Da ni da sauran 'yan uwa wadanda na tabbata we constitute the majority idan aka ambaci wannan kalma ta Sex ko Sex education to fa abin da muke kawowa shine jima'i ko ilimin jima'i. Idan kuwa aka ce jima'i to fa saduwa tsakanin namiji da mace ake nufi, kuma magana ta gaskiya mu da idan aka ambaci Sex muke tafiya akan jima'i ake nufi bamu da wata fassara da muke mata bayan wannan. Idan masu fafukar ganin an fara koyar da wannan ilimi suna nufin ilimin jima'i ko saduwar da muka sani za a koyar to ina ganin they should have a second thought. Wannan fa al'ummace da ake kokawa da ita wajen ganin ta rage haihuwa gaba gadi, al'ummace da jima'i yake cikin ababen da suke sahun gaba a muhimmanci. A wannan al'ummar babu wani mai bukatar a koyar da shi yadda ake jima'i. Malam da zaka ba Makaho mata, ina tabbatar maka bayan watanni 9 ka dawo zaka tarar da dankwalelen yaro, kaga kuwa karshen kwarewa kenan. Magungunan shirin ko ta kwana gasu nan birjik, iyayen yarinya na shirya 'yarsu, ango yana shiri kamar za a yi wani yakin basasa. 

Magana ta gaskiya in dai ilimin jima'i ko saduwar da muka sani ne za a koyar to ina ganin ba mu da bukatarsa a wannan al'umma. Domin kuwa duk cikanmu kwararru ne, mun kai matsayin a debemu a kaimu wasu al'ummu mu rika bada darussa. Amma idan ilimin jima'i da muke ji daga wurin masu wannan fafutuka ya kun shi wasu ababe da muka jahilta baya ga shi saduwan kansa to lallai muna da bukata.

Aikin kenan! Sai kai magana game da yadda duniya ta ke ci gaba sai a ce, ai su malaman Musulunci, halattawa da haramtawa shi ne aikinsu kawai. Okay! Abin dariya wallahi. Ba an ce akwai ilimin Boko da na Addini ba, shin me yasa ilimin Boko shi ne yake tafiyar da duniya da duk wani nau'ikan ci gaba na fannin kimiyya da fasaha. Shin me yasa shi ilimin Addini a yanzu yake raba kan al'umma, kuma ya fi bada muhimmanci game da rikice-rikice da suka faru a daruruwan shekaru, wasu tatsuniya ce, wasu kuma duk karin gishiri ne, wa'yanda ba za su bawa rayuwarmu wani ci gaba ko taimako ba, sai dai haddasa gaba da kiyayya, wataran ma hadda zubar da jini, duk saboda wani rikici da ya faru na kusan dubunnan shekaru.

Abin da kullum yake ba ni mamaki shi ne, yau duniyar musulunci ba za ka taba ganin sun ba da wani muhimmanci na nazariyya ba, misali kamar irin su hukumar NASA da ke America, wadda za ka ga sun dauki lokaci mai tsayi wasu ma shekaru ne duk don kawai su samarwa da duniya ci gaba. Misali, Albert Einstein ya dauki shekaru yana bincike akan abubuwa irinsu BigBang, da Theory of relatively, BlackHole har ya mutu yana kan wannan aikin nasa. Sai a yanzu ne aka samu masana irinsu Stephen Hawkins kasancewarsa daya daga cikin daliban Albert, su ka ci gaba da tattara bayanai har ta kai ga an gano shi kansa wannan BlackHole din, da yadda yake magnetic din galaxies da suke rayuwa a space.

A gefe guda, bayan tattara wannan bayanan da turawa suke yi ta hanyar amfani da ilimin science and technology. Kawai sai muka ji saukar malamanmu na musulunci, suna fadin, ai su dama wannan BlackHole din sun jima da sanin bayanansa a cikin Al'qur'ani mai girma. Kuma na rantse da Allah da ya halicce ni, da su masana ilimin bokon basu fito da wannan bayanan ba, da wallahi ba za su fadi cewa sun san wani wai shi BlackHole ba. Shin me yasa da ba su fito da shi ba, sai da su suka fara fitowa sannan suka ce sun sani a cikin Qur'ani. Dan Allah mu ji tsoron Allah.

NEMAN CHANJI TA KOWANNE HALI DA KUMA KOWA MATSALA NE, IDAN BAKASON A ZAGI UBANKA TO KARKA ZAGI NA WANI

Babu laifi idan kana neman chanji ka samu ka karba sai dai ka tabbatar ka qirga ya kai dai dai abinda ka bada aka canza maka dashi, babban kuskure shine ka karba kawai ka danna a aljihu saboda naka ya isheka kana ganinsa a banza bayan kuma mai daraja ne.

Haka mukayi a 2015 idonmu ya rufe muna neman chanji ta kowanne hali da kuma kowa saboda an samu matsaloli maimakon mu duba nagartattu a ciki mu sake basu dama mukayi mirsisi mu chanji muke da bukata aka bamu kuwa amma bamu qirga ba muka zuba a aljihu dattawa, wasu malamai da masu hangen nesa sukace mana ku kirga chanjin nan bai cika ba, muka dinga zaginsu da aibantawa duk darajarka lokacin indai ba chanji kake bukata ba banza ne kai, ko addua kayi kace Allah Yayi mana zabin abinda yafi alkhairi zaa ace kai munafiki ne ga alkhairi nan kana gani. Haka kuma aka canza tunda kaddara ta riga fata kuma wanda yaqi ji ko bazai qi gani ba koda makaho ne jikinsa zai gaya masa.

To yanzu a gundumata wasu suna bukatar chanji ido rufe kuma da kowa, tsirarin ciki suna da hujja mai karfi,amma wasu babu hujjar ma wai kawai gajiya sukayi da Jagora, wasu kuma ta bukatar kai kuma basa duba alfanunsa ga alumma wanda hakan kuskure ne kun yadda Allah shine Yake bayar da mulki amma kuke tuhumar saboda me Jagora zaiyi ya qara maimaitawa kenan wa kuke jinginawa alamar tambayar? Idan Allah Yasa zai sake bashi idan kuwa bai soba sai hakuri.

Idan bakaso a zagi ubanka kada ka zagi na wani domin yadda kake kallon iyayenka, mai gidanka a siyasa a matsayin abin koyi kuma zaka iya jan zare da duk wanda yayi kokarin taba muhibbarsu. To hakikanin gaskiya haka yayan dan siyasa, basarake malami da talaka suke kallon nasu kuma zasu iya yin komai domin kare darajarsu. Fadi gaskiya ita kuwa kwai radadi.
Kokarin dole saika nunawa alumma saboda su kakeyi bata lokacine kabar kowa da tunaninsa kawai lokaci alqali ne.
Allah Ya zaba mana mafi alkhairi.

~NDS.

Good morning beautiful people of Arewa.

Ibrahim Zazzaky Shirgegen Makaryaci Ne, Cewar Malamin Shi'a Hamza Lawal

Daga Indabawa Aliyu Imam

Fitaccen Malamin Shi'a a Najeriya Malam Hamza Lawal ya caccaki Ibrahim Zazzaky yana mai cewa mutum ne makaryaci mai son duniya da mulki.

Hamza wanda tsohon dalibin Zazzaky ne ya kuma bayyana Zazzaky a matsayin wani mutum mai matacciyar zuciya wanda ke son a girmama shi fiye da yadda ya cancanta.

"Zazzaky ne saboda tsabar karyarsa idan yana zaune da mutane sai ya tashi ya shiga wani wuri, idan ya dawo sai ya ce wai Imam Mahdi ne ya kawo masa ziyara suka gana." A cewar Hamza Lawal.

Ya kuma ce da kunnensa ya ji Zazzaky ya shirga wata karya a ranakun Kudus cewa suna da wata Kyamara wacce ke zuko adadin cincirindon mutane tare da lissafa adadinsu har ta kure lissafinta amma ba ta iya lissafa mutanensa ba, yana alfahari da bugun kirji da wannan.

Kana Malam ya ce Zazzaky ya sa mabiyansa sun mayar da shi kamar Ubangiji, ta yadda suke kashe kawunansu ta dalilinsa, ya bukaci Zazzaky da ya gaggauta fitowa ya tubar wa Allah bisa ikrarinsa na cewa muddin aka taba shi Najeriya ba za ta zauna lafiya ba duba da dubban mabiyan da yake da su. Wanda hakan ne ya yi silar mabiyansa suka nemi rigima da sojoji a watan disambar shekara ta dubu biyu da goma sha biyar.

Ko a kwanakin baya an ga Zazzaky a wani bidiyo yana mai cewa Sojoji sun harbe shi a ido, wanda ta kai idon nasa ya fado kasa amma ya dauke shi ya yi addu'a ya mayar da shi, kuma ya zauna ras har ma yana ganin komai lafiya lau. Wanda jama'a da dama suka yi masa martanin cewa labarinsa ba gaskiya ba ne don ya sa'ba da hankali.

Tun da jimawa Malaman da ke adawa da Malam Zazzaky suka bayyana maganganunsa cewa karairayi ne. A cewarsu ya sha kirkirar karya ya zantar da ita don ya 'bata sahabban Annabi da matansa wanda idan za a kashe shi ba zai iya nuna labarin ko ingancinsa a littafan tarihin musulunci ba. Malam Zazzaky sun kuma ambace shi cewa mutum ne mai raunin ilmin addini wanda ko ba'kin karatu ba ya iya ja daidai.

ALLAH NE KAÆŠAI KE SAKAWA WANDA YAYI SO NAGASKIYA

Lateefa budurwa ce me kimanin shekaru ashirin da daya, wacce Allah ya bata kyakkyawar sura ga asali,sai dai kash lateefa ta haÉ—u da matsalar rashin gani (wato makanta) wannan yajawo mata jinkirin aure,sau da yawa idan manema sunfito daga sunfahimci lalurar ta sai su sulale.

Kwatsam sai Allah ya hadata da Nabeel saurayi me Addini ga Asali ga nutsuwa ga tarbiyya, haduwar su keda wuya ya faÉ—a Kogin sonta, lokacin da ya bayyana mata halin da yashiga na sonta da kanta ta nemi ya janye saboda lalurar da take damunta, amma Nabeel be janye ba sai ma qara qaimi da yayi, hakan ya jefa lateefa cikin duniyar farinciki,ta gamsu da cewa tasamu me share mata hawaye.

Ana tsaka da soyayya ne watarana lateefa taji kira daga asibiti cewa tazo asibiti za'ayi mata dashen idanuwa,wani bawan Allah ya sadaukar mata da idanunsa kuma yabiya kuÉ—in aiki, lallai tayi murna sosai kuma tayi addu'a ga wanda yayi mata wannan sadaukarwa,akayi mata aikin idanu kuma cikin ikon Allah akayi Nasara ganinta ya dawo ras,tayi murna dangi da masoya suka tayata murna.

Nan ne ta bukaci tanason Ganin masoyinta Nabeel,ko da yazo sai ta ganshi babu idanu guda biyu,nan take tace dashi kayi haquri aure bazai yiwu tsakanin mu ba tunda kaga kai makaho ne nikuma yanzu na warke,kaje ka nemi yar uwarka makauniya.
Nanne Nabeel yace da lateefa babu komai dama burina shine samar miki da farinciki,na haqura da nawa idanuwan ne aka cire su aka sanya miki, sannan nabiya kudi aka yimiki dashe....nabaki farincikina ne nikuma na karbe baqincikinki....

TABA MUTUNCIN ANNABI (SAW) MUSIBA NE

Yau shekara guda kenan Shugaban Zindikai na jihar Kano Abduljabbar wanda masu bin addinin shi'ah suka ingizashi suka kaishi suka baro yana ta fama a Kotu da gidan yari

Abduljabbar ya rasa madafa, ya rikice, kullun a cikin wasa yake da hankalin kotu, sama da shekara guda ya kasa kare kansa da hujja ko guda daya, Lauyoyinsa duk sunyi fada da shi sun gujeshi saboda mu*gun halinsa

A zaman kotu da ya gudana yau, Lauyan da ya saura yake kareshi bai halarci zama ba, daga karshe Abduljabbar yace bai yadda da alkalin da yake masa shari'ah ba, yana neman a canza masa wata Kotun saboda zindikanci da rashin kunya irin nasa

Haka dai Abduljabbar zai kare cikin wu*lakanci da zarya tsakanin gidan yari da kotu sakamakon ya taba mutuncin Shugaban halitta (SAW), duk iskancin da mutum zaiyi a duniya ya kiyaye taba martaban Annabi

TSAKANINA DA BABANSU WATA BUDURWATA MARYAM

Haka na ta6a durawa Baban wata budurwata ashar. Naje zance wajan yarsa on one faithful Friday misalin 5pm, sai kwatsam yafito nikuma wannan dama shine zuwana wajanta na farko kuma tareda izininta naje. Yana fitowa wai "Kai waye kai"? Nace sunana Ahmadu ni dan anguwa kazace.."Meya kawoka wajan wannan yarinyar" ? Nacemai munhadu a hanya ne last week shine na tareta nace inasonta harna kar6i lambarta kuma shine tace indai dagaske nake toh inzo gidansu inna samu lokaci shine yau nazo.

Kawai basai mutum ya fara zantuka na cin mutunci ba, "sabida kai dan iskane shine zakazo dan tace kazo, bakada tarbiyya har zakazo ka tsaya min a gaban gida kai ga shege". Nacemai Baba kayi hakuri nayi laifi, na bashi hakurine sabida har wannan lokacin dayake soki burutsu yarsa tana tsaye a wajan kafin yace ta tafi gida, aikuwa tana shiga gida a zuciyata nace yauwa. Yana kara zagina nacemai Baba kada ka sake zagina tunda bawani abun banza kaga inayi da Maryam ba. Ido na ganin ido nazo wajanta kuma saida na tambayeta shin ana zuwa gidansu zance tace eh. Kawai ya kawomin mari wai yana magana ina magana zanmai rashin kunya, na kauce na ja balance dakyau ina jira ya shigoni in baje dan wahala. Aikuwa budar bakinsa wai "kutumar ubanka dan iska", nikuwa nace Baba mecin durun uwarka, ubanka yaci uwatai. Yashiga gida da sauri kanya fito naja gefe na nemi dutse katoto da niyyar yana fitowa in rusamai kai wallahi. Toh hakadai nakai 5 minutes bai fitoba saina tafi.

Yanzu maganarnan danake ba'afi wata biyuba naga ankirani da new number ashe Maryam ce, ina picking tacemin Maryam ce wacca kuka hadu a waje kaza, nace eyyah yakike ya gida? Hakadai muka gaisa tacemin yaushe zamu hadu nacemata bana gari amma idan na dawo zamu hadu mu gaisa insha Allahu, tace toh kamin magana ta WhatsApp da wannan lambar. Yanzu haka muna WhatsApp da'ita lafiya lau.

A Kano hakan ta faru bayan Corona.

AREWA! MUNAFUNCI DODO NE!

Lokacin da Kiristoci suka kashe ÆŠimbum mutane a Jos da suka zo Wucewa. Kuka ce Kar a ÆŠauki Doka a Hannu. Shin zuwa Yanzu wane Hukunci Gwamnati tayiwa Wadannan mutanen da sukai kisan kan?. 

Lokacin da Akayiwa Sojan Nan Kisan Wulakanci a Kudu aka Yanka su Shi da Matar da zai aura aka Yanke Kansu. Aka Yanke al'aurar matar aka dora akan Cikinta. Aka Haskawa Duniya Saboda Wulakanci da Tozarci. Kunji Gwamnati ta É—auki Mataki akan Wadanda Sukai Kisan Kan?. 

Lokacin da Ake Kashe Fulani da Dabbobinsu a kudu. Kisan Wulakanci Wane Mataki Gwamnati ta É—auka akansu masu yin Kisan?. 

To Bari na Baku Wani Karamin Misali da ya faru a Kwanakin Baya kusan dai 2years. Da wata Yarinya Kirista tace wani ÆŠan arewa Direba ya saceta a ABUJA. Akan Titin Dutsen Alhaji Kusa da open University. Kiristoci suka yiwa Direban tara-tara ba tare da binciken karya ne ko gaskiya ne ba. Suka saka taya suka Cinna masa wuta. Kunji Gwamnati tace don me yasa suka É—auki doka a hannunsu?. 

A kudu Basa jira. Kullum daukar Doka suke a hannunsu ko karamin laifi wanda suka raina yayi musu Yanzun nan Zasu aika dashi lahira. Nasha ganin ana kona mutum a Lagos akan laifin da bai kai ya kawo ba. Bare kuma Laifin da La'ananniya Deborah Samuel tayi. Wanda shine mafi girman laifin da za kaiwa Musulmi yaji ransa ya sosu. Ya kasa jurewa. 

Yanzu dai ya isa Munafukai 'yan Arewa izna su gane cewar; Ran É—an kudu Kirista É—aya yafi ran 'yan arewa na state 10 da Suke kiran kansu da zafafa Goma a ranar ZaÉ“e. Daraja da muhimmanci. 

Domin kuwa an kashe Deborah Samuel akan batanci da tayiwa Fiyayyen Halitta. Wanda ko a bibble na gaske laifi ne ka zagi kowane Annabi. Amma Hankalinsu ya tashi suna neman a dauki fansa. Da namu aka kashe a Kudu babu abinda zai faru. Cikinmu ne ma yan arewar wasu zasu yi rawa da murna suce ai Allah shi kara. Ko don saboda banbancin ra'ayi ko saboda banbancin akida. 

Anan Social Media kuna sane da cewar; ko Gwamna ka Zaga a shafinka na Facebook ba ma shugaban kasa ba. In dai kana Nigeria ko cikin uwarka zaka koma sai an kamoka an hukuntaka?. To amma wai an zagi wanda aka halicci duniya domin sa. Muke cin arzikinsa da alfarmarsa. Shine har ake samun wasu gurbatattun musulmai a cikinmu suke cewa abinda aka aikatawa wadda tayi batancin ba daidai bane. Bayan abinda ta furta ko ga Uban mutum ta furta. In dai ka haifu baka barin ta haka sai ka dauki matakin yi mata dukan tsiya SBD zagi tayi irin na gatsali da wulakanci. 

Allah ka kara mana Soyayyar Manzo Sallallahu Alaihi Wassallam da Iyalan Gidansa. 

Amin summa Amin. 

Larabi Larabeen 

Sunday 15th May, 2022.

Yace, "Kai wani irin Malami ne banda zancen Jima'i baka maganar komai". Nace masa ina yi mana akwai darusa na soyayya, tarbiya, Zamantakewar na rayuwa duk muna yi. Sai yace "Amma dai kafi magana akan Jima'i ko kunya da tsoron Allah baka ji". 
Nace masa ai shi Allah Ne da kansa ya bani lasisin koyarwar shi yasa nake yi babu tsoro ko shakku. Budan bakinsa sai yace, "da kai da masu neman illimin duk 'yan iska ne ai". Sai nace mun gode.
Nan take nayi screenshot na wata daliba da ta turomini matsalar da take da ita a gidan mijinta. Na yadda take da jarabar tsiya, kuma ga lalura ya kama mijinta baya iya mata komai. Har take bani labarin akwai lokacinda abokin mijinta har ya kwantar da ita sai babban dansu ya buga musu kofa. Ita kuwa bata gama bani labarin ba sai ta ciro shafinsa ta turomini nace ai shima yana cikin friends dina amma uztaz ne wai shi.
Ganin hoton data turomini itada yaron ne bayan shafinsa kuma na gane shi tun a rannan, saboda yadda yake yawan mini koment na shi na Allah ne. Ban taba ce masa komai ba. Sai wannan karon daya tsine mana na tura masa hotonsa da suka dauka da uwarsa da kuma sakonta ya ga irin daliban da yake tsinewa.
Duk kuwa ba sunan uwar ko hotonta bane a shafin nata. Yana ganin hoton data tura mini ya fahimci kuskuren da yayi.
Tun daga ranar har yau din nan tuba yake yana bani hakuri a tunaninsa zanyi posting maganar da ya mini dana mahaifiyarsa. Ko kulashi ni banyi ba ma.
Har lambata nayi mamakin yadda akayi ya samu domin nidai tunda na dawo ba kowa nake baiwa ba a cikin mutane dana sani ma bare wadanda bansani ba haduwar Facebook saboda tsaro. 
Duk kuwa da bai dace na fito masa da sirrin danayi da uwarsa ba akan Ubansa da abokin Ubansa. Hakan ya zama dole ne saboda yara irinsa masu rawan kai da iyayi. Ko uwarka bata Facebook cikin awanni 24 zan iya bankado wani abu game da kai ko na kusa da kai da idan na fadamaka sai kaji hawa Facebook ya fice maka a rai.
Don haka idan bakada ra'ayin abunda mukeyi ka ja jikinka ka bamu wuri. Baka fimu sanin Allah ko neman kusanci da shi ba.
Wannan gargadi ne.

full_text: Ina fada maka ayar Qur'ani kana cewa wai kowa yayi fahimtarsa. Toh idan aka zo yi maka hisabi kace fahimtarka kake bi. Walakiri ubanka zai ci!

NEMAN CHANJI TA KOWANNE HALI DA KUMA KOWA MATSALA NE, IDAN BAKASON A ZAGI UBANKA TO KARKA ZAGI NA WANI

Babu laifi idan kana neman chanji ka samu ka karba sai dai ka tabbatar ka qirga ya kai dai dai abinda ka bada aka canza maka dashi, babban kuskure shine ka karba kawai ka danna a aljihu saboda naka ya isheka kana ganinsa a banza bayan kuma mai daraja ne.

Haka mukayi a 2015 idonmu ya rufe muna neman chanji ta kowanne hali da kuma kowa saboda an samu matsaloli maimakon mu duba nagartattu a ciki mu sake basu dama mukayi mirsisi mu chanji muke da bukata aka bamu kuwa amma bamu qirga ba muka zuba a aljihu dattawa, wasu malamai da masu hangen nesa sukace mana ku kirga chanjin nan bai cika ba, muka dinga zaginsu da aibantawa duk darajarka lokacin indai ba chanji kake bukata ba banza ne kai, ko addua kayi kace Allah Yayi mana zabin abinda yafi alkhairi zaa ace kai munafiki ne ga alkhairi nan kana gani. Haka kuma aka canza tunda kaddara ta riga fata kuma wanda yaqi ji ko bazai qi gani ba koda makaho ne jikinsa zai gaya masa.

To yanzu a gundumata wasu suna bukatar chanji ido rufe kuma da kowa, tsirarin ciki suna da hujja mai karfi,amma wasu babu hujjar ma wai kawai gajiya sukayi da Jagora, wasu kuma ta bukatar kai kuma basa duba alfanunsa ga alumma wanda hakan kuskure ne kun yadda Allah shine Yake bayar da mulki amma kuke tuhumar saboda me Jagora zaiyi ya qara maimaitawa kenan wa kuke jinginawa alamar tambayar? Idan Allah Yasa zai sake bashi idan kuwa bai soba sai hakuri.

Idan bakaso a zagi ubanka kada ka zagi na wani domin yadda kake kallon iyayenka, mai gidanka a siyasa a matsayin abin koyi kuma zaka iya jan zare da duk wanda yayi kokarin taba muhibbarsu. To hakikanin gaskiya haka yayan dan siyasa, basarake malami da talaka suke kallon nasu kuma zasu iya yin komai domin kare darajarsu. Fadi gaskiya ita kuwa kwai radadi.
Kokarin dole saika nunawa alumma saboda su kakeyi bata lokacine kabar kowa da tunaninsa kawai lokaci alqali ne.
Allah Ya zaba mana mafi alkhairi.

~NDS.

SAYYADI ALI DAGA BAKIN SAYYADI MU'AWIYA!
Gajeruwar Kissa'

An bayyana cewa, wani mutum ya tsero daga rundunar Ali Dan Abu Dalibi zuwa ga rundunar Mu'awiyya a yakin Siffin. Sai mutumin yace wa Mu'awiyya "na gudu daga rundunar waccan marowacin, matsoracin sannan kuma dolo". Sai Mu'awiyya da Abokinsa Amru Bin Ass suka yi murmushi, sai Mu'awiyya yace masa, " da kace marowaci, wallahi da duk duwatsun Hijaz za su zama dinare to da duk baza su kwana ba Ali sai ya rabar da su. Da kace kuma matsoraci, shin ka taba ganin ya gwabza da wani ba shi ya yi nasara a kansa ba? Da kuma ka ce Dolo, a duk sadda ya yi wata magana duk cikin Larabawa babu mai iya yi masa martani".

A yayin da wannan mutumin yaji irin wannan 'recommendations' daga bakin abokin hamayyar Imamu Ali, sai abin ya ba shi mamaki sai ya ce "to amma kun san wannan me yasa kuke yakarsa?". Sai Mu'awiyya yace " waye baya son mulki?". Sai mutumin nan yace " to tunda ku masu fadar gaskiya ne, to zan yi muku tambaya idan kun sani ku gaya min gaskiya don Allah". Sai suka ce " yi tambayar idan mun sani zamu fada maka". Sai mutumin yace " Hadisin nan da a ke fadi na 'Aliyun ma'al hakk, Al-hakku ma"a Ali (Aliyu na tare da gaskiya, ita ma gaskiya tana tare da Ali) shin don Allah da gaske Manzon Allah ya fadi haka?" Sai Mu'awiyya da Amru Bin Ass suka ce tabbas wallahi kunnuwan nan namu sun ji Annabi ya fada". Sai mutumin ya sake cewa, " to kun san wannan to me yasa kuke yakarsa?". Sai suka amsa masa da; " waye baya son mulki?".

TAMBIHI:
To idan ga dalilin da yasa Sayyadi Mu'awiyya da Amru Bin Ass. Suka yaki Ali, wato mulki kuma sun yi mulkin, to ni da kai da muke jayayya wajen kare su meye ribarmu? Mu ma mulkin za mu samu? Ko kuwa kawai fushi da fushin wani? Idan kuma muka yi biyayya ga Wanda Manzon Allah yace mu yi masa biyayya, me muka rasa? Ashe yin biyayya ga Manzon Allah ba shi ne musulunci ba? Da fatan Allah ya kara shiryar da mu a tafarkin tsira da ni mai rubutu da kai mai karantawa, amin.

Kwamared Sani Shehu

Wasu Dabi'un Da Baka Raba Yara Dasu
#Tsangayarmalamtonga 
Akwai wasu halaye ko dabi'un yara da baka iya raba yara dasu. Irin wadannan dabi'un maimakon iyaye su bar yaransu suyi sai su musu gyara, sai kaga suna dukansu ko gallaza musu akansu.
Ga Irin dabi'un da yaran suke dasu, da kuma yadda za a musu gyara.
#tsangayarmalmantonga 
1:Kuka: Yara sunada dabi'a na kuka. Wannan kukan shine hanya mafi sauki na aika sakonsu na rashin jin dadin wani yanayi da suke ciki musamman yaran da basu soma magana ba.
Kada uwa ko iyaye suce zasu daki yaro ko masa tsawa idan mai yawan kuka ne. Maimakon hakan suyi kokarin gano abunda yake sashi kukan. Idan jariri ne kila wani bangare na jikinsa ne yake masa ciwo, ko yana jin yinwa ko zafin yanayin inda yake.
Su kuma manya marasa magana harma da masu magana suna iya fadi ko inkiyar abunda ke damunsu.ta hakan ne za a rarrashesu domin ganin sunyi shuru amma ba musgunawa ba.
Domin shi kuka dabi'a ne na duk wani yaro mai lafiya, rashin kukan yaro masana sunce kodai zai iya tasowa a dolo ko kuma yana da wani nakasu.
2: Yawan Tambaya: Yana daya daga manyan dabi'un yara. Yaro yakanso yayi tambaya akan duk abunda bai fahimta ba ko ya gani a farko.
Bama wannan ba, yaro ba iya tambayarka yadda aka haifeshi aka haifeka aka haifin wanda ya haifeka, har Allah Yara na tambayar wanene babanshi.
Kada ku hana yara yin duk wata tambaya, kuma kada kuki basu amsar da zai gamsar dasu.
Yaran dake da yawan tambaya masan sun sinfantasu a matsayin yara masu kaifin fahimta.
3: Son Kai: Yara suna da matukar son kansu. Wannan dabi'a ne da aka samunsu a wajen yara na neman mallakan wani abu ace nasu ne su kadai. Haka nan ko wani abun kwalama aka basu wannan na kokarin ya cinye domin a kara masa.
Da yake wannan ba dabi'a bane Mai kyau, kada iyaye suce zasu yiwa yara kyara ta hanyar horo mai tsanani.
Nuna masa alfanun taimakawa wani idan baida shi. Kuya masa yadda ya kamata yayi. Tsorata ta hanyar shiga wuta ga duk mai rowa da mai boye abu yace kuma a bashi wani. Ta haka ne yaro zai bari ba tare da ka cutar da shi ba.
4: Kwakwayo: Yara sunada dabi'ar su kwaikwayi duk wani abunda suka gani a zahiri ko a talabijin. Ka kula da abunda yake son ya kwaikwaya, idan abu ne mai kyau sai ka kara nuna masa yadda ya dace yayi ka kuma karfafa masa gwaiwa. Idan kuma ba abu bane mai kyau sai ka masa gyara da tsoratarwa da barazana.
5: Kishi: Musamman 'ya'ya mata, suna da kishin da koda wani ko wata suka gani tare da iyayensu sai sun nuna kishin su.
Baya ga yarinta kishi dabi'a ne da 'ya mace don haka baka iya hana diyarki mace kishi ta hanyar duka ko horo mai tsanani ba. Amma kana iya hanata ta hanyar rarrashi, laluma da kalamai masu dadi kamar dai yadda kake yiwa uwarta idan kana so ka mata wayo.
#TsangayarMalam 
Da fatan iyaye zamu fahimci cewa su yara ba a iya hanasu ko musu gyara da duka ba, amma da barazana sai yaro ya maka abunda kake so.
Allah Ya albarkacemu da Yara na gari masu albarka. Ya kuma shirya mana wadanda muka haifa damu baki daya

PANTAMI CIKAKKEN MUNAFUKI NE MAKARYACI

Duk wanda ba dakiki ba zai fahimci gaskiyar da ke bayyane a zahiri, masu zurfin tunani sun gane cewa wannan mutumi mai suna Pantami duniya ce a gabansa ba Allah da Annabi ba

Ku dubi yadda Buhari ke zalintar jamaar najeriya musamman arewa da buhari ya jima da kashewa, ku dubi matakan da buhari ke zartarwa wanda suka sabbaba tsadar abinci da tsadar rayuwa wanda jamaa ke mutuwa da yunwa

Ku dubi yadda gwamnatin buhari ta yi sakaci ake kashe mutane a garuruwan arewa, amma pantami yana ina don kutumar burar ubansa abubuwan nan ke faruwa ya yi shiru bai tsinana komai ba?

Don durun uwarsa shi pantamin ba shine a baya yake sallah yana alkunutu wa PDP ba? Ba shi ne ke kiran PDP azzalumar jamiyya mai kashe yan kasa ba? Ba shine ke cewa PDP na zaluntar jama'a ba tana tauye musu hakki ba? Ba shine me tunzura jamaa su yi wa PDP bore ba? Don gutsun uwarsa shi pantamin bai san abubuwan da ke faruwa yanzu sun ninka na wancam lokacin ba?

Ba shine yake kuka cewa yan siyasar kasar nan musamman ministoci suna facaka da kudi amma mutane na kwana da yunwa ba? Ba shi muka gani yake yin dresin din miliyoyi kudi a jikinsa ba? Ba shi yake bada labarin cewa duk wanda ya shiga siyasa a najeriya sai ya kwashe kayansa a gaban Annabi S ba? Ba shi ke cewa mutum ba zai zama minista a najeriya sai yanki tikitin jahammana ba? Shi yanzu tikitin ya yanka?

Yanzu ya zama karen farautar azzalumai, ana zalunatar alumma yana gani yayi shiru saboda ya sami mafitar kansa sai kokarin baiwa azzaluman shuganni kariya da yake yi, ka je ka dakko FFK cikakken kafuri makiyin musulunci da arewa, ka kwashi kudin jamaa kaje ka sayi farfesan bogi saboda son duniya da son girma da kake yi, kaje kana bin yan film karuwan kannywood kana musu kwamen Allah ne kadai ya san barikin da kuke yi tare, ka zama cikakken makaryaci ministan da aka baka ba ka tsinanawa jamaa wata tsiya ba sai harajin VAT, ana garkuwa da mutane ana waya da iyalansu ana biyan makudan kudin fansa amma ka kasa daukan matakin dakile hakan kana nade tabarmar kunyarka ka kana batun NIN wanda ya zama shirme ban bata ganin dakiki jakin minista a najeriya ba kamar PANTAMI ba

Jamaa ku shaida, idona idon pantami sai naci kutumar durun uwarsa wallahi tallahi sai dai jami'ai su kashe ni

Tsinannen mutum la'ananne munafuki mayaudari makaryaci azzalumi barawo dan rashawa, Allah ka tsinewa pantami duniya da lahira ka wulakanta shi ka hadashi da musiba kamar yadda ya ci amanarka Allah da annabinka

Ku kuma dakikai dabbobi makiya gaskiya saboda kungiya, na zagi pantami na ce ya ci kutumar uban babansa, duk wanda ya fasa zagina a cikin kutumar ubansa ina zaune a unguwar Kabara Kano sunanan Mansur Sani Ibrahim masheki Kano

Namiji baya yaudara saidai a kwace miki shi indai ke shashasha ce, koba haka bane mazan gidan nan? ğŸ˜œğŸ˜‚

Namijin Da Yake Da Wadannan Siffofin Zai Iya Sace Zuciyar Mace Ko Da Sarauniya Ce.

Goron Sallah

A soyayyar gaske wacce babu kwadayi ko jari-hujja a cikinta. Ga irin manyan siffofin da suka fi jan hankalin mace :-

1. Nutsuwa da tsafta (Gentility and Neatness) - Nutsuwa ce ake fassarawa da "basarwa" a bakin matasa. Shashasha shine mara kan-gado wajen magana da mu'amila. Nutsatstsen mutum ba a cika gajiya da zama dashi ba. Mace 'yar kwalliya ce. Tana son namiji mai kwalliya amma fa bata so ya dinga finta kyau. Tafi so ta fika amma kaima tana so kayi kyau. 

2. Namiji jajirtacce (Focus and Hardwork) - irin wadannan mazan har maza 'yan uwansu suna burgewa. Rayuwa da mutum mai manufa alheri ce saboda ana sa musu rai da cigaba.

3. Wayayyen namiji (Wiseness) - Wayewar kai itace, yin abinda ya dace a lokacin da ya dace. Wayayyen mutum yana da saurin sabo (familiarity). Mace tana son namijin da zai iya sace zuciyar 'yan gidansu da gaggawa.

4. Namiji mai barkwanci da iya zance (Jokes and Eloquence) - Mata suna son barkwanci. Shiyasa duk mutumin da yake saka mace dariya yana da wahala ta rabu dashi cikin sauqi. Maza masu harshe suna saurin jan hankalin mata saboda suna son hira mai dadi.

5. Qwazo da yabo (Vibrancy and Appreciation) - Namiji mai fasaha yana daukar hankalin mace. Misali, idan har zata shiga cikin 6acin rai tana son mutumin da zai iya kwantar mata da hankali cikin hikima. Wani namijin ya iya abubuwa da yawa. Sannan tana son yabo idan tayi abu ko da kwalliya ce.

6. Kulawa (Caring) - Maza masu baiwa mace kulawa suna da wahalar fita daga zuciyarta. Mace tana so a dinga kula da ita kamar wata jaririya. 
7. Kyautar bazata da kamun kai (Surprised gifts and Decency) - Kyautar bazata tana qara wa namiji kwarjini a wajen mace. Kada ka zama marowaci. Matan arziki basa son namiji mara kamun kai saboda kishi da tsoro.

Kudi baya siyan so saidai na qarya. Matarka ta dinga fatan ka mutu saboda dukiya.

INDA MATSALAR TA SAMO ASALI

Ina zaune wayata ta yi ringing na dauka sai na ji kukan mace da karfi, cikin kukan tana magana da karfi 'Anty Maza macuta ne, Maza Azzalumai ne...ba su da imani.' Jin yadda matar nan ke fadin maganganu kala-kala kuma tana kuka ya sa na ce, kin ga kashe wayar ki gama kukan ma yi magana anjima.

zuwa can ta kara kira lokacin ta daina kuka, sai na ce mata ina jin ki gaya min me ya faru, cikin damuwa ta fara bayani 'Anty ina cikin matsalar zaman aure mijina kullum fada zagi cin mutunci, zargi ga wulakaanci kala-kala, jiya ta kai har duka na ya yi duk ya farfasa min jiki, yarana suna ji suna kuka amma bai sauraresu ba.'

Na nisa na ce bai kyauta ba, amma ke me ki ka yi masa har ya kai ga dukanki, domin ance karfe daya baya amo, cikin sheshekar kuka ta ci gaba da magana.

'Yarona na biyu ne ya je ya yi fada da yaran makota har ya fasawa daya kai, aka zo aka kawo masa kara, shine ya kama bala'i wai shi gaskiya ya gaji da masifar yaranan, shi ya fara shakka ma anya yaran nan jinin sa ne, shine raina ya baci na ce masa, ai tunda kasan ka saba barin 'ya'ya ga matan banza a titi dole ka yi zaton wadannan ma ba yaran ka ba ne, shine fa ya hau dukana yana zagina da gaya min munanan kalamai yar iska, sakarya, shashasha!.' 

Ta kara fashewa da kuka tana magana ' Na rantse da Allah Anty ban taba sanin wani namiji a duniya bayan mijina ba, amma shine ya ke min wannan zargin, wallahi Allah ya isa.'

Ta ci gaba da kuka sai da na barta ta yi ta gama sannan na ce mata, yanzu ina son zan miki wasu tambayoyi, kar ki boye min komai, ke a ganinki meye dalilin da ya sa mijinki ya ke miki wulakanci, shin kin aure shi ne saboda kudi, ko ke kika ce kina sonsa, ko iyayanki sun masa wulakancki ko dai wani abu da ban lissafa ba ne ba?

Ta ce 'Wallahi lokacin da na aure shi ma a gidan haya muke, da kyar ya samu yayi gida mai daki biyu, kuma har yanzu kullum sai an futa an nema, sannan iyayena sun aura masa ni ba tare da sun bukaci komai ba, kuma yanzu fa saboda wulakanci cewa ya ke yi, wai wallahi da ya na da kudi da tuni ya rabu da ni ya auro yar mutunci, biyayya ina yi masa daidai gwargwado ina kuma hakuri da shi, amma wallahi na gaji yanzu.'

Cikin kalamanta na kama wata kalma daya don haka da ita na kara tambayarta, kin ce yana cewa zai auro yar mutunci tsakaninki da Allah me hakan ke nufi, kin taba wani abu na zubar da kima ne a gurinsa, ko kafin aure ko bayan aure ki gaya min gaskiya.

Ta yi shuru tsahon lokaci sannan ta nisa ta ce ' Eh gaskiya kafin mu yi aure, bayan an saka mana rana wata tara idan muna zance yana bukatar ya taba jikina ni kuma ina kin yadda, har ta kai yana fishi yana cewa bana son shi, daga karshe dai na yadda da shi watarana mun je wata unguwa, tun daga lokacin idan ya zo har kuka ya ke min idan ban amince da shi ba, har ta kai aka yi mana aure, to ni ko irin dadin amarcin nan ban ji ba, kullum sai zargi da wulakanci, yanzu ga shi har mun tara yara biyar, kuma idan na je na gayawa iyayena sai suce na yi hakuri, idan ma na kashe auren babu inda za su ajiye ni tunda a gidan haya suke daki daya, amma wallahi ni yanzu gwara ko duniya na bi na gaji wallahi Anty.' Ta kara fashewa da kuka.

A wannan karon ban barta ta gama kukan ba na ce, duk laifin ki ne fa, nan da nan ta yi shuru ta ce 'Kamar yaya laifina Anti na gaya miki fa ina masa biyayya ina hakuri da shi, sai ya kwana yana waya da chatting da yan mata a gabana.'

Na ce eh laifin kine, domin kin fara wulakanta kanki tun kina waje, kin zubar da kimar ki, don haka mutuncinki har abada ba zai dawo a gurinsa ba, sannan zai ci gaba da zarginki da miki wulakanci, kuma ina zaton ba ki yi Istibira kafin ku yi aure ba, don haka kin ga akwai matsala ta sabawa ubangiji cikin auranku, daman shi ubangiji yana yiwa bawansa talala sai ya kama shi ta gurin da bai zata ba, don haka sabon da kuka yiwa Allah shine ku ke ganin illarsa, kuma yawanci daman mata sun fi shan wahala idan suka bari irin haka ta faru, domin shi namiji yana da dama fiye da su tunda shine a sama su a kasa, dole komai ya kwaso ya jibga akansu.

Sai ta kara fashewa da kuka 'Yanzu shikenan haka zan ci gaba da rayuwa cikin bakin ciki Anty.' 

Na ce mata a'a, ai kina da damar da zaki gyara kurakuranki, don haka ki mayar da hankali gurin tuba sosai da kai kukan ki gurin ubangiji, na san yanzu ba ki da darajar da zai saurareki idan kin ce za ki yi masa nasiha, to bai fi karfin Allah ba, ki kai kararsa gurinsa, ki rokar masa shiriya da neman ya zama mai sassauci a gurinki, ki yawaita sadaka, sannan ki rage saka damuwa a ranki, ki kuma rage gayawa yaranki abun da ya ke miki, suma ki yi ta musu addu'a da nasiha, Insha Allah sai ki ga Allah ya kawo miki mafifa, ba makawa ma dukkan tsanani yana tare da sauki, karshe dai ta gano babban laifin da ta aikata wanda tare suka yi amma ita ya fi bibiyarta.

Idan zabin da Allah yayi a Dawakin Kudu da Warawa bai maka ba, Dan Allah kabar jam'iyyar. Naga wasu sun fara daukan abin ta wata hanyar to. Idan kanason Kwankwaso ya daina sauraron Dr. Danjuma Dan Allah daga yau kayi tsalle mu ganka a matsayin Dr. Danjuma. 
Wai har kana kiran Dr. Danjuma shashasha, to lallai ka sani Kaine cikakken shashasha, lallai Dr. Yafi karfin shashasha har a tashi duniya cikin yardar Allah. 
Kana maganar Dr. Badan Dawakin Kudu bane, to kazo a nuna maka mahaifiyarsa tana raye. A cikin masarautar garin Yankatsari.
Saboda haka yadda Dr. Danjuma ya dama haka za'a gani kuma dole asha. 
Doctor mai digiri uku ba sa'anka bane.

Kuma ni bansan lokacin da shashanci da susanci suka zama wayewa ba, amma har kullum shashanci da susanci basa burge kowa in banda shashasha da sususu.

A wajen Sadiq Madabo (izala), Sheikh Dr Abdul-jabbar jahili ne, saboda yana fassara hadisai da irin fassarar da shi sadiq madabo yake yi wa littattafan 'yan Tijjaniya. 

To fa! A wajen 'yan Tijjaniya, sadiq madabo jahili ne, saboda yana fassara littattafansu na tijjaniya da irin fassarar da sheikh Abduljabbar yake yi wa hadisai. 

Again! A wajen 'yan Tijjaniya-Maja, da sadiq madabo, da sheikh Abduljabbar duk jahilai ne, saboda suna yi wa littattafai fassarar turmi.

Sannan kuma, a wajen 'yan izala/salafiyya, da sheikh Abduljabbar, da malaman tijjanawa duk Jahilai ne, saboda suna fassara littattafai da fahimtar da bata shafi magabata na kwarai ba. 

A wajen dan Hisbah kuma, yada hotunan Zahra Nasir Ado Bayero aikata zunubi ne babba mafi girma, amma watsa datsattsun karatukan Malam Abduljabbar na sharri da kage, wanda akai jone-jone saboda a bata mai suna a cikin mutane, dai-dai ne. Tun da ba su fito sun ce a dai na ba.

An zo wajen! Ba ri na ga masu aiki da tunani, yau zan gane masu tunani da goshi. Ba ra mu ga masu ganewa. Amma idan ka kasa fahimta, kar kai min fassarar turmi, ka je wajen magabata na kwarai su yi ma bayani.

Shin wane Dakiki kuma wane Jahili a falsafance (philosophy)? 

Kalamar "ilimi" ita ce kishiyar "jahilci" ilimi kuwa na nufin sani ko sanin yadda wani abu yake. Kalmar "jahilci" kuwa tana nufin sabanin hakan. Amma, mu amsa wannan tambayoyin guda hudu: 

1: Shin akwai wanda bai san komai ba kuma bai iya komai ba ?

2: Shin akwai wanda ya san komai kuma ya iya komai ?

3: To wane jahili kuma wane me ilimi?

4 Me ake nufi da dakiki ?

Albert Einstein, kwararre a fannin ilimin kimiyya kuma shahararren masanin falsafa, ya ce "everybody is genius. But, if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it's stupid". Fassara: "kowa-da-kowa yana da kaifin basira. Amma da ace za ka yiwa kifi hukunci akan yunkurin sa na sai ya hau(ra) bishiya, da zai karar da duk rayuwarsa yana me tunanin shi din dakikine".

Ma'ana, duk yadda wani ya shahara da kwarewa a wani fanni na ilimi, da za'a kai shi wani fannin na ilimi, da sai ya gane cewa bai san komai ba. Misali, kifi kwararene a ruwa amma a batun hawa bishiya, wannan aikin sai su biri. Da za'a dakko shahararen likita a asibiti a ce sai ya gyara kafireton babur, toh watakila da saidai a kashe shi a dajin Sambisa. Amma kana dakko Bakanike wanda watakila ma bai taba bin hanyar makaranta ba, cikin minti goma shabiyar sai ya gyara maka abinka. Haka kuma dai, da za ka dakko kwararren dalibin turanci (wanda gabadaya "focus" din sa a kan turancin ne kadai) ka ce dole sai ya yi maka faransanci, toh tsaf zai iya kiran kansa dakiki, haka shima kwararre a faransancin idan an ce dole sai ya yi turancin.

Kowa a duniya akwai inda ya fi maida hankali, ya fi basira, ya fi kwarewa kuma yake da ilimi akai. Haka ta sa a tawa falsafar nima, kamar yadda Albert ya fada, na ce a duniya kowa me ilimine ko da kuwa a tsakiyar daji aka haifar aka gudu aka barshi giwa ta raine shi. Sam-sam ba jahili ko daya a duniya kuma ba dakiki. Kowama me ilimine kuma me basirane in one way or the other (in ba tanan ba, ta nan) indai da hankali a jikin sa. Don ka fi wani kwarewa a wani fanni da ka maida hankali akai, hakan ba ya nuna ka fishi basira ko shi din jahili ne. Shima akwai abinda ya iya baka iya ba. Amma, yayinda kuke da karsashi iri daya, maida hankali iri daya, matakin rayuwa iri daya, aka koya muku abu iri daya, a lokaci daya, me koya muku daya kuma ba tareda kowane dayan ku ya taba alakantuwa (experience) da abinda za'a koya ba, sai ka ga ka fi dayan saurin ganewa, toh ananne ka iya cewa ka fi wane basira. Shin amma hakan zai yuwu kuwa ? Gaskiya ina tuhumar Psychologists akan batun kalmar "moron" (dakiki). I don't think if it's in existence in our real world !

Sun hana mana ruwa, sun hana mana kiwon lafiya sun kuma hana mana kyawawan hanya. A yayin da su kuma ke can suna shan ruwan jarka, suna tsallakawa ketare da zarar sun ji wata masassara. Basa ma bin titin da garaje, sai randa suke son yaudarar mu da karairayi da zarar an kada gangunan siyasa. 

Abin da yafi muni ma rashin hanyar da talaka zai ketare zuwa gonar sa dan fidda amfanin gonar sa. 

Mafi ciwon ma rashin ilimin da dan talaka zai gane yau wata biyar fa ana yajin aikin malaman makarantun Jami'a,ba yau aka soma ba,ba kuma an kare ba kenan. A yayin da su nasu diyan suna can ketare suna karatu mukuma namu an maishe su karnukan siyasa a kafar sadarwa. 

Mafi haushin ma wai shi ne yadda Zaka ga wai wani dan talaka yana kare nasa azzalumin. Yana haushi yana faman yagunar dan uwan sa talaka. 

Abin dariya ne yadda wai zaka ji ana maganar wai zunuban mune suka ja ma na. Amma idan uban gidan sa yayi abin kirki,toh iyawar sa ce. A takaice dai Sharri sai a jingina ga ubangiji, alkairi kuma ga bawan sa.

Abin tausayin kuma yadda wasu ke ganin sauyi bazai yiyuwa ba,sun rasa yakini. Sun gwammace su zabi wani nau'in azzalumin akan wani nau'in da manufar wai Kiri'ar su kar ta zama asara. Bayan babu asara kamar zabar asararre. 

Abin daure kai kuma yadda suke kuka da zagi da tsinuwa har ma da ta da hankula bayan asararrun da suka Zaba Sun fara fanshe abin da suka kashe a yakin neman yaudarar marasa hankali. 

Doka bata yadda da cin mutuncin wani ba,bata yadda da batanci ba,bata yadda da sayen Kuri'a ba, bata yadda da tashin hankali ba. 

Siyasa ake so babu gaba,ba barazana. 

Kiri'ar ka 'yancin ka. Ya rage naka ka zabi ko ma waye, amma baka da hujjar zagin shugaban da ka zaba da hannun ka. Ka masa addu'a ko ka Sauya sa yafi. 

Nidai har kullum zabi na shie 

Honorable Isah Muhammad Kwakwai.

Idan wanda ya zagi Annabi yayi laifi shima wanda yayi sanadin hakan mai laifi ne 

Daga Dan-jarida Mohd Albarno 

Zagin Annabi laifi ne, bama Annabi ba, zagin Iyayen wani da bai kai Annabi daraja ba ma laifi ne. 

Ko wanne addini, da wayanda basu da addini, sunyi imanin cewa zagin wani abu da suke dauka a matsayin mai daraja laifi ne. Har ya kai ga ya kawo idan soyayya tayi nisa tsakanin masoya, sai aka samu wani ya zagi dayan cikin su to dayan ba zai bari ba, domin kowa na iya ramawa.

To bare kuma ace Annabi, wanda mumini yayi imani da shi a matsayin shine Shugaban Annabawa, kuma shine wanda Allah yayi duniyar nan dumin sa, kuma yayi lahira domin sa. Idan aka wayi gari wani ya zage shi to gaskia mumini ba zaiji dadi ba.

Amman akwai wani abinda ke faruwa wanda hakan ba daidai bane. Wasu su suke ja a zagi Annabi din. Zaka mutum wai shi musulmi, sai yazo da wani guntun jahilcin sa, yayi ta aikata wani abinda zai jawo ma Annabi zagi.

Ana yawan samun bataci ga Annabi a kasar Nigeria ta hanyar social media, wanda da zakayi bincike zaka fahimci cewa wasu ne daga cikin musulmai suka yi sanadiyar bataci ga Annabi.

Misali ana hira a group, idan aka taso da maganar addini, kamata ne ka kiyaye wani abinda zai kai ga zagin Annabi, amman wasu sai su rika hura wuta, suna zagin mutane. Sai su ingiza wasu da ma addinin bata dame su ba su zo su zagi Annabi. Daganan mai makon akai ga hukuma sai kawai a dau doka a hannu a a kashe mutum. Wannan ba adalci bane.

Idan har za a kashe wanda ya zagi Annabi, kama ta ne shima wanda ya ingiza har aka zage Annabin shima a kashe shi.

Wallahi tallahi, yanzu ana daukan muhim akan aham, bayan ga abinda yakamata ace an dau mataki akan shi amman ina. Idan har za a kashe wanda ya zagi Annabi, sannan a bar wanda ya zuga aka kai ga zagin Annabi, hakan zai zama tamkar an sare maciji ne ba tare da an sare kan ba.

Dan Allah, Dan Annabi, masu masu ingiza mutane su zagi Annabi, inda har Annabin ne a ranku to ku daina. Idan kuma bashi bane kuci gaba, in anje lahira gaskia zata yi halinta. Kar ayi zatona an kashe wani dan ya zagi Annabi jihadi akayi, alhalin kuma ku da kuka yi kisan ne abin kashe wa.

Allah ka kara wa Annabin mu daraja, Allah ka taymaki masoya Annabi na hakika, Allah ka ganar da jahilai, ka yaye mana duhu ka sanya mu cikin haske.

Muryar DEBORAH alokacin da tayi zagi zuwaga fiyayyen halitta Annabi Muhammad s.a.w 

Abun yafaru ne a WhatsApp group, irin WhatsApp group din da ake creating domin turo abubuwan da suka shafe department kamar timetables, past questions, da informations. Sai wani bawan Allah yaturo hadisi a group din. Nan ne DEBORAH tayi batanci ga fiyayyen halitta.

Daga Alhassan Mai Lafia

Bayan na gama sauraron Lawan na triumph akan zagi da hayaniyar da yayi da sunan khudba akan malam Abduljabbar, abun sai ya bani tausayi ya kuma bani dariya. Ba wai shi Lawan ne ya bani tausayi ba, yaran da suke yaudara da sunan su malamai ne suka ban tausayi. In dai wanda wasu suke kalla malami yana karya, sharri da kage abunda ya kai har ga tunzura mutane don kawai wani ya saba da akidar su, me zamu yi tsammanin wadanda ba malamai ba zasu yi kenan? Su kansu irinsu Lawan din ba nutsuwa da hankali garesu ba, ta yaya mabiyansu zasu yi hankali?

Na dade da daina ji da kula irin wannan shirgicin don yanzu masu hankali suna gani kuma suna rabewa. Banda tsabar shirme irin na Lawan, kana cewa duk Wanda kaji ya zagi sahabi kawai ka kama shi ku fada culvert ka kashe shi ko ya kashe ka, amma a haka aka riwaito a littafanku Sayyidina A ne ya kashe sayyidina B. Shi hukuncin kisa bai fi zagi ba? Ku ajiye maganar wai sahabi ne ya kashe jikan manzon Allah, Imam Alhassan, wanda ya kashe Ammar Bn Yasir sahabi ne.

Mutanen nan suna abu kamar ba kwakwalwa ce a kansu ba. Sun rubuta a littafai, Abulgadiya sahabi ne kuma shi ya kashe Ammar Bn Yasir. Mu'awiya sahabi ne shi ya kashe Imam Alhassan, ya kashe Hujru bn Adiyy. Yazidu Bn Mu'awiya ya kashe sahabbai sun fi dubu a "harra". Yazidu fa kashe dubban sahabbai yayi, ku ma ajiye maganar kisan Imam Hussain. Amma a gefe guda neman albarkarsu ake. Wannan zai nuna mana kawai rainawa mutane hankali ake da sunan zagin sahabbai don duk laifin zagi bai kai kisa ba.

Sun raba mana addini ne kawai gida biyu, akwai VIPs akwai kuma karabutin jama'a. Su VIPs duk abunda suka yi daidai ne. Ana sonsu sune yan lele. Su kuma wasu sune gama-garin mutane akansu ake doka, akan su ake hukunci. Babu hankali cikin lamuran nan gaba daya. Ni dai Allahn da nake bautaw bai san wani VIP addininsa ba. Duk Wanda ya saba masa zai hukunta shi.

Ni dai ba zan iya wannan rainin hankalin da sunan addini ba. Ta dole sai an wanke baki ya koma fari. Mai datti ace dole a mayar dashi mai tsafta. Ka fadi abunda ya faru yadda ya faru kuma ace kayi zagi alhali su suka rubuta da hannunsu. A rubuta gaskiya sannan ace wai kar ka yadda da ita kiri-kiri. Allah ya ce wanda ya kashe mumini hukuncinsa shiga jahannama zai tabbata a cikinta, sannan su malaman su rubuta mana sayyidina "A" ya kashe sayyidina "B" kuma ace in karyata ayar Qur'ani don sayyidina "A" ne. Wallahi b zan iya ba.

Na kasa ganin hankali a cikin wadannan abubuwan. Shi yasa nace ba zan zama mahaukaci ba, ina da cikakken 'yancin tunani da zabi.
