Æ˜ungiyar ta ce ba za ta zaÉ“e É—an takarar da ya ce zai cigaba daga wurin da Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ba domin ko a wurin ta shi (Buharin) ya gaza a É“angarori da suka hada da tsaro da tattalin arziki.

Kamar yadda yake bisa al'adar Kanuri, Sanata Kashim Shettima ya bayyana a taron jama'a don sanyawa diyarsa Fatima albarka a aurenta. A cikin wani bidiyo da ya yadu, an gano Shettim a tsugune a wani taron mata yayin da ya gabatarwa diyar tasa makulin mota da kudi.

Atiku makaryaci ne da bai kamata a bashi amanar fadar Shugaban kasar Nageriya ba Cewar Bola Tinubu

Dan takarar shugaban kasa a jamâ€™iyyar APC mai mulki, Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu ya soki takwaran sa na jamâ€™iyyar adawa ta PDP kuma tsohon mataimakin shugaban kasa, Atiku Abubakar yana mai cewa dan takarar jamâ€™iyyar adawa makaryaci ne wanda bai kamata a ba shi amanar fadar shugaban kasa ba.

Tinubu na mayar da martani ne ga wata hira da gidan talabijin na Arise Television yayi da Atiku Abubakar a ranar Jumaâ€™a inda Mista Abubakar ya yi magana a kan batutuwa da dama da suka hada da ikirarin cewa ya yi karo da Tinubu a shekarar 2007 saboda shi (Atiku) yana adawa da tikitin takarar shugaban kasa na Musulmi da Musulmi.

Da yake amsa tambaya kan raâ€™ayinsa kan tikitin takarar shugaban kasa a jamâ€™iyyar APC, Musulmi da Musulmi, Atiku ya ce: â€œBabban sabani na da Asiwaju kenan tun 2007 shi ne batun tikitin Musulmi da Musulmi. Wannan shine babban rashin jituwa na dashi.

Ni da Asiwaju muka kafa ACN aka ba ni tikiti a Legas, sai ya dage sai ya zama abokin takara ta, na ce aâ€™a, ba zan samu tikitin Musulmi da Musulmi ba, saboda haka ya sauya sheka zuwa ga marigayi. Umaru â€™Yarâ€™aduwa kuma shi ne wurin tashi, kuma tabbas, shi ma ya tabbata lokacin da Buhari ya fito a Legas a 2015 ni ma na yi adawa da tikitin takara na Musulmi da Musulmi.

â€œNa yi adawa da hakan kuma a zahiri adawata ta karfafa matakin da Shugaba Buhari ya dauka na zabar abokin takarar Kirista. Don haka, na yi adawa da hakan. Ban yi imani da hakan ba. Ban yi imani da cewa ya dace kasa kamar Najeriya mai kabilu da addinai daban-daban ya kamata a daidaita maslaha, ko na addini ko waninsa.

Sai dai Kungiyar ta Bola Tinubu ta bayyana Atiku Abubakar amatsayin makaryaci wanda maganarsa ke cike da jahilcin da Bai kamata a bashi amanar ofishin Shugaban kasa kamar Nageriya ba.

Wasu matan kan hadu da tsananin ciwon mara lokacin al'ada a dauka infection ne wanda sam ba haka bane, haka za ai ta wahala ana bata lokaci da asarar kudi alhaji. Yawaitar wani hormones wato prostogladins na haifar da yawan contractions na mahaifa daidai lokacin da take kokarin fitar da duk takarce hakan kan jefa mata jin zafi a mara daidai inda mahaifa take da kuma ciwon da akeji lokaci zuwa lokaci. Dan haka fara haihuwa ga wasu matan na rage samar da wannan hormones saika nemi ciwon marar ka rasa. Sai fa mun rage daukan kome infection ta hakan kan jefa rayuwar mu cikin wani hali sanadiyar anfani da magunguna marassa anfani Allah ya kyautaWasu matan kan hadu da tsananin ciwon mara lokacin al'ada a dauka infection ne wanda sam ba haka bane, haka za ai ta wahala ana bata lokaci da asarar kudi alhaji. IDAN MACE NA MAKA SOYAIYA TA GASKIYA ZAKA SAMETA DA WADANNAN ABUBUWAN:

Cikin sauki ka ke iya fahimtar mace idan tana sonka. Kamar yadda zaka iya fahimtar ta idan bata yinka.

Ga wasu alamu na zahiri da zaka iya fahimta daga macen da take maka soyayya ta gaskiya.


1: Kishinta zai bayyana akan ka.

2: Zata rika kula da abinda baka so da wanda kake so.

3: Kudinka baya gabanta.

4: Ba zata taba baiwa wani namiji dama a kanta ba.

5: Baza ta bari ka rika ganin bacin ranta ba.

6: Tana iya yin komai saboda Kai.

7: Zata rika baka shawaran yadda zaka ci gaba.

8: Bata da hakurin jin ana aibataka.

9:Tana son tasan halin da kake ciki a ko yaushe.

10: Takan shiga tashin hankali akan duk wani abu mara dadi da ya sameka.

Wadannan wasu Abu ne daga cikin abinda zaka yi la'akari da su idan mace na sonka, so na gaskiya.

Ta kaga irin wannan daga gareta lallai ka rike ta gam gam, in kuka yi aure sai a sami matsala daga wajenka.

Shi dai wannan gida, an bayyana cewa yana Æ™unshe da É—akuna 72, faluka 24, Æ™aramin Sinima da Æ™ananan wurin sauÆ™a da tashin jirage biyu. Sannan duk a cikin gidan, akwai wurin linÆ™aya (Pool) guda huÉ—u.

Shin yanzu za kuyi Imani da sashen Hadisai Sahihi, Ku kafircema Sashe ?

Ba zaka zan cikakken mai imani da Hadisi Sahihi ba, har sai kayi imani da duk hadisin da akace ya inganta, Amma idon mu kaga kana amfani da wasu sahihan kana kafircema wasu sahihan irinsu, mun san wannan nifaqa ce.

Misali.

1- Ka yarda da Uwayen Annabi SAW Æ³an Wuta ne saboda Muslim ya ruwaito, Amma kana musa Abu Sufyan da ÆŠan Æ³an wuta ne maqiya Allah, tare da Bukhari, Muslim, Ahmad ÆŠan Hanbali sun ruwaito haka.

2- Ka yarda da Banfan Annabi SAW da yafi bashi kariya sama ga kowa Kafiri ne É—an uwatai saboda Bukhari ya ruwaito, Amma ba ka yarda makasan Ammaru Yaseer Æ´an wuta ne ba, kamar yadda Bukhari ya ruwaito.

3- Ka yarda wanke Æ™afa ake a arwalla saboda Hadisan dake cikin Sihahu, Masanidu da Ma'ajimu, Amma baka yarda ana shafa Æ™asa a arwalla ba, tare da Hadisan dake cikin Sihahu, Masanidu da Ma'ajimu sahihai akan shafar Æ™afar.

4- Ka yarda ana iya yin Sallar Juma'a da Safe saboda Hadisan Bukhari da sauransu, Amma ba kada yarda ana iya haÉ—e salloli lokaci É—aya, tare da Tabbatuwar Hadisan akan haka.

5- Ka yarda da Hadisan dake Æ™aryata auren Mutu'a a Muslim, amma baka yarda da Hadisan dake tabbatar dashi ba, a cikin Bukharin da Muslim É—in.

6- Ka yarda da Hadisan ana iya sadaÆ™i da baqin zoÉ“e, amma ba ka yarda da Hadisan dake maganar ke tsade da Mace ta taimakeka ba.

7- Ka yarda da Hadisan dake nuna Allah na sama, Amma baka yarda da waÉ—anda ke nuna yana ko ina ba.

8- Ka yarda da Hadisan Allaha Allaha fi Ashabiy, amma ba ka yarda da Hadisan zagin Ali zagin Annabi saw kai tsaye.

9- Ka yarda da Hadisan yima Annabi Sihiri a Bukhari, amma baka yarda da Hadisan shayar da Baligi nonon matarka ba don ta haramta gareshi.

10- Ka yarda da Hadisin yin tsirara a ka'aba gaban dubban mutane, amma baka yarda da Hadisin, Sarkin Sham yawa wata boya tsirara a fadarsa ba.

Da sauran misalai da yawa, ina ganin indai don da'awar inganci kake riÆ™o da waÉ—ancan, WaÉ—annan sun fisu Inganci da yawan maruwaita.

RiÆ™o dana É—aya tare da watsi ko Æ™in yin aiki da wadancan Munahucci ne zalla.

Shugaba Buhari Na Daf Da Kammala Aikin Inganta Tashar Wutar Lantarki Ta Zungeru

Daga Muhammad Dahiru Shugaba

Nan da watanni uku masu zuwa ake sa ran za a kammala aikin gina tashar wutar lantarki da gwammatin shugaban Æ™asa Muhammadu Buhari ke yi a garin Zungeru dake jihar Naje, wanda yanzu an samu nasarar kammala kashi 95% na aikin.

Daya daga cikin Jakadan Æ™asar Chana dake sa ido akan aikin, Mista Jianchun, ya bayyana gamsuwar sa da aiki da ingancin aikin da ake daf da kammalawa.

Mista Jianchun, ya ce matsalar rashin tsaro da ake fama da shi shi ya kawo koma baya ga kammala aikin da kusan watanni bakwai.

Mista Jianchun ya baiyana hakan ne yayin da ya kawo ziyara ta musamman ga Gwamnan jihar Neja, domin duba yadda aikin tashar wutar lantarkin ke tafiya.

Jakadan ya nuna jin dadinsa ga Gwamna jihar Neja da irin tarbar da aka yi masa, ya kuma ba da tabbacin cewa dangantakar da ke tsakanin kasarsa da Nijeriya za ta ci gaba da kara karfi.

Kungiyar IZALA tayi kira ga gwamnatin tarayya da ta gaggauta Hukunta wadanda suka yi kisan gilla GA sheikh Gwani Aisami

Daga Jibwis Nigeria

Shugaban JIBWIS Sheikh Dr. Abdullahi Bala Lau yayi kira ga gwamnatin tarayya da ta gaggauta daukan mataki Akan wasu sojojin Naijeriya guda biyu da suka kashe daya daga cikin malaman kungiyar Sheikh Gwani Aisami dake garin Gashua ta jihar yobe.

Shehin Malamin ya Kara da cewa "Muna yabawa hukumar 'yan sanda da suka dauki mataki nan take na cafke sojojin da a ka samu a daji wajen gawar marigayin.
Kakakin rundunar 'yan sanda a Yobe Dungus Abdulkarim ya tabbatar da kama sojojin kuma ya ce bayan kammala bincike zai yi karin bayani kan akasin.

Rahotanni da su ka karade yanar gizo sun nuna Shehun Malamin na dawowa Gashua ne daga tafiyar da ya yi zuwa Kano sai wani soja ya bukaci ya rage ma sa hanya zuwa garin Jajimaji a yankin Karasuwa. A lokacin Sheikh Aisami ya tsaya kama ruwa ashe sojan na son sace ma sa mota ne don haka da ya dawo sai ya yi ma sa barazana da bindiga a kan ya iso wajen motar.

Marigayi Sheikh Goni Aisami ya dage don zuwa wajen dukiyar sa inda sojan ya bude ma sa wuta ya kashe shi.
Yayin da ya yi ta kokarin tada motar ta ki tashi sai ya kira wani abokin aikin sa wanda ya zo da motar sa amma ita ma ta samu matsala don haka duk su ka samu taimako daga 'yan sintiri.

A sanadiyyar zuwan 'yan sintiri ne su ka fahimci akwai matsala inda su ka ankarar da 'yan sanda su ka zo su ka cafke sojojin biyu.

Sheikh Bala Lau yace babu shakka kungiyar baza ta amince Akan wannan ta'addanci ba, yace sun zura ido da kunnuwa domin sauraren yadda zata kaya wajen aiwatar musu da hukunci cikin gaggawa. 

Sheikh Lau Ya kuma mika ta'aziyyar kungiyar ga 'yan uwa da iyalai da al'ummar garin Gashua da jihar yobe, dama kasa Baki daya na rashin Sheikh Gwani Aisami, da fatan Allah ya karbi shadarsa,ya kyautata makwancinsa, ya hadamu a aljanna firdausi Baki dayan mu. Amin

JIBWIS NIGERIA

WURIN DA ALLAH YAKE
.
Daga can tsakiyar tekun Atlantika, wata 'yar kifanya (macen kifi) ta tambayi gyatumarta: "Shin wai a ina ne tekun Atlantika yake?".
Wace amsa kake tsammanin za ta fito daga bakin uwar wannan 'yar kifanyar?
.
A duniyarmu ta zahiri, duk abinda ya kewayeka ta kowace kusurwa, ba zai taba yiwuwa ka iya saninsa gaba daya ba, kamar yadda ba zai yiwu ka san shi din a wane wuri yake ba. Misali: Sararin Subhana (Universe) har yanzu babu wani bincike na kimiyya da zai iya cewa kaco-kaf dinsa ga a wurin da yake. Me ya sa? Saboda ya kewayemu ne ta kowane sashe.
Kadai dai kana iya sanin haqiqa ko ka gane wurin da abu yake ne idan ka iya fita daga cikin kewayewar da ya yi maka. Misali: Ranar da dan-tsako ya fito daga kwafsar qwai, a ranar ne zai gane menene haqiqanin qwai kuma zai gane ashe qwan nan a cikin akurki (dakin kaza) yake.
.
Wadannan misalai ne na duniyar zahiri, to ya ya kuma ka ke tsammanin abinda yake cikin buya?
.
To shi Allah ta'alah (duk da ba jiki ba ne -kamar yadda zai zo nan gaba-) ya kewaye halitta ne kaf dinta, don haka babu wata halitta da za ta iya sanin haqiqanin Allah balantana ta san wurin da Allah yake. Kuma duk wurin da aka ce a nan Allah yake to hakan na nufin wannan wurin yana daga wajen (ya fita daga) kewayewar Allah ne (wannan kuma ba zai taba yiwuwa ba).
.
Allah ta'alah yana cewa:
ÙˆÙ„Ù„Ù‡ Ù…Ø§ ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù…ÙˆØ§Øª Ùˆ Ù…Ø§ ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø±Ø¶ ÙˆÙƒØ§Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù„Ù‡ Ø¨ÙƒÙ„ Ø´ÙŠØ¡ Ù…Ø­ÙŠØ·Ø§
"Duk abinda ke cikin sama da wanda ke cikin qasa na Allah ne. Kuma Allah ya kasance mai kewayewa da dukkan komai" Suraun Nisa' :136
.
A wani wurin yana cewa:
Ø£Ù„Ø§ Ø¥Ù†Ù‡ Ø¨ÙƒÙ„ Ø´ÙŠØ¡ Ù…Ø­ÙŠØ·
"Ku saurara! Lallai shi mai kewayewa ne da dukkan komai" Suratu Fussilat :54
.
A wani wurin yace:
ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù„Ù‡ Ù…Ù† ÙˆØ±Ø§Ø¦Ù‡Ù… Ù…Ø­ÙŠØ·
"Allah mai kewayewa ne ta bayansu (fiye masaniyarsu)" Suratul Buruj: 20
.
Idan ka ce Allah yana sama, ko yana kan Al'arshi, to kamar ka ce ne tekun Atlantika yana cikin qashin dodon kodi (wanda shi kuma qashin dodon kodin yana cikin kewayewwar tekun Atlantika ne). Ya ka ji abun? Ba hikima!
To sai dai idan kana nufin SAMANIYAr ko AL'ARSHIn sun fita daga kewayewar Allah ne, wannan kuma abu ne da ba zai yiwu ba.
.
Sa'annan shi "WURI" a duk inda ake maganarsa to yana da alaqa ne da abinda yake da jiki, bal, ta wata fuskar ma jiki shi ne wuri domin samuwar jiki ita take bayyana samuwar wuri. Daliban Kimiyyah da wadanda suka karanta Falsafar "A'raad" (Accidentals) za su fi kowa gane wannan.
.
Duk abinda yake da jiki (matter) kuma laziminsa shi ne CACCANZAWA daga wannan siffar zuwa waccan siffar, qarqashin abinda masu Falsafa suke kira da "Al-harkah" (motion).
.
Don haka, matuqar dai ka yarda cewa Allah ba jiki ba ne, to dole ka yarda Allah ba shi da wuri, ko kuma ka yarda da akasin haka.
Allah ba shi da WURI domin ya buwayi WURI.
.
Ayoyin Al-Qur'ani da suka yi magana a kan Al'arshi da Istiwa'i, wadannan duk fassarar ma'anoni ce ba zahirin lafuza ba.
.
Muhd Bin Shamsiddeen Al-bindawy.
24/01/1444 A.H.

DUNIYA ABIN TSORO

Da Yammacin Jiya ne a Unguwar Kofar Nassarawa dake Cikin birnin Kano, Wata Mata ta Kira Wani Mai Gyaran takalma Wato Shoe Shiner don ya dinka Mata takalmin ta da ya tsinke.

Da mai gyaran takalmin yazo ta bashi takalmin da nufin ya ci gaba da aiki, Sai ita Kuma ta Koma cikin gida ta ci gaba da aikace-aikacen ta, ta bar Mai gyaran takalman a kofar Gida.

Shi Kuwa Mai Gyaran takalmin nan ko da Ya ga ta shiga gida, ya Leka gabas da yamma bai ga Kowa ba, ya dai tabbatar babu Mai ganin Shi, Kawai Sai ya fitar da wani abu daga cikin dan akwatin sa ya sanya Wa takalmin ya dinke da Shi.

Inda Allah ya rufa Wa matar nan asiri shine, ashe wani mutum Yana Saman Bene Yana Kallon duk abinda Mai Gyaran takalmin Ke aikatawa.

Bayan Mai gyaran takalmin ya gama dinke takalmin, Sai Ya Kira Matar da ta zo ta gwada ta gani idan yayi, matar Nan ta dauki Kafar ta zata sa takalmin Nan Kenan Sai Mutumin dake Saman benen Ya 'Daga Murya Yace " Hajiya Kar ki sa takalmin Nan" Matar Nan Sai ta tsaya cak cikin Mamaki har mutumin ya sauko daga Saman Benen Yace Wa Mai Gyaran takalmin ya fara sa wa tukunna.

Nan aka yi aka yi yasa takalmin nan amma ya yi Kememe ya ce ba zai sa ba, Nan Fah Mutane suka taru makil aka tilasta mishi Sai ya sa.

Allahu Akbar, Idan dai baka da hakkin Mutum toh Allah Mai Kare Ka ne, Allah dai Ya sa Matar Nan ba ta da rabon wahala, kuma dai Allah yasa ranar nan ce dubun Mai Gyaran takalmin zai cika.
Bayan ya Sanya takalmin Nan, Kun San Me ya faru?

Ai Ko da ya sa takalmin, Nan take Kawai sai takalmin ya sake tsinkewa, ashe Abin da Mutumin nan ya ganshi yana sawa takalmin zare ne mara kwari, ba lilo bane Kamar Yadda Masu Gyaran Takalma Suka Saba Amfani da shi.

Karshe dai aka tilasta shi dole ya sa zare me kyau mai qwari ya sake dinke takalmin.

Don haka 'Yan Uwa a yi hattara, Maha'inta sun yi yawa. ğŸš¶ğŸš¶ğŸš¶

Kira Ga Yan Siyasa Magoya Baya Ya Kamata Kusan Mecece Siyasa.

Da farko ina mamakin yadda wasu daga cikin mutane sukeyimin kallon karamin yaro to Amma abunda nakeso mutane su fahimta shine sai da ruwan ciki akejan na rijiya

Siyasa ba'a yinta dan cin mutumcin wani.

Ana yinta dan cigaba da kuma kawo chanji a cikin chanji amman sai kaga saboda rahin sanin makamar siyasa sai kaga yan kasuwar bukata wanda bama su san mecece siyasa ba sai kaga dan kasamu wata yar karamar dama sai kake amfani da ita kana cin mutuncin mutane.
Abunda na sani shine ka sanar da wanda bai sani ba.

Ina kira ga duk wani matashi akan yasan darajar nagaba dashi idan har mutum baya ganin mutuncin nagaba dashi to bai samu tarbiya ba tun abaya kuma ka mutunta nagaba da kai.

Ka dogara ga Allah zai zame maka jagora ako ina kake, kada ka zama mai tsoro, domin mafiya yawancin mutane da kake ganin su bakomai bane face Kumfar-Rafi.

INA MATSALAR TAKE NE
( Zumuncin uba daya)

Sau dayawa ana watsi da zumuncin uba daya,wasu yan uba yadda suke tamkar wasu abokan gaba junan su ,haka suke rayuwar su,wasu bazaka taba zaton sanin cewa sun hada uba daya da junan su ba.
Wannan babban matsalace ta nuna kiyayya ga junan ku kuna jini daya.
Wasu indai ba uwa daya uba daya suke ba,to basa zumunci da yan uba daya,wanda ni a ganina jinin mahaifi yafi karfi sosai.
Ina MATSALAR TAKE NE??

Iyaye mata sune masu manyan laifi wajan gurbata zumuncin yan uwan yara,suke ingiza'yayan su gun hana su zumunci da sauran yan uwan su wadanda suke uba daya,wai saboda kishin banza kishin wofi su raba yaran su zumunci,su saka su a daki suna nuna masu cewa'yan dayan dakin bafa masoyan su bane,kar su sake jiki dasu,hudubar shaidan zasu saka wa yaran su,yadda yaran nasu kowa zai tashi da tsanani n tsanar dan uwan sa.
Akwai iyaye mata masu cewa yaran su indai kuka yi zumunci da dayan dakin nan ban yafe maku ba,ta nuna ta raba zumuncin yara.
Daga Jubairu dan mud'im,yaji manzon Allah( S. A. W) yana cewa:
"Mai yanke zumunci bazai shiga Aljannah ba".

"Daga Abdurrahman dan Auf,yaji manzon Allah( S. A .)W yana cewa: 
Allah mai girma da buwaya yace:
"Nine mai Rahama,kuma nina halicci zumunci,kuma na ciroshi daga suna na,duk wanda ya sadar da shi zan sadar dashi (zuwa ga Rahama ta) wanda kuma ya yanke shi zan yanke shi (daga Rahama ta)"
Lallai duk mai son Rahamar ubangiji kar ya yanke zumunci.

An karbo daga Abu Ayyubal ansary (R.A)
Wani mutumin kauye ya bijirowa manzon Allah (S.A.W) a cikin tafiyar sa sai yace:
Kabani labarin abunda zai kusantar Dani Aljannah kuma ya nesantar dani daga wuta?
Sai manzon Allah (S.A.W) yace:"ka bautawa Allah kar kahada shi da komai,kuma ka tsaida sallah,kabada zakkah,kuma kasadar da zumunci".

Don haka babu dole yin biyayya ga abinda mutum yasan cewa sabon Allah ne.

Nasan cewa wasu yan uban suna da nasu matsalan amma basu mutum zai duba ba,girman zumunci zaina gani,sannan duk kuma abinda wani yayi wa wani muddin bai cuce sa ba kansa zai dawo,shi zumunci ba abin wasa bane,shi jini daya ba abin wasa bane.

Akwai wanda ta taba gaya min cewa,dan dakin su ya rasu amma sauran yan dakin ko gaisuwa basu masu ba kuma gidan su daya,
Innalillahi wa'inna ilaihi raji'un, wanna wace irin masifa ce?
Yan uwan juna sun koma mummunan gaba,irin wannan wace irin zuciya gare su.

Iyaye maza,shi namiji shine shugaba kuma shi yake da ikon gyara iyalan sa.
Wani fara tabarbarewan zumunci na 'ya'yan sa da hannun sa abin yake faruwa,saboda Yana nuna banbanci a fili yana nuna yafi son yan dayan daki,yana yiwa yan dayan dakin abu amma sauran yan dakin su baya masu komai,
To irin hakan duk namiji mai nunawa to shida kansa ya raba kan iyalan sa.

Lallai dole ne akwai wadanda kafi so a cikin yaran ka har ma mahaifiyar nasu,to ka boye domin boyewan shi yafi alkhairi.

Wani namijin kuma bashi da katabus da gidan sa,hasalima tsoron matan nasa yake yi,to wannan ma matan tsaf zasu raba kan yara azo bbu zumunci tsakanin su tamkar ba jini daya ba.

Ya zama dole kai namiji ka tsaya da kafafuwan ka wajan ganin ka hada kan iyalan ka,ka nuna kai jarumi ne daga matan har yaran suna karkashin ikon kane,idan ka tsaya da kafafuwan ka babu wata macen data isa ta raba maka kan iyalan ka.

Idan kasan kasamu wannan baraka na raba kan iyalan ka tun kafin kabar duniya ka zauna ka hada kan iyalan ka.

Yan uwa musan cewa shi zumunci ba abin wasa bane,mu kaunaci yan uwan mu,mu zauna lafiya da junan mu,mu daina daukan yan uba a matsayin makiyan mu,mu dinga duba girman zumunci.

Allah yasa mu dace ya kuma kara hada kawunan mu.domin rayuwar nan bakomai bace yanzu mutum yake idan anjima ubangiji yayi ikon sa sai aga babu mutum a duniya shikenan rayuwar fa

Dan Allah mu daina saurin yanke hukunci sai idan mun yi bincike.
A maganar da pantami ya fada, bakomai acikinta sai tarin sauki da aka samarwa mutane, idan har abin da ya fada ya tabbata to gaskiya ba karamin aikin alheri ya yi ba. Ainihin yanda ake siyan normal DATA akan kowane layi ba ya wuce; N100 akan 87MB, N200 akan 150MB haka-haka har zuwa kan 1000 akan 1GB ba.

Amma ita wannan data da ake siya ta MTN akan 200 for 1GB ta hanyar *131*65# ai wata offer ce da su ke bawa layuka amma ba kowane layi ne ya ke samun wannan garabasar ba, idan ma ka samu baya wuce kwana 90 tsarin yayi expire. Ita kuma daya hanyar da ake siya 1GB akan N200 ta hanyar *131*65*2*1# ai idan mu ka duba za mu ga na masu cuwa-cuwa ne, shi layi ne ma ake siyar da shi tare da wannan tsarin. Akwai hanyoyi da 'yan kasuwar bayan-fage suke bi suna hada layuka masu tarin yawa, wani ma za mu ga 100 for 1GB. 

Shi hakikar maganar pantami akan siyan data yake magana ta hanyar amfani da normal code da kamfani ya bayar na siyan data, wanda kowa ya san wannan 1GB N1000 kowane kamfani ya ke siyar da data. Pantami akan wannan yake magana ba wani abu ba.

GA Wanda suke kallon Supply na Pi kamar wani Abu dazai hanashi kaiwa wani farashi da akaji wasu suna zato koh hasashe saboda sun Saba da Ganin yanayi na normal coins da suke a kasuwa, toh gasky su canza tunani. Komai anan bangaren pi is different da abubuwan dake a cikin kasuwa.

Wasu na cewa, Ai pi billions ne supply nashi Dan haka bazai huce ya Fara da 0.000 ba koh ma kasa da haka. Well, ba wani Abu bane Dan ya Fara a hakan domin kowa ma ya shiryawa hakan, dama lokacine zaiyi deciding darajar pi bawai mutane koh Kuma core din kansu ba.

Amma dai mu dinga tuna cewa if there is demand supply is nothing. 
A cikin wasu laws hudu na supply and demand akwai Wanda yake cewa "If the supply stays the same and demand increases, the price will go up".
Dan haka duk Wanda yake harkar crypto koda ace baisan wannan law ba toh zai iya Gaya maka dalilin dayasa farashin coin yake tashi koh yake faduwa, idan kuwa baisani ba toh Ina ganin baima San abinda yakeyi ba a harkar. Koh a kasuwar zahiri munsa yaya kasuwancin Kaya yake tafiya, idan Kaya yayi yawa yafi karfin mabukatan kayan dole darajar kayan zata Ragu.
SBD haka anan, Kada mu manta pi yanada Limited supply, an kayade supply dinsa cewar bazai huce 100B ba, Dan haka duk wani abu zai farune within wannan 100B din ne.

Toh sai Kuma magana ta Circulating supply, shikuma wannan dama abune dazai dinga canzawa periodically, wato lokaci zuwa lokaci Kenan, Baya Zama fixed. Kuma canzawar circulation supply ba za'ace zaiyi affecting Darajarsa sosai ba kamar yadda abun zai Zama Babbar matsala ba. Akwai hanyoyi da Ake bi ayi controlling supply yadda bazai yiwa price illa lokaci guda ba.

Misali, Kamar a normal Crypto project din damuke gani, Akwai projects da akeyiwa ICO wato akayi pre-sale kafin ayi listing dinsu a Fara trading, a wannan tsari na ICO mostly yanzu ba'a cika sakewa mutane coins dinsu immediately bayan an Gama wannan crowdsale din ba, akwai wani mechanism da Akeyin amfani dashi da Ake Kira "vesting" wasun mu sunsan Menene vesting da Kuma amfaninsa.
Amma GA Wanda Basu saniba, wani tsarine da akeyi, bayan an Gama pre-sale sai ayi locking din Coins din da aka siyar a wannan sale din Gaba Daya a wani wallet daban, sai a saita lokaci Mai interval kamar misali bayan wata-wata koh wata 2 koh Mai kamada haka, sai a dinga sakarwa mutane coins din a hankali, misali wannan wata zaa sakarwa wani adadi na mutanen, wata na gaba ma wani adadi, a haka kowanne participant zai Sami coins dinsa batareda anyi affecting kasuwar coin din ba.

Kamar yadda lokacin da kowa zai samu nashi ya bambanta Dana wani, Dan haka wannan zai taimaka wajen Lafiyar darajar coin din sosai, kasancewar idan an sakarwa kowa nashi at once ansan cewar da yawa kusan kowa siyarda nashi zaiyi saboda already Yana cikin profit, Musamman idan coin din yayi abin arziki sosai bayan anyi launching Dinsa. Tinda presale price din dole Yana qasan listing price din.

Toh idan muka duba vesting yanada benefits guda biyu, na farko zai inganta darajar coin da Gyaruwar Al'amarin project din Gaba Daya, sannan na biyu su kansu Wanda suka Siya din suke Jira a sake musu, an taimaka musu anyi musu holding coin din, musamman Idan coin din yanada potential sosai Kuma ya Bayarda return Mai yawa. Toh Dan haka vesting shima ribane GA Wanda ya Siya coin din, kasancewar da an bashi Shi da wuri da Tini ya siyar watakila Kuma daga Baya yaga coin din yayi farashin da zaiyi Dana sani cewar dabai siyar ba.

Toh Amma GA project Wanda baida potential gsky wannan disadvantage ne.
Domin wani project din ma Yana iya sauka kasan Launching price Dinsa wani ma saboda tabewa har kasan presale price din Saiya sauka. Dan haka wannan disadvantage ne na vesting ICO tokens.

Wannan Kenan gameda vesting ğŸ˜„ ayi hakuri mun Shiga wata Gonar ko, Bakomai duk Dan Bayanin ya fito filine yadda za'a fahimta.

Nayi magana Akan vesting ne Musamman saboda mu haska mana cewar akwai hanyoyi Kala-kala na yadda Ake controlling supply din crypto assets da Sauran kayayyaki, koh a real-world kasuwanci da mukeyi, kamar a kasuwa zamuga idan Kaya yayi yawa farashi dama dole zai karye, Dan haka Yan kasuwa Suma suna bin wasu hanyoyi na yadda zasu daidaita darajar kayansu Kada abubuwan su rinca6e musu. Kuma a cikin measures da suke dauka , akwai zuba kayan a wani guri kamar store koh dai wani waje da za'a tabbatar sai na cikin kasuwar ya daidaita sannan a fito dasuğŸ˜… duk wannan kawai saboda a rage yawansa ne domin farashin yaci Gaba da tafiya daidai, domin idan sun barsu cikin kasuwar lamarin zai lalace musu.

YAYA LAMARIN SUPPLY DIN PI YAKE NE?

An yanke cewa maximum total supply na Pi network zai kasance Ne 100Billions kawai, yayinda bangaren Community wato masu mining sukeda Kaso 80 na adadin(80% or 80B) sai su Kuma su core team din suke da ragowar Kashi 20 din(20% or 20B). 
Sukace batare da la'akari da guda nawane zai kasance in circulation ba a kowanne lokaci wannan shine yadda supply din zai kasance, basa iya determining din adadin circulating coins da za'a Bude mainnet dasu a yanzu saidai hasashe, Kasnacewar munsan anacigaba da mining a yanzu haka kuma za'aci gaba dayi. Dan haka kamar yadda ya bayyana a White paper dinsu akwai wannan 20% na core team bawai zai Zama available bane daga Fara trading pi, shima zai kasancene a kulle kamar yadda aka Tsara, wato zai Zama wani adadi ne zai dinga fitowa daga lokaci zuwa lokaci yayinda mutane keci gaba da mining.

Har suka BADA misali da cewar, idan misali kamar Kaso 25 cikin 100 na 80% din da community yake dashi Yana circulation, toh a wannan lokaci, Suma Kashi 25 cikin 100 na wannan 20% da suke dashi shine zai Zama in circulation, yayinda Sauran yake a kulle.

Toh Dan haka zamuga cewar abune da yake anyi masa tsari Mai kyau, Mu abinda zamuce saidai Allah ya tabbatar da Alkhairi.

Abu na gaba sai sukace Kaso 80 Dinnan na community shima za'a sake rabashi ne gida uku wato Kaso 65, 10, da Kuma 5.

Dan haka za'a lissafa daga wannan shekarar ta farko zuwa ta gaba, Amma yadda lissafin zai kasance shine adadin Wanda za'ayi mining a shekarar farko zai Zama yafi na shekara ta gaba da ita yawa, haka ita ma nata zaifi shekara ta gabanta wato mining din zai dinga halving yearly, a haka har sai mining ya tsaya cak. Aliyu Samba

A safiyar yau ne kotun shari'ar Muslunci dake zaman ta a kofar kudu cikin birnin Kano ta cigaba da sauraren Shari'ar malamin addinin Muslunci Sheikh Abduljabbar Kabara. 

Idan ba a manta ba, a zaman da ya gabata, malamin ya kunna cikakken karatun sa da yayi da'awar babu 'Editing' a kotu, inda aka ji cewa shi kore wadannan lafuza yake ga Annabi Muhammad Sallallahu alaihi Wa Alihi Wasallam da ke cikin kunshi tuhuma ba wai tabbatarwa ba. 

An dage zaman zuwa yau dan yi wa malamin tambayoyi akan shedar da ya bayar a zaman da ya gabata. 

A yayin gudanar da tambayoyin, lawyoyi masu gabatar da Æ™ara Æ™arÆ™ashin jagorancin Barista Abdulrahman Mukhtar Abdullahi sun fara da tambayar Malamin matakin karatun sa da jami'ar da ya yi. 

Malamin cikin amsoshin sa, ya nanata cewa shi yayi karatu a dukkan fununu na musulunci wajen Mahaifin sa Sheikh Muhammadul Mukhtar Nasir Kabara, kuma ya samu sahhalewar mahaifin sa ta hawa kujerar sa ta gudanar da wa'azi a ko ina a fadin duniya. Ya kuma kara da cewa ya samu shedar karatu daga manyan Malamai na duniya ciki har da wacca Sarkin Morocco Muhammadus Sadis ya bashi, wanda a cewar Malamin tana gaba da kwalin degree. 

Masu gabatar da Æ™ara sun kara tambayar Malamin ko ya karanci fannin ilimin hadisi, qur'ani da kuma tafsiri, malamin ya bayyana cewa ya karance su da tahiqiqi wajen mahaifin sa, kuma yana haddace da ma'anar Alqur'ani daga Bakara har Nasi.

Anan ne lawyoyi masu gabatar da kara suka bukaci kotu ta bawa Malamin umarnin zuwa da takardun shedun karatun da ya ce yayi a wajen mahaifin sa da kuma wasu Malamai da ya ambata a cikin shari'ar a zama na gaba. 

A yayin cigaba da tambayoyi ga Malamin, Lawya mai gabatar da Æ™ara ya sake dawo da maganar dake cikin kunshi tuhuma na batun auren Nana Safiyya tare da bukatar Malamin ya nuna musu lafazin fyade, kwace, da kuma auren dole, saidai malamin ya bayyana cewa shi yayi ruwaya ne da ma'ana ba da lafazi ba, tare da ishara zuwa hujjojin da ya bayar a baya lokacin da yake kariya akan tuhumar da ake masa. 

A karshe Lawya mai gabatar da Æ™ara ya rufe tambayoyin sa da cewa;
"Ga dukkan masu bibiyar karatun ka na Jauful Fara, abu ne sananne cewa ra'ayin ka shine wannan Alqur'anin da muke amfani da shi "Arrasmul Usmaniy" bai cika ba, shin kana so a cigaba da kallon ka a wannan ra'ayi ko ka sauka daga kai" inji Barista Abdulrahman.

Lawyan dake kare wanda ake Æ™ara yayi suka akan wannan tambaya inda ya ke ganin cewa bata da alaÆ™a da shedar da aka bayar, kuma zata kara jan Shari'ar ne da bata lokacin kotu, a lokaci guda kuma ta kara tada tarzoma a waje. 

Bayan doguwar muhawara tsakanin lawyoyin duka É“angarorin, mai Shari'a AlÆ™ali Ibrahim Sarki Yola ya amince Malam Abduljabbar Kabara ya amsa tambayar, duba da cewa akwai alaka tsakanin tambayar da abinda wanda ake Æ™ara yayi a kotu na rantsuwa da Alqur'ani. 

Malam Abduljabbar Kabara ya bada amsar sa kamar haka;
"Ni ban ce Alqur'ani bai cika, na dai karanta hadisan da suke faÉ—ar haka, amma Ni ba ra'ayi na bane" inji Malam Abduljabbar

A wannan gaÉ“a ne masu gabatar da Æ™ara suka nemi a É—aga Shari'ar zuwa wata rana dan cigaba da tambayoyin su, inda lawyan wanda ake Æ™ara Barista Dalhatu Shehu Usman ya ce ya amince amma yana da roÆ™o a kotu. 

"Na amince a É—aga Shari'ar, amma ina da roÆ™o. RoÆ™o na shine dogaro da sashi na 390 (2) ACJL, ina rokon kotu ta sallami wanda ake kara domin tuhumar da ake masa ba ingantacciya bace, ga dalilai na akan haka;

"Tuhumar da ake masa anan tuhuma ce da ake yin ta a Æ™arÆ™ashin sashe na 382 (b) na kundin shari'ar laifuffuka ba, roko na ya samo asali ne yau bisa ga tambayoyin da masu gabatar da kara sukayi da kuma cajin da ke gaban kotu. "

"Sashen da ake tuhumar wanda ake Æ™ara na 382 (b) Shari'a penal code Yana magana ne akan wanda yayi kalaman É“atanci ga Annabi Muhammad Sallallahu alaihi Wa Alihi Wasallam, idan aka bi cajin nasu za a ga suna tuhumar ne akan an yi É“atanci ga Bukhari da Muslim amma ba ga Annabi Muhammad ba." Inji Barista Dalhatu.

Bayan gama gabatar da hujjojin sa, Lawyan masu gabatar da kara yayi suka inda ya ce wannan roÆ™o da Lawyan wanda ake Æ™ara yayi bai da muhalli a doka, dole sai an kammala da shedu sannan za a iya tabbatarwa ko kore tuhuma. 

Lawyan wanda ake Æ™ara ya sake martani inda yace shi sukar sa yayi ne da kundin tsarin mulkin Æ™asar Najeriya, kuma abinda ya fada din shine dai a rubuce a doka, haka kuma shine a tuhumar da suka rubuto zuwa kotu. 

A karshe mai Shari'a AlÆ™ali Ibrahim Sarki Yola ya dage zaman Shari'ar zuwa ranar 7/7/22 don jin ra'ayin sa akan wannan roÆ™o sannan a cigaba da gudanar da tambayoyi ga Malamin.

YAU NA WAYI GARI NA RABU DA JAGORA NA. 
Innalillahi Waâ€™inna Ilaihi Rajiâ€™un. 
Komai ya samo asali ne, Lokacin Jagora yana first tenure dinshi na Excutive Governor of Kano State.
Lokacin ina primary 3 a Ace Academy dake Gadon Kaya, Malamar Ajin mu Aunty Shade ce ta saka mun suna KWANKWASO lokacin nine TIME KEEPER, duk lokacin da za'ayi Changing Period, Aunty Shade will Shout â€˜KWANKWASOOO come and ring the bellâ€™ Then I will respond with â€˜Okay Maâ€™.
Hakan sunan kwankwaso ya biyo ni, yawancin mutanen da suka sanni da Juda, wayanda basu wuce shekara goma da sani na bane. Har bayan na kammala Secondary School dina a shekarar 2007 abokai na a unguwar mu KWANKWASO suke cemun. 

Duk da ana kira na da sunan Jagora a wannan lokacin bani da shaâ€™awar siyasa ko kadan, lokacin Ina mutuwar son soja,

Mahaifina has no friend in Kano State Government at the time. Baya muâ€™amala da kowa a gwamnati sai yan Garun Malam LG, Hankalin sa yana kan kasuwan cin sa kawai. Mahaifina serious mutum ne, akan Businesses dinshi. 
And that helps me grow and learn so much from him, kuma duk abunda Allah ya kaddara zan zama Mahaifina da Mahaifana mata zanwa Godiya. 

Jagora Na ya turo DR DANGWANI da sauran manyan Jamâ€™iya suka karbe ni, bayan nayi takara ta chairman a Jamiyar UPN.
daga baya aka kaini gaban Jagora kaduna ya karbe mu. Lokacin dana fara magana a gaban Jagora an saka mun recorder sai ciki na ya kada,na fara kyarma Ina rawar murya. Jagora ya fahimta, sai yayi comforting dina, har muka tashi taro cikin murna,muka koma gida.

ZAMANA CLOSE DA JAGORA bai faru dare daya ba. 
Tun bayan wannan lokacin my hunger increases on a daily basis, Nayi sacrificing duk wani Abokina for a moment, I focus solely on politics. Kullum hankali yana kan wani gari Jagora na zaije taro ko wani program sai na bishi, PH, SOKOTO,LAGOS,KATSINA da dai sauran su.
Duk da hakan Jagora bai fara ganeni ba sai daga baya ya gane Rabiâ€™un Garun Malam ne, so da yawa zan bishi wani garin zan gaishe shi ama baya ganeni. 
Akwai Taron committeeâ€™s da akeyi a gidan Jagora na Abuja, lokacin mutane ke zuwa from different part of the Nation suke meeting once every month a gidan Jagora na Maitama Abuja. 
Duk lokacin da zaâ€™ai taron zanyi wanka na saka farar babbar riga da jar hula ta, sai a gida nace na tafi meeting, ama iya kacina bakin gate din dakin taro tare da Securities din Oga, nayi ta musu shishhigi domun mu saba su gane ni, a dan barni na rabe, buri na Su gama meeting din 3 to 4 hours at times, kawai Jagora ya fitoh na tsuguna na gaishe shi, I was so determined and ready to do whatever it takes to break the circle. A haka Jagora ya fara ganeni, har wata rana sai kawai naji Oga yace mun Chairman bayan na gaishe shi, sai na dauka banji da kyau ba. 
Kawai ranar da Oga ya dawo daka gidan Atiku domin taya Shi murna bayan ya lashe zaben fidda gwani a Rivers 2019, bayan na gaishe shi sai naji ya kara cemun Chairman. 
Wannan kalmar itace take tasiri a jikina, itace take yawo a jinina yayin da muke fagen daga da jar hula a kaina. 
Ban taba tunanin zan samu takara ba a zaben 2019 ba, ban taba yiwa wani magana dan Allah ya taimaka mun ba, ban taba kama kafa da kowa ba. 
As of that time I was nothing but a common Kwankwasiyya foot soldier ready to sacrifice my life for KWANKWASO and KWANKWASIYYA. Knowing fully that ko Allah ya dauki rayuwa ta tamkar shahada nayi saboda Ina da yakinin KWANKWASO yana son talaka, kuma yana daya daga cikin kyawawan Dabiâ€™un Manzon mu Annabi MOHAMMAD SAW.
Ban taba tunanin Nayiwa Kwankwasiyya hidima don gobe ta biyani ba, Ina yi ne da yakinin cewa Jagora yana son talaka, kuma zai taimake shi idan ya samu dama, idan aka taimaki talaka burina ya biya, ban taba yin wani abu wai don na burge wani ba, koh da wani ya so ni. Yardar Allah nake nema, idan Allah ya yarda da aikina zai Umarni ga malaâ€™iku su saka mutane su so ni. 

WATA RANA ina cikin mota ina tafiya a kan Titin da Jagora ya gina wanda yake bullewa ta WTC kusa da Kofar Famfo. 
Sai naga Abdulqasim Dan Hajiya yana kirana, Ina dauka yace mun Rabiâ€™u kana ina, nace Ina kano, yace toh ka maza kazo Abuja Oga ya baka takara ta Majalisar Jaha Kura/Garun Malam.
Kawai sai nayi parking a gefe, meh zan gani sai naji na fara Hawaye ban san daka Ina ba, zuciya ta dadi, farin ciki ya lullube ni. Nayiwa Allah Godiya na kama hanya na nufi gida na fadawa mahaifana. 
A wannan lokacin Jagora bai san Mahaifina ba, basu taba haduwa ba, sannan kuma basu san juna ba a muâ€™amalance. Sanadiya ta suka kulla alaka mai kyau kuma mai ban shaâ€™awa. Inajin dadi matukar yarda Oga yake mutunta Mahaifina, duk lokacin da mahaifina y dauka kudi ya bani domin Nayiwa KWANKWASIYYA hidima koda ta 10k ne, Ina matukar jin dadi. 

LOKACIN DANA SAMU LABARIN BA NINE DAN TAKARA BA, kwarai da gaske banji dadi ba, amma banyi mamaki ba saboda nasan Allah shine yake yin komai, a lokacin da yake so, baya Neman shawara, baâ€™a tambayar sa dalili. 
A lokacin naji wata murya na mun magana a kaina, â€˜haba KWANKWASON GARUN MALAM kai da kake so ka gaji Jagora wannan ai somun tabi ne, Ubangiji ke son training zuciyar ka ta saba da pain of loosing, Saboda your task ahead would be more difficult than this. Bani da buri da ya wuce na rayu a bayan kasa Ina mai hidimtawa Alâ€™umma ta kamar Jagora Na. 
Kullum Ina fadawa Abokaina da yan uwa ne cewa babban buri na a Rayuwa ta Allah ya dauki rayuwa ta a filin daga Ina yiwa Alâ€™umma ta Hidima, Tamkar abunda ya faru da Idrees Derby, Morsi, Tafawa Balewa, Sardauna. Da dai sauran su. 
Bana fata Allah ya dauki rayuwa ta akan Gadon Matata. 
Thatâ€™s what success means to me, and a meaningful way to live. 
I know Iâ€™m young and I have a lot of time, Iâ€™m patient than ever, Iâ€™m ready to learn, to grow, to transform in to the best version of myself. 
I always have myself to compete against. 
Iâ€™m not looking for fame, or attention. 
Thereâ€™s fire in me, kullum ruruwa take. 
In Shaa Allah Ubangiji zai amfani damu mu zama farin cikin Alâ€™umma. 

The then minority leader, Abdullahi Mai Kano Chiromawa was the preferred candidate kafin Jagora yayi replacing dinsa da suna na a 2019. 
Bazan yiwa Allah butulci ba, neither my Father was not feeling bad about it. 

Mahaifina shine ya saka Mahaifin Zakariyya akan lalle lalle ya barshi yayi takara, saboda lokacin daya fitoh fada ya masa, yace baka ganin dan uwan ka Rabiâ€™u ne yake nema, bayan kasan banda Amini sama da mahaifinsa.
Bayan Mahaifina ya samu labarin haka 
ya kirawo mahaifin Zakariyya yayi masa fada, sannan yace masa ai kujerar badan Rabiâ€™u kadai akayi ta ba, ka barshi yaje su nema tare, Allah ya basu saâ€™a, abunda bamu so shine gaba da juna.

#CourserağŸ‘‡
Coursera wata manhaja ce da aka kirkireta domin koyo da koyarwa ta hanyar yanar gizo (Online). Wannan manhaja (Coursera) wasu professors ne guda 2 masana na'ura me kwakwalwa (Computer) prof Andrew Ng da prof Daphne Koller suka kirkireta a shekara ta 2012 sannan aka fara amfani da ita a 2011.

Coursera ta hada hannu da manya manyan shahararrun jami'o'i da tsangayoyi (World leading Universities and Institute) na duniya sama da 200.

Daga cikin manya manyan jami'o'in da Coursera ta hada hannu dasu akwai;

1.Massachusetts Institute of technology (M. I. T) Jami'a ta farko a jerin manyan jami'o'in duniya 
2.Stanford University California Jami'a ta biyu a jerin jami'o'in duniya.Da sauran manya manyan jami'o'in duniya 

Wannan manhaja ana koyara da darusa daban-daban ta video wasu kyauta ne wasu kuma ba kyauta bane.

Me ya kamata ayi da Facebook Account din Mamaci, bayan mutuwa ta dauke shi?
___________________________________
Akwai sauka (Going Offline) daga Facebook da in muka yi shike nan mun sauka kenan, babu wanda zai sake ganin mu Online, mun fita daga duniya kuma munyi logout din karshe daga kafar sadarwar Facebook.
~ Idan 'dan uwan ku ya rasu yaya za kuyi da Facebook Account din sa?
Abu na farko shine, kuyi login zuwa Account dinsa, idan baku San Password din ba kuyi forgot Password, sai kuyi sanarwa kamar haka:
~ "Yan uwa Musulmi sunana (wane) 'dan uwan (wane) Mai wannan Account, Ina sanar daku rasuwar sa, Kuma an binne shi a Makabartar gari kaza, rana kaza".

~ "Bayan haka mu 'yan uwan sa muna rokon yafiya daku yafe masa, Kuma don Allah duk Wanda yake binsa bashi, Rance, idan bai yafe ba ga number wayar mu, ya kira ya tabbatar da hakkin sa dake kan mamacin, idan kuma ya yafe muna godiya".
~ "Idan kuma wasu kayayyaki ne aka bashi (shi mamacin) azo ayi bayani, za'a same mu ta wannan number......".
Sa'annan Kuma ku 'yan uwan mamacin kada ku yarda ku bude Inbox dinsa, chatting dinsa da mutane, sai dai wajen neman Hujja, idan mutum yace mamacin ya karbi kudi a waje na, Kuma ta Facebook muka tattauna batun karban kudin".

~ Sai kuje Inbox kan Account din wanda yace ya bayar da kudin ku duba chatting dinsu domin ku tabbatar da abinda yayi Da'awa, saboda akwai wadanda idan sun mutu akan ga sun rubuta (Wane yana bina Bashin kudi Naira kaza da kaza) zaku gani a littafin dake rubuta basussukan da ake binsa.
~ To amma baza ku san wanene ba, kuma baza ku san ina za'a same shi ba, zaku ga cewa baku sanshi a garin ku ba, baku sanshi acikin abokan sa na zahiri a gida ba, toh kuyi posting a Facebook dinsa, zasu bayyana muku.

~ Saboda Facebook ya hada abota da yawa, zumunci Mai karfi, ya hada aure da soyayya sosai fiye da yadda baka tsammani. So, abubuwan da yawa a yanzu ta Facebook mutane suke tattauna su a rubuce ko Facebook Voice Note.
~ Idan ba irin wadannan dalilan ba haka kawai ku bude Chatting din da mamacin yayi don ku kalli wane irin chatting mamacin yayi, wannan kuskure ne, neman sanin sirrin mamacin ne Wanda yin irin wannan bincike binciken zai iya fito wasu abubuwan da ake bukatan rufe su.

~ Domin Manzon Allah yayi wata magana game da wankan Gawar mamaci, Wanda nake ganin maganar bata tsaya a wajen wankan Gawa ba kawai, zata iya shiga har cikin abubuwan da suka shafi irin wadannan kafofi na Sadarwa bayan mutum ya tafi.

~ Manzon Allah yace:
"Duk Wanda yaje wankan Gawa, zai yi wanka wa mamaci, sai yaga abinda ya gani, sai ya rufa sirrin mamacin, Allah zai yafe masa manya manyan zunuban sa guda Arba'in".
A cikin wata Riwaya yace "Allah zai bashi Ladan shiga Aljannah da kaso 40".
Wato marking din da ake so Kaci ko samu kafin ka shiga Aljannah, marking 100, to za'a baka 40 daga ciki, idan ka rufe Asirin mamaci daka gani yayin wankan Gawar sa.

~ Shin akwai abinda ake gani ne a tattare da mamaci yayin wankan Gawar sa? 
Eh, akwai.
~ Wani lokaci idan aka je wankan Gawa akan ga Gawar mamacin ta canza daga yadda aka sanshi, kamar aga yayi bakikkirin, fatar sa tayi baki fiye da yadda aka sani, ko kuma aga idon sa sun zubo kan hancin sa, ko aga harshen sa ya zazzago yayi tsawo har kan ruwan cikin sa, ko zuwa kan Cibiyar sa, harshe kawai.

~ Ko aji Gawar sa tana wari, Kuma warin daga jikin sa ne, to duk Wanda yaga irin wannan a tattare da Gawar Musulmi sai yayi shiru bai gaya wa kowa ba har Shima ya rasu, to za'a yafe masa manyan manyan zunubbai har guda 40.
~ To Ina Kuma ga Wanda yaje yayi ta bude Chatting din mamaci yana bi, yana so yaga irin chatting din da Marigayin yake yi, watakil zuciyar sa ta saka masa son yaga ko mamacin yana chatting din batsa da mata, ko wasu abubuwan da ba za'a so aga Musulmi ya tafi ya bar su ba.

~ Idan kaga Gawar mamaci tayi muni, ko kaga wasu daga cikin abubuwan da muka ambata a sama, hakan ba yana nufin mamacin 'dan wuta bane, hakan ba dalili ne akan mutumin banza ne ba, sai dai Gawar batai kyau ba.
~ Sau da yawa hakan tana bayyana ne akan gawan Fasikai na bayyane ko na boye, idan Mala'ikun mutuwa sunyi musu duka kafin su cire ransu. To idan Shari'a zata ce kayi shiru idan kaga wani aibi a Gawar Musulmi bayan Shari'ar ce tace kaje kayi masa wankan, Amma tace kayi shiru, toh ina Kuma ga bude Chatting din mamacin da Shari'a bata ce ka bude ba?

~ Daga karshe, sharwari guda biyu game da Facebook Account din Mamaci zuwa ga 'yan uwan mamacin:

1. Kada a goge Account din gaba daya (Permanent Deletion), idan mutum ne da yake saka abubuwa na addini da fadakarwa da wayar da kan mutane akan lamuran rayuwa da Ibada.
Ku bar masa Facebook din da Account din, domin ya cigaba da samun Ladan wadannan posting din da yayi game da rayuwa da addini, watakil wadannan posting din su samar masa da Ladan da zai samu Rahama daga wajen Ubangijin sa.

~ Saboda a yanzu Search Engines irin su Google sukan kawo mutum har Facebook idan akwai relevancy na abinde me bincike yake nema. Watakil wani yana neman wani bayani, sai Search Engine ya kawo shi Facebook Account din Dan uwan naku, ya duba ya karanta, ya karu da ilimi, ba tare da kun sani ba, shi yana Kabari zai sani.
~ Kaga idan kun goge Account dinsa kunyi masa asaran wannan Ladan da watakil zai fi shekaru 100 yana samun Lada bayan mutuwar sa.

Kayi tunani da ace duk an goge videos da Audios din Sheikh Albani Zaria saboda kawai ya rasu, ko Sheikh Ja'afar ko Malam Abubakar Gumi, ba anyi asara wa mutane ba? Kuma da an cutar da Mamatan, toh haka Facebook Account din wanda yake yada alkhairi, ku bar masa ya cigaba da samun Lada.

2. Abu na biyu, babu laifi kuje ku bibiyi Public Post dinsa, ku 'yan uwan mamacin ku goge duk wani posting din da kuke ganin bai dace ba, kamar hotunan matan da sukai shigar da bata dace da Musulunci ba, videos din kida da Waka, videon din rawa, posting din da yake nuna kiyayya ga wasu ko wani, ko abubuwan wasanni irin Ball da kayan dariya.
~ Bayan kun goge sai ku roki Allah ya yafe masa, ya gafarta masa, ya karbe shi a matsayin bawa Mai neman taimakon Rahama da Yafiya daga Ubangiji.

Sai shawara gare mu wadanda muke Raye a yanzu akan Facebook.
1. Muyi kokari mu dinga posting din da ko yau muka kwanta a Kabari ba zamu bar baya da kura ba, haka chatting din mu.

Me ya kamata ayi da Facebook Account din Mamaci, bayan mutuwa ta dauke shi?
___________________________________
Akwai sauka (Going Offline) daga Facebook da in muka yi shike nan mun sauka kenan, babu wanda zai sake ganin mu Online, mun fita daga duniya kuma munyi logout din karshe daga kafar sadarwar Facebook.
~ Idan 'dan uwan ku ya rasu yaya za kuyi da Facebook Account din sa?
Abu na farko shine, kuyi login zuwa Account dinsa, idan baku San Password din ba kuyi forgot Password, sai kuyi sanarwa kamar haka:
~ "Yan uwa Musulmi sunana (wane) 'dan uwan (wane) Mai wannan Account, Ina sanar daku rasuwar sa, Kuma an binne shi a Makabartar gari kaza, rana kaza".

~ "Bayan haka mu 'yan uwan sa muna rokon yafiya daku yafe masa, Kuma don Allah duk Wanda yake binsa bashi, Rance, idan bai yafe ba ga number wayar mu, ya kira ya tabbatar da hakkin sa dake kan mamacin, idan kuma ya yafe muna godiya".
~ "Idan kuma wasu kayayyaki ne aka bashi (shi mamacin) azo ayi bayani, za'a same mu ta wannan number......".
Sa'annan Kuma ku 'yan uwan mamacin kada ku yarda ku bude Inbox dinsa, chatting dinsa da mutane, sai dai wajen neman Hujja, idan mutum yace mamacin ya karbi kudi a waje na, Kuma ta Facebook muka tattauna batun karban kudin".

~ Sai kuje Inbox kan Account din wanda yace ya bayar da kudin ku duba chatting dinsu domin ku tabbatar da abinda yayi Da'awa, saboda akwai wadanda idan sun mutu akan ga sun rubuta (Wane yana bina Bashin kudi Naira kaza da kaza) zaku gani a littafin dake rubuta basussukan da ake binsa.
~ To amma baza ku san wanene ba, kuma baza ku san ina za'a same shi ba, zaku ga cewa baku sanshi a garin ku ba, baku sanshi acikin abokan sa na zahiri a gida ba, toh kuyi posting a Facebook dinsa, zasu bayyana muku.

~ Saboda Facebook ya hada abota da yawa, zumunci Mai karfi, ya hada aure da soyayya sosai fiye da yadda baka tsammani. So, abubuwan da yawa a yanzu ta Facebook mutane suke tattauna su a rubuce ko Facebook Voice Note.

True life story

Wani Babban mutum a nan Kano aka kawowa yarsa lefe akwati goma sha biyu banda kits, aka Kira shi ya gani.

sai yace wallahi bazai karba ba, sai an mayar. Aka kada aka raya yace sai an mayarda kayan

Ko kun San dalilinsa :-
cewa yayi

1) Yata ba sayarda ita Zan yi ba. So nake tayi aure a matsayin ibada ba holewa ba.

2) Kuma yata tana da kanne yammata, shike nan sauran kannenta sai su sa rai suma sai an kawo musu akwati goma sha biyu ko sama da haka, kuma idan Allah bai horewa mijin ba, su raina shi. Suga ya gaza.

3) Suturar da ya zuba acikin lefen masu tsadar gaske, duk iyayensa da suka kawo lefen babu wacce tasa mai tsadar su, me yasa ya kasa siyawa iyayensa su sa kafin ya siyawa yata, idan mai arziki ne shi ba makaryaci ba.

4) Da ace rabin kudin kayan lefen, abinci ya siya, Shekara nawa zasu yi suna cin abincin shi da Matarsa kafin ya kare.

5) Yanzu da yai wannan lefen ya nunawa yata shi Mai arziki ne, idan zama yai zama tsakaninsu har ta gane abinda take zato ba haka bane, yana ganin zai yi mutunci a idonta.

6) Shike nan yana so yata ta ringa alfahari acikin kawaye cewa babu wacce aka yiwa lefe kamar nata, Wanda hakan zai jawo mata kiyayya da hassada a tsakanin kawayenta, kuma shi kansa alfaharin haramun ne.

7) Yana daga cikin aladar da ta haddasa zinace zinace a kasar Hausa, domin samari basu da wadatar hada kayan lefe. Gara su kebe da yan matan nasu yafi sauki.

Na fada kuma babu canji ko dai a rage lefe ko kuma a dakatar da maganar aure har sai lokacin da shi da iyayensa suka fahimci abinda nake nufi.

Idan an rage lefen anyi biki ta tare, idan yana so ya siyo mata kantin kwari ta ajiye a dakinta babu ruwa na, matarsa ce.

Daga TJ Zarewa

Wani observation da Sheikh Aminu Bello wannan matashin malamin É—an makarantar nan dake aiki da hankali wato Ashabul Kahf ya fitar, yaja hankali na matuÆ™a.

A saboda RahamarSa ya turo mana Manzon Rahama Annabi Muhammad SAW, "Wama arsalnaka illa Rahmatallil alamin". To Population na duniya ayau yakai 7.9 billions wanda musulman ciki basu fi 1.9 billion ba. Gaba É—aya 6 billions kafurai ne. Duk wannan Rahamar da ake faÉ—a 6 billions Æ´an wuta ne kenan?

Wannan fa iya wannan zamanin ne, akwai zamanan da suka shuÉ—e wanda musulmai basu kai yawan haka ba, sannan anan gaba ba zasu kai yawan haka ba. Idan ace zamu haÉ—e zamanai baki É—aya, to zamuyi mamakin yadda al'umma zasu shiga wuta. Æ˜alilan ne zasu shiga aljanna.

A wannan Al'ummar fa akwai waÉ—anda har yau da'awa ta Addinin Musulunci bata riske su ba, akwai wadanda ta riske su ne a bai-bai. Kuma ba da ance maka addinin Musulunci ne addinin gaskiya ba shikenan an yanke maka hanzari ba, ko Annabawa an basu mu'ujizozi da suke gamsarwa amma duk da haka ake cewa sihiri ne, kuma su Æ™ara wata har sai sunyi convincing din al'umma.

Shi yasa dama Sheikh Ibrahim Khalil yace a ranar lahira bada sunan kai Musulmi za'a yi maka hisabi ba, aikin ka ne kawai, ko kirista zai iya shiga aljanna.

Matar da ta ke kwanciya a dakinta ta kira ni, ta ke ce min Umma (Haka suke kirana dukansu) Yarinyar nan marainiya da kike baiwa abinci da Azumi ta rasu gurin haihuwa, mamaki ya kama ni na ce yaushe aka yi mata aure, sai ta ce min ai ba a yi mata aure ba, ashe daman kafin ta samu gurin rabon abincinmu idan yunwa ta isheta ko kannenta suka isheta da kukan yunwa idan babansu bai samo ba, tana zuwa gurin wani me kanti ya bata dari biyu ko dari, har omo da sabulun wanka yake bata, ashe yana amfani da ita, wannan kwanciyar da ta ke yi a dakina laulayi ta ke yi, to ranar da ta fara nakuda ta fara jijjiga aka kwasheta aka tafi asibiti, ana zuwa aka ce jininta ya hau sannan babu jini a jikinta, ga kuma dan ba daidai ya ke ba, don haka sai an biya dubu dari za a yi mata aikin gaggawa, Babanta ya ce shi ko naira dari ba shi da ita, wani me Adaidaita ne ma ya taimaka ya kawo su asibitin, don haka aka juya da ita gida, matan gidan suka zuba matai do tana ta jijjiga har ta mutu ita da abun da ke cikinta a gabansu sannan aka je aka binneta.

GWAMNATIN BUHARI TABA MATASA 
DAMARMAKI GA WASU DAGA 
CIKINSU.

(1) trader money:- domin ragewa kananan ya'n kasuwa radadi.

(2) market money:- shima domin bunqasa kasuwanci anajeriya.

(3)farmer money:- domin bunqasa sha'anin noma da kiwo anajeriya.

(4)N-power:- ga wadanda suka gama karatun sikandire zuwa jamia domin arage zaman banza da rashin aikin yi N 30,000.

(5)N-agro :- domin tabbatar da harkar noma tabunqasa anajeriya.

(6)corona- virus loans:- domin rage radadin annobar corona.

Wadannan kadan daga cikin damarmakin fa shugaba buhari yabaiwa matasan najeriya dama al'ummar kasa baki daya.

Maganar gaskiya, dukkan hadisan rike hannu a sallah babu ingantacce ko daya. Wannan kuma mas'ala ce ta ijma'i tsakanin malaman fiqhu. Ko da ilimi na Musdalahul hadees aka bibiyi hadisan za'a tabbatar da haka. Hadisai ne da gaba daya basu wuce 11 ba.

Amma kullum tambayar da muke yi akan rike hannun nan shi ne, yaya kaifiyyar rikewar take? Kowa da yadda yake yi. Wani kan kirji, wani kan ciki wani tsakanin ciki da kirji. Kowa dai da inda ya zaba. Babu wanda ya riwaito abu daya na yadda ake rikewar.

A sallah kuma, babu wani aiki da ya fi rike hannu bayyana don ana yinsa ne a tsaye. Ko na nesa zai ga yadda aka rike hannu ya zantar balantana na kusa. KU TAIMAKAWA YARONNAN A CIRE MASA BULLET A KIRJINSAğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­

Tun kwanaki aka turo min yaronnan da bullet din bindigar yan vigilante ya hudawa kirji ana neman taimako, na ce su yi hakuri muna da layin patients, jiya aka kara kirana cewar numfashin yaron ya fara daukewa saboda jimawar bullet din a kirjinsa kusan wata guda, kuma ga shi babu halin kai su asibiti.

Tsautsayin ya faru ne lokacin da yaron suke wasa da abokinsa a dakin su abokin wanda babansa ya kasance dan Vigilante ne, sai harbi mutane suka ji ana shiga dakin aka tarar da yaron a sume bullet ya huda kirjinsa, aka yi asibiti da shi, bayan duba shi da asibitin suka yi suka gano bullet din ya shiga kirjinsa dole sai an kai shi babban asibiti an yi aiki, su kuma iyayansa ko kudin motar da za su je asibitin babu balle kudin aikin. Don haka suka ci gaba da zama a gida sai dai ayi masa dressing kawai, to jiya asibitin suka tattabatar musu idan ba a yi aikin ba yaron zai iya rasa ransa, shine suka kira ni.

Jamaa ku taimaka mu ceci rayuwar yaronnan kamar yadda muka saba, ga Wanda za su taimaka za su iya tura taimakonsu ta account dinmu. 
0109299375, Diamond/Acces bank, Creative Helping Needy Foundation Ko. 
0127121207 Gt bank, Fauziyya Danladi Sulaiman. 

Ga masu neman Karin bayani za su iya tuntubarmu ta WhatsApp ko message ko kiranmu ta wannan lambar waya 07037147070.

Allah ya ba ku ikon taimakawa ko da tayamu yadawa ne domin mu ceci rayuwar yarannan amin.

TSAKANIN ASIBITIN MALAM AMINU KANO(AKTH) DA GWABNATIN TARAYYA WAYE BAYA TAUSAYIN TALAKA?

Asibitin Malam Aminu Kano, yana daya daga cikin mafakara da talaka ke samu ya fake idan ciwo ya yi tsanani, domin daga asibitin Murtala da Asibitin Nasarasawa kai da duk wani asbiti a kano har da asibitocin kudi nan ne karshen gurin da za a tura mara lafiya, daga nan kuwa sai dai mutuwa, sai dai idan kana da hali ka fita kasar waje.

A karkashin kungiyarmu ta creative helping needy foundation nan ne asibitin da kai tsaye muke iya kai marasa lafiyarmu a duba su cikin kwanciyar hankali da kuma gaggawa, don haka kaso kusa 70% na marasa lafiyarmu nan asibitin mu ke kaisu.

Amma yanzu abun takaici komai na asibitin ya linka kaso biyu har zuwa kaso hudu, misali a baya kudin ganin likita Naira Dari shida muke biya yanzu ya koma Dubu Biyu da Dari daya, kudin bude fayal Dari biyar ya koma Dubu daya, kudin Gado kwanaki biyar daga Dubu Ashirin ya koma Dubu Arba'in, Kudin operation idan mace za ta Haihuwa daga Dubu Saba'in da Biyar ya koma Dubu Dari Biyu da Hamsin har ma fiye da hakan wani lokacin, yanzu wata kanwata a satin nan da nakuda ta kamata mai hadari aka ce aiki za a yi mata an kashe kudi kusan Dubu Dari uku da wani abu, ya Ilahi ta ina Talaka zai iya biyan wannan kudin?

Babban tashin hankalin kuma duk sauran asibitocin irin su Murtala da Nassarawa da Kuroda da sauransu, an musu taron dangin da za ka iya zuwa sau goma ace maka babu gado, don kanwar tawa haka aka dinga yawo da ita cikin Nakuda kusan asibiti biyar ana cewa babu gado, karshe aka ga za ta iya rasa ranta aka tafi asibitin Malam Aminu Kano ana zuwa suka ce sai an bayar da Dubu Arba'in na gado, sannan kudin aiki Dubu Dari biyu da sittin, babu zabi domin idan ba a yi aikin ba za ta iya mutuwa don haka dole suka yadda ayi aikin a haka.
Yanzu ta kai kusan wata guda ana ta turo min marasa lafiya ina gani na kasa posting saboda ga rashin kudi a hannun mutane ga tsadar asibiti, wallahi marasa lafiyar da ke rokona yanzu ko sakonsu bana iya budewa, shekaranjiya wata zagina ta dinga yi a message wai ana kirana na ki dagawa ina wulakantasu ni din banza, sai hakuri na bata domin na san tana cikin damuwar rashin lafiyar dan'uwanta ne.

Yanzu idan ka je asibitin Malam za ka ga babu mutane domin da yawa ba za su iya biya ba, wani dan yayata kwanani da ya yi hadari kwanansa biyar a Asibitin suka nemi sallama ba don yawarke ba, domin ba za su iya biyan kudin ba komai na su ya kare.

Amma bayan bincike da muka yi na dalilin wannan tashi da komai ya yi sai aka sanar da ni wai asibitin sun kara kudaden ne saboda baa samun wutar Lantarki sai Diesel suke siya, kusan kullum wai sai sun sayi miliyan guda koma fiye da haka kafin su iya ayyukansu, don haka ba su da zabi da ya wuce su kara kudaden akan talaka.

Yanzu marasa lafiyarmu da ke followup, irin su Zakiyya (Mai ciwon nono) da Iyami mai shekaru uku da sauran, sama da marasa lafiya guda ashirin duk abun da muka ajiye na su ya kare, ga wasu kuma akan layi mun rasa yaya za mu yi da su wasu sai mutuwa suke yi kafin ma ace mun yi posting.

Ban san wacce irin kasa muke ba da babu abun da ya damu shugabanninmu da mu ba, domin babu wanda na taba ji ya yi magana akan wannan matsalar, da mu rayu da mu mutu duk uwarsu daya ubansu daya a gurinsu.

Don haka muna kira da babbar murya ga wanda abun ya shafa musamman shugabanni ku duba halin da asibitin Malam Aminu ke ciki ku kawo mana dauki don Allah don Annabi, domin idan ba a dauki mataki ba mutane za su ci gaba da mutuwa kullum saboda babu yadda za su iya biyan wadancan kudade, wani akan dubu biyu da zai ga likitan kawai sai a rasa ransa, mutanan da kudin motar da za su zo asibitin ba su da shi?
Ina kuma kira ga masu turo marasa lafiya da su yi hakuri, wallahi babu yadda zan yi ne, ni na fi son ace kullum na yi postin mara lafiya ya samu sauki, Allah ka kawo dauki amin.

ASUU da FG

Da dai niya na yi na yi gum amma saboda nananniyar fahimtar al'umma dangane da lamarin, dole nu ce uffan a matsayina na shugaban dalibai masu karantar Linguistics (ilimin kimiyyar harshe).

Ba abin mamaki bane don ka ga mutanan gari na zagin ASUU akan an yi musu karin albashi amma sun ki su yarda su janye yajin aiki. Don mu gane yadda abin yake dalla-dalla, bari na yi gwari-gwari bisa ma'auni na Falsafas (Philosophers) "logic".

1) Red Herring Fallacy (dodging the question)
2) Strawman Fallacy

Red Herring Fallacy : Wato shi wannan wani nau'i ne na "fallacy" da ake kawar da tunanin abokin muhawara ko masu sauraron muhawara ta hanyar kawo wani abu na daban. Misali, sai uwa ta cewa danta: "Abba, ka je an maka allurar kuwa ?" Shi kuma sai ya ce: "Umma maganin jiya akwai daci. Za ki siya min zuma?" Shikken ka ga an kawar da batun allura an koma kan magani mai daci da batun siyan zuma. Ga wani misalin, sai ka ce "Alhaji, wallahi rufin gidanane ya fado haka yasa sai yanzu na zo". Shi kuma Alaji sai ya ce "Allah sarki ! Na ji an ce dan ka Hanif ma yana fama da zazzabi. Toh ga dubu biyu ka sai masa magani". Ka ga shikkenan Alaji ya kawar da maganar rufin gida ballantana ma ya taimaka a kara rufawa. 

To da wannan fallacy din gwamnati ta yi amfani ta gusar da tunanin mutan gari da wasu daga cikin dalibai. Tabbas matasa sune Æ™ashin bayan dukkan al'umma, kuma idan suka zama masu nagarta zama sama kyakkyawar al'umma haka zalika idan suka gurÉ“ace za'a sama gurÉ“atattun al'umma.

Wato tunanina a kullum shine makomar mu a gobe, koda yaushe idan an tashi magana xakaji matasa suna cewa a basu dama. Don su zama jagorori a mabanbanta wurare. Tare da cika bakin zasu kawo sauyi, bugu da Æ™ari har da kurin matashi shi ya san matsalar matashi.

SUNCI KASUWA SUN YAFE WA BELLO TURJI TA'ADDANCIN DA YA AIKATA

Shugaban 'yan ta'addan jeji masu garkuwa da mutane da ya addabi jihohin Zamfara, Sokoto da Katsina Bello Turji mugun dan ta'adda ne, wanda ya mayar da mata dubbai zawarawa, ya mayar da yara dubbai marayu, ya yiwa matan Aure fyade

Ta'addancin da wannan mugun halitta yayi a doron kasa ba zai misaltu ba, har a cikin Masallaci yayi lalata da matan mutane, Bello Turji yayi ta'addanci yadda yaga dama tare da daurin gindin wasu manyan 'yan siyasa da Sarakuna da suka hana a dakileshi tunda jimawa

Sai gashi an wayi gari Mataimakin Gwamman jihar Zamfara ya bada sanarwan cewa Bello Turji ya tuba daga aikata ta'addanci, kuma wai Gwamnatin Zamfara ta karbi tubansa, saboda sun renawa al'umma wayo

Abinda ake zargi ne yake neman ya tabbata, ance Bello Turji ya tara makudan kudi Biliyoyin Naira, ya rasa yadda zaiyi da kudin a cikin jeji, shine masu gidansa a siyasa suka bada shawaran ya bayyana tubarsa, domin a kyaleshi ya shigo cikin gari su ci wannan makudan kudade da ya tara

Sheikh Murtala Asada ya fayyace komai, kuma ya tona asirin alakar Gwamnatin Jihar Zamfara da Bello Turji, ga bidiyo na saka a YouTube channel, ku taba wannan link domin ku saurari bayanin Malam

ABINDA YA HADDASA YAKIN UKRAINE DA RUSSIA

Ukraine da Russia kasashen turawa ne da suke bangaren gabas a nahiyar Turai, makwabta ne, suna kusa da juna sosai, al'adunsu kusan iri daya

Akwai wasu yankuna ko manyan birane wanda ake kira da Crimea, Luhansk, Donetsk da sauransu wanda suke yankin Arewa da kuma gabashin Kasar Ukraine akan iyaka da Kasar Russia, yankuna ne da suke fama da rikicin neman 'yancin kai daga Ukraine, kuma yankin ya tara mutane 'yan asalin Kasar Russia

Shugaban Kasar Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yana da ra'ayin kulla alaka da Amerika, domin har ya bayyana niyyarsa na shigar da Ukraine cikin kungiyar NATO (North Atlantic Treaty Organization) kungiyar hadin kan wasu kasashen turawa wanda Amerika ta kirkira bayan yakin duniya na biyu, akwai Kasashen Turawa talatin a cikin kungiyar NATO karkashin jagorancin Amurka wanda suke da rundinar tsaro na musamman da zasu iya kalubalantar barazanan tsaro 

Sannan akwai kungiyar kasashen turawa G7 (Group of Seven) masu karfin tattalin arziki a Turai wanda ya hada kasashen Amerika, Ingila, Faransa, Italiya, Japan, Germany da Kanada, sun hadu sun kafa kungiyar G7 (Group of Seven) domin su samu cikakken hadin kai a bangaren tattalin arziki, siyasa da kuma tsaro, to shi shugaban Kasar Ukraine mai makwabta da Russia yana son ya shigar da Kasar cikin kungiyar NATO da G7

Ukraine Kasace ko wani yanki ne da ya taba zama karkashin mulkin Gwamnatin tsohuwar tarayyar Soviet (Russia), musamman bangaren gabas da Arewacin Ukraine inda ake fama da rikici a yanzu, to bayan kasashen duniya sun karya Gwamnatin Soviet a wancan lokaci sai Russia ta jagoranci kafa rundinar soji na musamman na kungiyar hadin kan kasashe masu manufa irin nata, wato Collective Security Treaty Organization (CSTO), akwai Kasashe kamar haka Russia, Armenia, Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, Georgia, Azerbaijan da sauransu

Wato yadda Amerika ta jagoranci wasu kasashen turai aminanta wajen kafa kungiyar NATO to kamar hakane Kasar Russia ta jagoranci kawayenta suka kafa kungiyar CSTO, kasashen NATO da CSTO basa shiri da juna sam, Ukraine tana kan iyaka da Russia, to sai ya zama shugaban Ukraine yana son ya shigar da Kasar cikin NATO da G7, shi kuma shugaban Russia yana ganin hakan a matsayin wata babban barazana da kuma takalar yaki idan aka wayi gari makwabciyar kasarsa ta shiga NATO, saboda a duniya ba Kasar da Russia take gaba da ita kamar Amerika

Tun a shekarar 2014 shugaban Kasar Russia Vladimir Putin ya bawa yankin Crimea dake Kasar Ukraine 'yanci wanda hakan shine mafarin yaki tsakanin kasashen da suke makwabta da juna, a farkon wannan satin sai aka wayi gari rana tsaka Shugaban Kasar Russia ya sake bayyana wasu yankuna da suke gabashin Ukraine wato Luhansk da Donetsk a matsayin kasa mai cin gashin kanta, wato ya 'yanta yankin daga Kasar Ukraine, sai ya tura dubbannin sojoji kimanin dubu dari da hamsin zuwa yankin da suke cikin Ukraine da sunan zasuyi aikin kwantar da tarzoma da kuma bada cikakken kariya wa 'yan asalin Kasar Russia da suke yankin 

To ita kuma Kasar Ukraine da babbar kawarta Amerika sai suka kalli hakan a matsayin wata babbar barazana da shirin takalar yaki, domin abinda Amerika take kalla shine Russia tana shirin mamayar Kasar Ukraine ne gaba daya, to wannan ne ya jawo halin da ake ciki yanzu har Russia ta kaddamar da harin makamai masu linzami a babban birnin Ukraine

Yanzu haka shugaban Kasar Ukraine yana kira ga Kasashen duniya su kawo masa dauki, kuma yace duk wani 'dan kasar ya saka kakin soji a fito ayi yaki, sai dai da alama ya hadu da yauran Kasar Amerika, abin mamaki Amerika ta gagara mayar da martani, ko bawon gyada bata bare ba don aji kara bayan Russia ta kaddamar da hari kan Ukraine, wato kamar za'a ce Amerika ta yaudari Ukraine da zakin baki da kuma farfaganda

Domin ba shakka Amerika ko da wasa bata isa ta takali Russia da yaki ba saboda tsoron abinda zai biyo baya, kuma manyan kasashe aminan Kasar Russia irin China da North Korea ba zasu kyale ba, suma zasu marawa Russia baya, idan Amerika tayi gangancin amfani da makami to hakan zai iya jefa duk kasashen duniya cikin rigimar yaki da karayar tattalin arziki

Muna rokon Allah Ya sa yakin da suke neman tayarwa a duniya ya kare a kansu

Ya kamata kowanne mutum cikinmu ya kasance yana da amini, wanda za suke taskance sirrikan juna. Duba da rayuwar Ma'aiki S.A.W. Manzonmu ya kasance yana da aminai cikin abokansa (sahabbai). Saboda muhimmancin haka. Kai kuma wanda aka zaba a matsayin amini ka ji tsoron Allah, idan amininka ya fada ma sirri, saboda ya yarda da kai, kar ka fada wa wani, duk irin yardarka da shi. Mu fa tuna cewa: abokai daban; aminai daban. A yi nazari wajen zabar amini saboda halin rayuwa. Amininka sirrinka ne kana raye ko bayan rayuwarka. Lokacin da kake raye zai tsayu a kan lamuranka har ka kai ga nasara. Bayan matuwarka kuwa zai kula ma da bayanka; iyaye, 'ya'ya da mata.
Dan'adam yana da bukatar amini a rayuwarsa. Mutum ba ya iya rayuwa shi kadai ba tare da taimakon waninsa ba. Kuma wanda ya dace ya zama amininka shine wanda ya cika wadannan siffofi:
-Mutum mumini mai takawa,
-Mai kula da addini,
-Mai biyayya ga iyayensa,
-Mai son ilimi da ma'abota ilimi,
-Mai son cigaban mutane,
-Mai ganin alkhairan mutane sama da sharrinsu,
-Mai gaskiya cikin lamuransa,
-Mai girmama fahimtar mutane da ra'ayoyinsu.

Ya Ubangiji! Ka azurta mu da aminai masu kaunarmu da kuma kare mana sirrikanmu, muna raye ko ba ma raye.

Haduwar waya: saurayi daga Kaduna ya damfari budurwan sa a zariya dubu 45 

Daga Barrister Nuraddeen Isma'eel 

"Wata budurwa mai suna maryam mairainiyan Allah, mahaifin ta ya dade da rasuwa, haifaffiyan garin zariya. "Inda ta yarda da wani saurayin ta da suka hadu a yanar gizo, ya umarci da ita budurwan tayi masa iso ga iyayenta zai zo har gida a yi maganar fara nemanta." 

"Budurwa mayam tace ita dai sun Dade suna soyayya a iya yanar gizo, wannan ne ganin shi ido da ido na farko, "inda ya ce mata Dan Kaduna shi toh" ita a kan haka ta yarda." 

"Bayan ya zo wurin ta, maryam ta hada masa goma sha tara na arziki na tarba, kuma nan wuri guda saurayi ya tsaya ya cinye duk abidan aka hada masa, kama na ciye-ciye da tande-tande." 

"Saurayi baiyi wata-wataba, ya ka da baki cewa! Zai siyawa maryam wayar salula ta zamani wacce takai ta dubu 45 haka."

Bugu da kari Saurayi Hamisu, nan yake tambayan maryam a ina ake sayar da wayoyi ? Sai budurwa maryam take bashi amsa cewa! Akwai Wanda suka saba suna sayan waya a hannun sa, kuma yana da sauki." 

"Hakan ya kara bude wani sabon fai-fai ne, da shi Wanda akaje za'a siya waya a hannun shi ya yarda da maryam, saboda sun dau lokuta suna harkan arziki."

Rahoto ya cigaba da bayyana mana cewa! aka je wurin mai sayar da waya ya dauki waya ta dubu 45 aka baiwa saurayi, sai shi saraurayi yace zai yiwa mai sayar da wayan tiransfa din kudin shi idan suka dawo gidan su maryam saboda ya bar wayan da zai masa tiransfa cikin caji a dakin da aka sauke shi, "Mai sayar da waya ya yarda da hakan, koba komi ya wayi maryam.

"Dawowan su tare da saurayin gidan su maryam ba wuya, sai saurayi yace maryam ta bashi wayan da aka amso ta dubu 45, maryam ta dau waya ta bashi biyo bayan amsan waya sai saurayi yace zai je masallaci a domin yin sallah, daman cewa yayi zai kwana daya a gidan su maryam din."

"Fitar saurayi ba wuya a domin zuwa masallaci tare da wayan da aka karbo daga hannun mai siyarwa, tunda saurayi ya fita ba'a kara saka shi a ido ba ya gudu, tare da wayan naira dubu 45, bisani shi kuma mai sayar da waya ya daura hannu bisa ka yace sai an biya shi wayan shi shima ba wayan shi bane amsowa yayi ya sayar ya saka nashi, kama I zuwa yanzu ba Saurayi ba labarin shi ya gudu, kuma ko an kira wayan shi bata shiga, ga shi ba'a San gidan su ba,ya dai fadiwa maryam cewa shi Dan garin Kaduna ne.

"Wannan lamari ya faru ne a wani unguwa da ake kira da limancin kona a wani fitaccen gida mai suna gidan sarkin rafi."

"Abinda ya faru, daga binciken da ake kai yanzu haka".

Malam ya kamo hanya daga Kano zuwa Gashua (Jihar Yobe), yana zuwa dai dai Barikin Sojoji na Nguru, sai yaga wani mutum kamar Soja yana jiran motar da zata dauke shi, sai ya nemi alfarmar Malam, cewa Malam ya rage masa hanya zuwa Jaji-Maji.
~ Mutumin dake kama da Sojan yana dauke da irin gadon nan na tafi da-gidan ka wato (Camp Bed), yana cikin farin kaya ne ba Uniform ba.
Ashe akwai Bindiga 'kirar AK-47 cikin wannan Camp Bed shi Malam bai ankara ba, bai sani ba.

Suna zuwa wani gari me suna (Chakama) sai Malam yace zai sauka ya kama ruwa. Sai wannan mutumin me dauke da gadon yayi amfani da wannan dama ya ciro bindigar ya Harbi Malam harbi Uku, nan take ya kashe shi, rai yayi halin sa.
~ Bayan ya kashe shi, sai ya nemi wani abokin sa dake wajen da ya taimaka masa su gudu da motar, amma sai motar taki tashi. Suka buga, suka buga motar taki tashi (Allahu Akbar, kadarar bayin Allah kenan idan ka cutar dasu, ko kayi nufin cutar dasu).

Mutanen wannan kauye da suka ji kara sun zata hatsari aka yi, sai suka garzaya zuwa wajen don su bada taimako sai suka fahimci asalin abinda ya faru.
~ Nan take suka sanar da Jami'an tsaro aka zo aka kama wadannan mutanen da bincike yake nuna kamar sojoji ne.
Kuma yanzu haka suna nan Damaturu, jihar Yobe, ana cigaba da bincike akan su.
Shi wanda yayi kisan da bakin sa ya bayyana haka.

An kashe shi ne ranar Juma'a 20-08-2022, motar sa Honda ce (2006 Model).

~ Binciken ya nuna sunan wanda yayi kisan shine "Lance Corporal (JOHN GABRIEL)". 
~ Shi kuma wanda yayi niyyar taimaka masa wajen daukan motar sunan sa "ADAMU GIDEON" dake karkashin (Recca Battalion, 241) wato Bataliyar Soja ta 241 dake garin Nguru.
~ Da aka tambayi sojan dalilin yin hakan sai yace yayi hakan ne don ya gudu da motar Malam din yaje ya sayar.

Duk wani zance ba wannan ba, jita-jita ne kawai wanda bash ida tushe balle makama.
Allah yaji kan Malam ya gafarta masa, yasa ya huta.
Ya wulakanta wadannan mutane duniya da lahira.

ASALIN KALMAR HAUSA FULANI

Hausa-Fulani kalma ce da ake siffanta wata al'umma a arewacin Najeriya, wacce kuma ta daÉ—e tana jawo muhawara a kafofin sadarwa na zamani, wato social media.

Tambayar da ake muhawara a kai dai ita ce, "Shin ku Fulani ne ko Hausawa ko Hausa-Fulani?"

Wasu masana dai sun yi tsokaci a kan cewa babu wata Æ™abila mai suna Hausa-Fulani, ko da yake sun amince cewa mutum na da damar ya siffanta kansa yadda ya so.

Farooq Kperogi mataimakin Farfesa ne a Jami'ar Kennesaw da ke Atlantar Jihar Georgia ta Amurka, kuma mai bincike a kan asalin Æ™abilu, a wata hira da ya yi da BBC ya ce har yanzu ba a iya samun taÆ™amaiman asalin kalmar Hausa-Fulani ba.

Ya ce, "Abin da na sani shi ne jaridun Lagos da Ibadun ne suka sa kalmar ta shahara."

Tun a shekarar 1920 aka fara ambatar kalmar Hausa-Fulani. Kuma a cewar Farfesa Kperogi, dalibai irin su Ahmadu Bello sun yi amfani da ita a kwalejin Barewa sakamakon samun mutanen da a Æ™abilance Fulani ne amma da Hausa suke magana.

Kansancewar an rasa yadda za a siffanta su sai aka kira su da Hausa-Fulani. Farfesa Kperogi ya Æ™ara da cewa, "ina ganin 'yan siyasar Kudu maso yammacin Najeriya ne dalillin shaharar kalmar."

Ya cigaba da cewa hakan ya faru ne saboda wahalar tantance asalin arewa saboda addini ya yi tasiri a wanan É“angaren.

A kwana a tashi kalmar Hausa ta zama wata kalmar da ba Æ™abila take alamtawa ba.

Kamar yadda Dakta ya bayar da misalin cewa za a iya samun Bayarbe ko Ibo wanda ya koma arewacin Najeriya da zama ya hayayyafa. Idan 'ya'yansa suka rungumi Musulunci suka kuma iya harshen Hausa sosai, shi ke nan sun zama Hausawa.

Fulani da yawa sun zama Hausawa a harshe, kamar wasu mutanen da dama.

Farfesa Kperogi ya yi bayanin cewa a yunÆ™urin siffanta kaka-gidan da 'yan arewa suka yi a fagen siyasa, da farko an zaci cewa ba Hausawa ba ne, saboda a kan basu suna Hausa Fulani.

Ya ce, "Amma kalmar ba tana nufin dunÆ™ulewar Hausawa da Fulani ba ne".

A haÆ™iÆ™anin gaskiya abin da ake nufi a yanzu shi ne Musulmi É—an arewacin Najeriya mai amfani da harshen Hausa.

Sai dai kuma wasu masanan sun ce akwai Hausawa da Fulani waÉ—anda ba Musulmai ba ne.

Farfesa Kperogi ya tabbatar da hakan, sai dai a cewarsa basu da yawa. Kuma saboda yawansu bai taka kara ya karya ba, mutane ba sa lura da hakan.

Kasancewar Æ™Abilar Hausa ta É—amfara da Musulunci kuma hakan ne ma yasa a cikin al'ummar Hausawa, waÉ—anda ba Musulmi ba sai ake kiransu Maguzawa.

Duk faÉ—in Afrika babu wani misali na mutanen da suka cuÉ—anya ta fuskar harshe da al'adu kamar Hausawa da Fulani.

A Rwanda 'yan Æ™abilar Hutu da Tutsi sun gauraya ta hanyar auratayya, amma yawan hakan bai taka kara ya karya ba, shi yasa babu wani abu kamar Hutu-Tutsi, saboda ko wannensu bai bar asalinsa ba.

Amma a Æ™alla a Najeriya duk inda Fulani suka je, ban da kudu maso gabas, su kan ajiye Fulatancinsu su É—auki al'adu da harsunan mutanen da suka samu.

Kuma kasancewar Hausa Æ™abila ce da ta fi yawan mutane a Najeriya da ma Afirka ta yamma, Fulanin da suka shiga cikinsu sun sarayar da harsunansu da al'adunsu.

A Afirka, al'ummar Fulani su ne suka fi kowacce Æ™abila yaÉ—uwa a yammacin nahiyar, ana samunsu a ko ina, amma basu da rinjaye sai a Guinea. Kuma a Æ™asar Hausa ne kawai suka yi cakuÉ—uwa ta Æ™ut-da-Æ™ut har suka sarayar da harshensu da ma Æ™abilarsu
